GP11brahmppu:27143: devālayaṃ caidyataruṃ tathaiva ca catuṣpatham // BrP_221.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27144: vidyādhikaṃ guruṃ caiva budhaḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam /
GP11brahmppu:27145: upānadvastramālyādi dhṛtam anyair na dhārayet // BrP_221.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27147: tailābhyaṅgaṃ tathā bhogaṃ yoṣitaś ca vivarjayet // BrP_221.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27149: na cāpi vikṣipet pādau pādaṃ pādena nākramet // BrP_221.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27151: marmābhighātam ākrośaṃ paiśunyaṃ ca vivarjayet // BrP_221.44 //
GP11brahmppu:27152: dambhābhimānaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca na kurvīta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27153: mūrkhonmattavyasanino virūpān api vā tathā // BrP_221.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27155: parasya daṇḍaṃ nodyacchec chikṣārthaṃ śiṣyaputrayoḥ // BrP_221.46 //
GP11brahmppu:27157: saṃyāvaṃ kṛśaraṃ māṃsaṃ nātmārtham upasādhayet // BrP_221.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27158: sāyaṃ prātaś ca bhoktavyaṃ kṛtvā cātithipūjanam /
GP11brahmppu:27161: nodakśirāḥ svapej jātu na ca pratyakśirā naraḥ // BrP_221.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27162: śiras tv āgastyām ādhāya śayītātha puraṃdarīm /
GP11brahmppu:27163: na tu gandhavatīṣv apsu śayīta na tathoṣasi // BrP_221.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27164: uparāge paraṃ snānam ṛte dinam udāhṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:27165: apamṛjyān na vastrāntair gātrāṇy ambarapāṇibhiḥ // BrP_221.51 //
GP11brahmppu:27166: na cāvadhūnayet keśān vāsasī na ca nirdhunet /
GP11brahmppu:27167: anulepanam ādadyān nāsnātaḥ karhicid budhaḥ // BrP_221.52 //
GP11brahmppu:27168: na cāpi raktavāsāḥ syāc citrāsitadharo 'pi vā /
GP11brahmppu:27169: na ca kuryād viparyāsaṃ vāsasor nāpi bhūṣayoḥ // BrP_221.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27170: varjyaṃ ca vidaśaṃ vastram atyantopahataṃ ca yat /
GP11brahmppu:27171: kīṭakeśāvapannaṃ ca tathā śvabhir avekṣitam // BrP_221.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27173: pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ varjyamāṃsaṃ ca varjayet // BrP_221.55 //
GP11brahmppu:27174: na bhakṣayec ca satataṃ pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27175: varjyaṃ ciroṣitaṃ viprāḥ śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ ca yat // BrP_221.56 //
GP11brahmppu:27177: tathā māṃsavikārāś ca naiva varjyāś ciroṣitāḥ // BrP_221.57 //
GP11brahmppu:27179: nāsnāto naiva saṃviṣṭo na caivānyamanā naraḥ // BrP_221.58 //
GP11brahmppu:27180: na caiva śayane norvyām upaviṣṭo na śabdakṛt /
GP11brahmppu:27181: preṣyāṇām apradāyātha na bhuñjīta kadācana // BrP_221.59 //
GP11brahmppu:27183: paradārā na gantavyāḥ puruṣeṇa vipaścitā // BrP_221.60 //
GP11brahmppu:27185: nahīdṛśam anāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃcana vidyate // BrP_221.61 //
GP11brahmppu:27190: ācāmec caiva tadvac ca prāṅmukhodaṅmukho 'pi vā /
GP11brahmppu:27192: kṛtaśaucāvaśiṣṭāś ca varjayet pañca vai mṛdaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27193: prakṣālya hastau pādau ca samabhyukṣya samāhitaḥ // BrP_221.65 //
GP11brahmppu:27194: antarjānus tathācāmet triś catur vāpi vai naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27195: parimṛjya dvir āvartya khāni mūrdhānam eva ca // BrP_221.66 //
GP11brahmppu:27196: samyag ācamya toyena kriyāṃ kurvīta vai śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27197: kṣute 'valīḍhe vāte ca tathā niṣṭhīvanādiṣu // BrP_221.67 //
GP11brahmppu:27200: yathāvibhavato hy etat pūrvābhāve tataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:27201: na vidyamāne pūrvokta uttaraprāptir iṣyate // BrP_221.69 //
GP11brahmppu:27203: svāpe 'dhvani tathā bhuñjan svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet // BrP_221.70 //
GP11brahmppu:27204: saṃdhyāyāṃ maithunaṃ cāpi tathā prasthānam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27206: śiraḥsnānaṃ ca kurvīta daivaṃ pitryam athāpi ca /
GP11brahmppu:27207: prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi śmaśrukarma ca kārayet // BrP_221.72 //
GP11brahmppu:27208: vyaṅginīṃ varjayet kanyāṃ kulajāṃ vāpy arogiṇīm /
GP11brahmppu:27209: udvahet pitṛmātroś ca saptamīṃ pañcamīṃ tathā // BrP_221.73 //
GP11brahmppu:27210: rakṣed dārāṃs tyajed īrṣyāṃ tathāhni svapnamaithune /
GP11brahmppu:27211: paropatāpakaṃ karma jantupīḍāṃ ca sarvadā // BrP_221.74 //
GP11brahmppu:27214: tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ vrajed rātryāṃ jyeṣṭhayugmāsu rātriṣu /
GP11brahmppu:27215: yugmāsu putrā jāyante striyo 'yugmāsu rātriṣu // BrP_221.76 //
GP11brahmppu:27217: kṣurakarmaṇi riktāṃ vai varjayīta vicakṣaṇaḥ // BrP_221.77 //
GP11brahmppu:27219: na cotkṛṣṭāsanaṃ deyam anutkṛṣṭasya cādarāt // BrP_221.78 //
GP11brahmppu:27220: kṣurakarmaṇi cānte ca strīsaṃbhoge ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27221: snāyīta cailavān prājñaḥ kaṭabhūmim upetya ca // BrP_221.79 //
GP11brahmppu:27224: parivādaṃ na kurvīta parihāsaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27226: sadā māṅgalyaveṣaḥ syān na vāmāṅgalyavān bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:27227: noddhatonmattamūḍhaiś ca nāvinītaiś ca paṇḍitaḥ // BrP_221.82 //
GP11brahmppu:27229: na cātivyayaśīlaiś ca puruṣair naiva vairibhiḥ // BrP_221.83 //
GP11brahmppu:27230: kāryākṣamair ninditair na na caiva viṭasaṅgibhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27231: nisvair na vādaikaparair naraiś cānyais tathādhamaiḥ // BrP_221.84 //
GP11brahmppu:27233: uttiṣṭhed vibhavāc cainān arcayed gṛham āgatān // BrP_221.85 //
GP11brahmppu:27235: samyag gṛhe 'rcanaṃ kṛtvā yathāsthānam anukramāt // BrP_221.86 //
GP11brahmppu:27236: saṃpūjayet tathā vahnau pradadyāc cāhutīḥ kramāt /
GP11brahmppu:27237: prathamāṃ brahmaṇe dadyāt prajānāṃ pataye tataḥ // BrP_221.87 //
GP11brahmppu:27239: tato 'numataye dadyād dadyād bahubaliṃ tataḥ // BrP_221.88 //
GP11brahmppu:27240: pūrvaṃ khyātā mayā yā tu nityakramavidhau kriyā /
GP11brahmppu:27241: vaiśvadevaṃ tataḥ kuryād vadata śṛṇuta dvijāḥ // BrP_221.89 //
GP11brahmppu:27242: yathāsthānavibhāgaṃ tu devān uddiśya vai pṛthak /
GP11brahmppu:27243: parjanyāpodharitrīṇāṃ dadyāt tu maṇike trayam // BrP_221.90 //
GP11brahmppu:27244: vāyave ca pratidiśaṃ digbhyaḥ prācyādiṣu kramāt /
GP11brahmppu:27245: brahmaṇe cāntarikṣāya sūryāya ca yathākramāt // BrP_221.91 //
GP11brahmppu:27246: viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyo viśvabhūtebhya eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27247: uṣase bhūtapataye dadyād vottarataḥ śuciḥ // BrP_221.92 //
GP11brahmppu:27248: svadhā ca nama ity uktvā pitṛbhyaś caiva dakṣiṇe /
GP11brahmppu:27249: kṛtvāpasavyaṃ vāyavyāṃ yakṣmaitat taiti saṃvadan // BrP_221.93 //
GP11brahmppu:27251: devānāṃ ca tataḥ kuryād brāhmaṇānāṃ namaskriyām // BrP_221.94 //
GP11brahmppu:27252: aṅguṣṭhottarato rekhā pāṇer yā dakṣiṇasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:27253: etad brāhmam iti khyātaṃ tīrtham ācamanāya vai // BrP_221.95 //
GP11brahmppu:27255: pitṝṇāṃ tena toyāni dadyān nāndīmukhād ṛte // BrP_221.96 //
GP11brahmppu:27257: tīrthaṃ kaniṣṭhikāmūle kāyaṃ tatra prajāpateḥ // BrP_221.97 //
GP11brahmppu:27258: evam ebhiḥ sadā tīrthair vidhānaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha /
GP11brahmppu:27259: sadā kāryāṇi kurvīta nānyatīrthaḥ kadācana // BrP_221.98 //
GP11brahmppu:27261: devatīrthena devānāṃ prājāpatyaṃ jitena ca // BrP_221.99 //
GP11brahmppu:27263: prājāpatyena tīrthena yac ca kiṃcit prajāpateḥ // BrP_221.100 //
GP11brahmppu:27264: yugapaj jalam agniṃ ca bibhṛyān na vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27265: gurudevapitṝn viprān na ca pādau prasārayet // BrP_221.101 //
GP11brahmppu:27266: nācakṣīta dhayantīṃ gāṃ jalaṃ nāñjalinā pibet /
GP11brahmppu:27267: śaucakāleṣu sarveṣu guruṣv alpeṣu vā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27268: na vilambeta medhāvī na mukhenānalaṃ dhamet // BrP_221.102 //
GP11brahmppu:27269: tatra viprā na vastavyaṃ yatra nāsti catuṣṭayam /
GP11brahmppu:27270: ṛṇapradātā vaidyaś ca śrotriyaḥ sajalā nadī // BrP_221.103 //
GP11brahmppu:27272: tatra nityaṃ vaset prājñaḥ kutaḥ kunṛpatau sukham // BrP_221.104 //
GP11brahmppu:27274: śāntāmatsariṇo lokās tatra vāsaḥ sukhodayaḥ // BrP_221.105 //
GP11brahmppu:27276: yatrauṣadhāny aśeṣāṇi vaset tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ // BrP_221.106 //
GP11brahmppu:27277: tatra viprā na vastavyaṃ yatraitat tritayaṃ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27278: jigīṣuḥ pūrvavairaś ca janaś ca satatotsavaḥ // BrP_221.107 //
GP11brahmppu:27280: yatrāpradhṛṣyo nṛpatir yatra sasyapradā mahī // BrP_221.108 //
GP11brahmppu:27281: ity etat kathitaṃ viprā mayā vo hitakāmyayā /
GP11brahmppu:27285: śaśakaḥ kacchapo godhā śvāvin matsyo 'tha śalyakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27286: bhakṣyāś caite tathā varjyau grāmaśūkarakukkuṭau // BrP_221.111 //
GP11brahmppu:27288: prokṣitaṃ cauṣadhārthaṃ ca khādan māṃsaṃ na duṣyati // BrP_221.112 //
GP11brahmppu:27292: pātrāṇāṃ camasānāṃ ca ambunā śaucam iṣyate // BrP_221.114 //
GP11brahmppu:27294: sasnehānāṃ ca pātrāṇāṃ śuddhir uṣṇena vāriṇā // BrP_221.115 //
GP11brahmppu:27296: saṃhatānāṃ ca vastrāṇāṃ prokṣaṇāt saṃcayasya ca // BrP_221.116 //
GP11brahmppu:27298: āvikānāṃ samastānāṃ keśānāṃ caivam iṣyate // BrP_221.117 //
GP11brahmppu:27300: śodhanaṃ caiva bhavati upaghātavatāṃ sadā // BrP_221.118 //
GP11brahmppu:27301: tathā kārpāsikānāṃ ca śuddhiḥ syāj jalabhasmanā /
GP11brahmppu:27304: śuddhaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ kāruhastaḥ paṇyaṃ yoṣinmukhaṃ tathā // BrP_221.120 //
GP11brahmppu:27308: karmāntāgāraśālāś ca stanadvayaṃ śuci striyāḥ // BrP_221.122 //
GP11brahmppu:27313: mṛdambu bhasma cāpy anne prakṣeptavyaṃ viśuddhaye /
GP11brahmppu:27315: bhasmāmbubhiś ca kāṃsyānāṃ śuddhiḥ plāvo dravasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:27317: anyeṣāṃ caiva dravyāṇāṃ varṇagandhāṃś ca hārayet /
GP11brahmppu:27318: śuci māṃsaṃ tu cāṇḍāla- kravyādair vinipātitam // BrP_221.127 //
GP11brahmppu:27319: rathyāgataṃ ca tailādi śuci gotṛptidaṃ payaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27320: rajo 'gnir aśvagochāyā raśmayaḥ pavano mahī // BrP_221.128 //
GP11brahmppu:27322: ajāśvaṃ mukhato medhyaṃ na gor vatsasya cānanam // BrP_221.129 //
GP11brahmppu:27324: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ taṭau nadyās tṛṇāni ca // BrP_221.130 //
GP11brahmppu:27326: rathyāpasarpaṇe snāne kṣutpānānāṃ ca karmasu // BrP_221.131 //
GP11brahmppu:27330: prabhūtopahatād annād agram uddhṛtya saṃtyajet // BrP_221.133 //
GP11brahmppu:27331: śeṣasya prokṣaṇaṃ kuryād ācamyādbhis tathā mṛdā /
GP11brahmppu:27332: upavāsas trirātraṃ tu duṣṭabhaktāśino bhavet // BrP_221.134 //
GP11brahmppu:27333: ajñāne jñānapūrve tu taddoṣopaśame na tu /
GP11brahmppu:27336: nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ snātvā vipro viśudhyati // BrP_221.136 //
GP11brahmppu:27337: ācamyaiva tu niḥsnehaṃ gām ālabhyārkam īkṣya vā /
GP11brahmppu:27338: na laṅghayet tathaivātha ṣṭhīvanodvartanāni ca // BrP_221.137 //
GP11brahmppu:27339: gṛhād ucchiṣṭaviṇmūtraṃ pādāmbhas tat kṣiped bahiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27340: pañcapiṇḍān anuddhṛtya na snāyāt paravāriṇi // BrP_221.138 //
GP11brahmppu:27342: nodyānādau vikāleṣu prājñas tiṣṭhet kadācana // BrP_221.139 //
GP11brahmppu:27346: avalokya tathodakyāṃ saṃnyastaṃ patitaṃ śavam // BrP_221.141 //
GP11brahmppu:27348: mṛtaniryātakāṃś caiva paradāraratāś ca ye // BrP_221.142 //
GP11brahmppu:27349: etad eva hi kartavyaṃ prājñaiḥ śodhanam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27353: tadvac ca sūtikāśauca- dūṣitau puruṣāv api /
GP11brahmppu:27354: yasya cānudinaṃ hānir gṛhe nityasya karmaṇaḥ // BrP_221.145 //
GP11brahmppu:27356: nityasya karmaṇo hāniṃ na kurvīta kadācana // BrP_221.146 //
GP11brahmppu:27357: tasya tv akaraṇaṃ vakṣye kevalaṃ mṛtajanmasu /
GP11brahmppu:27359: kṣatriyo dvādaśāhaṃ ca vaiśyo māsārdham eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27360: śūdraś ca māsam āsīta nijakarmavivarjitaḥ // BrP_221.148 //
GP11brahmppu:27361: tataḥ paraṃ nijaṃ karma kuryuḥ sarve yathocitam /
GP11brahmppu:27362: pretāya salilaṃ deyaṃ bahir gatvā tu gotrakaiḥ // BrP_221.149 //
GP11brahmppu:27363: prathame 'hni caturthe ca saptame navame tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27366: gotrakais tu kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kāryāḥ saṃcayanāt param // BrP_221.151 //
GP11brahmppu:27370: bāle deśāntarasthe ca tathā pravrajite mṛte // BrP_221.153 //
GP11brahmppu:27371: sadyaḥ śaucaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tryaham uktam aśaucakam /
GP11brahmppu:27372: sapiṇḍānāṃ sapiṇḍas tu mṛte 'nyasmin mṛto yadi // BrP_221.154 //
GP11brahmppu:27374: eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭo janmany api hi sūtake // BrP_221.155 //
GP11brahmppu:27376: putre jāte pituḥ snānaṃ sacailasya vidhīyate // BrP_221.156 //
GP11brahmppu:27377: tatrāpi yadi vānyasminn anuyātas tataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:27378: tatrāpi śuddhir uditā pūrvajanmavato dinaiḥ // BrP_221.157 //
GP11brahmppu:27380: svāḥ svāḥ karmakriyāḥ kuryuḥ sarve varṇā yathāvidhi // BrP_221.158 //
GP11brahmppu:27381: pretam uddiśya kartavyam ekoddiṣṭam ataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:27382: dānāni caiva deyāni brāhmaṇebhyo manīṣibhiḥ // BrP_221.159 //
GP11brahmppu:27383: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe /
GP11brahmppu:27384: tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā // BrP_221.160 //
GP11brahmppu:27385: pūrṇais tu divasaiḥ spṛṣṭvā salilaṃ vāhanāyudhaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27386: dattapretodapiṇḍāś ca sarve varṇāḥ kṛtakriyāḥ // BrP_221.161 //
GP11brahmppu:27387: kuryuḥ samagrāḥ śucinaḥ paratreha ca bhūtaye /
GP11brahmppu:27388: adhyetavyā trayī nityaṃ bhavitavyaṃ vipaścitā // BrP_221.162 //
GP11brahmppu:27389: dharmato dhanam āhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyaṃ cāpi yatnataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27390: yena prakupito nātmā jugupsām eti bho dvijāḥ // BrP_221.163 //
GP11brahmppu:27391: tat kartavyam aśaṅkena yan na gopyaṃ mahājanaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27392: evam ācarato viprāḥ puruṣasya gṛhe sataḥ // BrP_221.164 //
GP11brahmppu:27394: idaṃ rahasyam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ buddhivivardhanam // BrP_221.165 //
GP11brahmppu:27398: brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś ca munisattamāḥ // BrP_221.167 //
GP11brahmppu:27400: jñātvaiva yaḥ sadā kālam anuṣṭhānaṃ karoti vai // BrP_221.168 //
GP11brahmppu:27402: sārāt sārataraṃ cedam ākhyātaṃ dvijasattamāḥ // BrP_221.169 //
GP11brahmppu:27403: śrutismṛtyuditaṃ dharmaṃ na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit /
GP11brahmppu:27404: na nāstikāya dātavyaṃ na duṣṭamataye dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27405: na dāmbhikāya mūrkhāya na kutarkapralāpine // BrP_221.170 //
GP11brahmppu:27408: caturāśramadharmāṃś ca dvijavarya bravīhi tān // BrP_222.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27411: śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃyatā bhūtvā varṇadharmān mayoditān // BrP_222.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27413: nityodakī bhaved vipraḥ kuryāc cāgniparigraham // BrP_222.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27414: vṛttyarthaṃ yājayet tv anyān dvijān adhyāpayet tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27415: kuryāt pratigrahādānaṃ yajñārthaṃ jñānato dvijāḥ // BrP_222.4 //
GP11brahmppu:27418: gavi ratne ca pārakye samabuddhir bhaved dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27419: ṛtāv abhigamaḥ patnyāṃ śasyate vāsya bho dvijāḥ // BrP_222.6 //
GP11brahmppu:27420: dānāni dadyād icchāto dvijebhyaḥ kṣatriyo 'pi hi /
GP11brahmppu:27421: yajec ca vividhair yajñair adhīyīta ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_222.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27425: bhavanti nṛpate rakṣā yato yajñādikarmaṇām // BrP_222.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27427: prāpnoty abhimatāṃl lokān varṇasaṃsthāpako nṛpaḥ // BrP_222.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27428: pāśupālyaṃ vaṇijyāṃ ca kṛṣiṃ ca munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27429: vaiśyāya jīvikāṃ brahmā dadau lokapitāmahaḥ // BrP_222.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27430: tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ yajño dānaṃ dharmaś ca śasyate /
GP11brahmppu:27433: krayavikrayajair vāpi dhanaiḥ kārubhavais tu vā // BrP_222.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27434: dānaṃ dadyāc ca śūdro 'pi pākayajñair yajeta ca /
GP11brahmppu:27435: pitryādikaṃ ca vai sarvaṃ śūdraḥ kurvīta tena vai // BrP_222.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27439: satyaṃ śaucam anāyāso maṅgalaṃ priyavāditā // BrP_222.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27441: anasūyā ca sāmānyā varṇānāṃ kathitā guṇāḥ // BrP_222.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27443: guṇās tathopadharmāś ca viprādīnām ime dvijāḥ // BrP_222.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27445: rājanyasya ca vaiśyoktaṃ śūdrakarmāṇi caitayoḥ // BrP_222.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27446: sasāmarthye sati tyājyam ubhābhyām api ca dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27447: tad evāpadi kartavyaṃ na kuryāt karmasaṃkaram // BrP_222.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27448: ity ete kathitā viprā varṇadharmā mayādya vai /
GP11brahmppu:27449: dharmam āśramiṇāṃ samyag bruvato 'pi nibodhata // BrP_222.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27451: guror gehe vasan viprā brahmacārī samāhitaḥ // BrP_222.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27453: vratāni caratā grāhyo vedaś ca kṛtabuddhinā // BrP_222.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27454: ubhe saṃdhye raviṃ viprās tathaivāgniṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27455: upatiṣṭhet tathā kuryād guror apy abhivādanam // BrP_222.24 //
GP11brahmppu:27456: sthite tiṣṭhed vrajed yāti nīcair āsīta cāsite /
GP11brahmppu:27457: śiṣyo gurau dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pratikūlaṃ ca saṃtyajet // BrP_222.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27459: anujñātaṃ ca bhikṣānnam aśnīyād guruṇā tataḥ // BrP_222.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27465: gṛhasthakāryam akhilaṃ kuryād viprāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // BrP_222.29 //
GP11brahmppu:27466: nirvāpeṇa pitṝn arcya yajñair devāṃs tathātithīn /
GP11brahmppu:27467: annair munīṃś ca svādhyāyair apatyena prajāpatim // BrP_222.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27470: bhikṣābhujaś ca ye kecit parivrāḍ brahmacāriṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27471: te 'py atra pratitiṣṭhanti gārhasthyaṃ tena vai param // BrP_222.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27473: aṭanti vasudhāṃ viprāḥ pṛthivīdarśanāya ca // BrP_222.33 //
GP11brahmppu:27474: aniketā hy anāhārā ye tu sāyaṃgṛhās tu te /
GP11brahmppu:27475: teṣāṃ gṛhasthaḥ satataṃ pratiṣṭhā yonir ucyate // BrP_222.34 //
GP11brahmppu:27479: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati // BrP_222.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27480: avajñānam ahaṃkāro dambhaś cāpi gṛhe sataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27481: parivādopaghātau ca pāruṣyaṃ ca na śasyate // BrP_222.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27482: yaś ca samyak karoty evaṃ gṛhasthaḥ paramaṃ vidhim /
GP11brahmppu:27485: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya vanaṃ gacchet sahaiva vā // BrP_222.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27487: bhūmiśāyī bhavet tatra muniḥ sarvātithir dvijāḥ // BrP_222.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27489: tadvat triṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ śastam asya dvijottamāḥ // BrP_222.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27491: bhikṣā balipradānaṃ tu śastam asya praśasyate // BrP_222.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27494: yas tv etā niyataś caryā vānaprasthaś caren muniḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27495: sa dahaty agnivad doṣāñ jayel lokāṃś ca śāśvatān // BrP_222.44 //
GP11brahmppu:27496: caturthaś cāśramo bhikṣoḥ procyate yo manīṣibhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27497: tasya svarūpaṃ gadato budhyadhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ // BrP_222.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27501: mitrādiṣu samo maitraḥ samasteṣv eva jantuṣu // BrP_222.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27503: yuktaḥ kurvīta na drohaṃ sarvasaṅgāṃś ca varjayet // BrP_222.48 //
GP11brahmppu:27505: tathā prītir na tiryakṣu dveṣo vā nāsya jāyate // BrP_222.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27507: kāle praśastavarṇānāṃ bhikṣārthī paryaṭed gṛhān // BrP_222.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27508: alābhe na viṣādī syāl lābhe naiva ca harṣayet /
GP11brahmppu:27511: atipūjitalābhais tu yatir mukto 'pi badhyate // BrP_222.52 //
GP11brahmppu:27512: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā darpo lobhamohādayaś ca ye /
GP11brahmppu:27513: tāṃs tu doṣān parityajya parivrāṇ nirmamo bhavet // BrP_222.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27514: abhayaṃ sarvasattvebhyo dattvā yaś carate mahīm /
GP11brahmppu:27515: tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ notpadyate kvacit // BrP_222.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27519: citāgninā sa vrajati sma lokān BrP_222.55d
GP11brahmppu:27526: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ mune // BrP_223.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27527: karmaṇā kena varṇānām adhamā jāyate gatiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27528: uttamā ca bhavet kena brūhi teṣāṃ mahāmate // BrP_223.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27529: śūdras tu karmaṇā kena brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati /
GP11brahmppu:27530: śrotum icchāmahe kena brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām iyāt // BrP_223.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27536: imaṃ praśnaṃ purā viprā apṛcchac cārulocanā /
GP11brahmppu:27537: tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ // BrP_223.6 //
GP11brahmppu:27540: dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayam // BrP_223.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27542: kena karmavipākena vaiśyo gacchati śūdratām // BrP_223.8 //
GP11brahmppu:27543: vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:27544: pratilome kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo nivartitum // BrP_223.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27545: kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate /
GP11brahmppu:27546: kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kena vā karmaṇā vibho // BrP_223.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27547: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha /
GP11brahmppu:27548: trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ // BrP_223.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27550: brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhe /
GP11brahmppu:27551: kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥ // BrP_223.12 //
GP11brahmppu:27552: karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati sa dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27553: śreṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād ākṣipyate punaḥ // BrP_223.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27555: kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyaṃ sa gacchati // BrP_223.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27556: yaś ca vipratvam utsṛjya kṣatradharmān niṣevate /
GP11brahmppu:27557: brāhmaṇyāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatrayonau prajāyate // BrP_223.15 //
GP11brahmppu:27559: brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadā // BrP_223.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27560: sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyāt /
GP11brahmppu:27561: svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnuyāt // BrP_223.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27564: kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇi /
GP11brahmppu:27565: svāni karmāṇy apākṛtya śūdrakarma niṣevate // BrP_223.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27567: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥ // BrP_223.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27568: yas tu śūdraḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27569: dharmajño dharmanirataḥ sa dharmaphalam aśnute // BrP_223.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27571: adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikī siddhir dharmakāmair niṣevyate // BrP_223.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27573: ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva vā kvacit // BrP_223.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27574: śūdrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi sadā devair mahātmabhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27575: pitāmahamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam iti me matiḥ // BrP_223.24 //
GP11brahmppu:27577: āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet // BrP_223.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27579: brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā // BrP_223.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27581: tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvati // BrP_223.27 //
GP11brahmppu:27583: abhojyānnāni vāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vai // BrP_223.28 //
GP11brahmppu:27585: svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ // BrP_223.29 //
GP11brahmppu:27587: vihīnasevī vipro hi patate brahmayonitaḥ // BrP_223.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27589: brahmadviḍ vāpi patati brāhmaṇo brahmayonitaḥ // BrP_223.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27590: ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27591: śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajet // BrP_223.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27595: kuryād avimanāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ // BrP_223.34 //
GP11brahmppu:27599: vṛthā māṃsaṃ na bhuñjīta śūdro vaiśyatvam ṛcchati // BrP_223.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27601: yajate nityayajñaiś ca svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ // BrP_223.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27605: agnihotram upāsīno juhvānaś ca yathāvidhi // BrP_223.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27607: tretāgnimātravihitaṃ vaiśyo bhavati ca dvijaḥ // BrP_223.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27608: sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucir mahati jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:27609: sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥ // BrP_223.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27611: dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ // BrP_223.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27613: ārdrahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan // BrP_223.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27614: satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ śuddhidarśanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27618: ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīm upāśrayet sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27621: sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā // BrP_223.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27622: śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan /
GP11brahmppu:27623: svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃcid upalakṣayet // BrP_223.48 //
GP11brahmppu:27625: svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣyam eva ca // BrP_223.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27626: dvikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi /
GP11brahmppu:27630: vaiśyo bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:27634: sa brāhmaṇyaṃ samutsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27635: karmabhiḥ śucibhir devī śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥ // BrP_223.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27636: śūdro 'pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam /
GP11brahmppu:27638: viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātibhyo vijñeya iti me matiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27639: na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutir na ca saṃtatiḥ // BrP_223.56 //
GP11brahmppu:27640: kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam /
GP11brahmppu:27641: sarvo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate // BrP_223.57 //
GP11brahmppu:27642: vṛtte sthitaś ca śūdro 'pi brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati /
GP11brahmppu:27643: brahmasvabhāvaḥ suśroṇi samaḥ sarvatra me mataḥ // BrP_223.58 //
GP11brahmppu:27644: nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27645: ete ye vimalā devi sthānabhāvanidarśakāḥ // BrP_223.59 //
GP11brahmppu:27646: svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27647: brahmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat // BrP_223.60 //
GP11brahmppu:27648: yat tatra bījaṃ patati sā kṛṣiḥ pretya bhāvinī /
GP11brahmppu:27649: saṃtuṣṭena sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadā // BrP_223.61 //
GP11brahmppu:27650: brāhmaṃ hi mārgam ākramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatā /
GP11brahmppu:27651: saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā // BrP_223.62 //
GP11brahmppu:27653: evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ // BrP_223.63 //
GP11brahmppu:27655: brāhmaṇyaṃ devi saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmanā // BrP_223.64 //
GP11brahmppu:27657: etat te guhyam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27658: brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnuyāt // BrP_223.65 //
GP11brahmppu:27661: dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho // BrP_224.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27662: karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhair dehinaḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27663: badhyante bandhanaiḥ kair vā mucyante vā kathaṃ vada // BrP_224.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27664: kena śīlena vai deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā /
GP11brahmppu:27665: samācārair guṇaiḥ kair vā svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ // BrP_224.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27670: nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ // BrP_224.5 //
GP11brahmppu:27673: karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:27674: ye na majjanti kasmiṃścit te na badhnanti karmabhiḥ // BrP_224.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27681: mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye /
GP11brahmppu:27682: paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27684: agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.12 //
GP11brahmppu:27685: stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca /
GP11brahmppu:27686: svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27688: jitendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27689: eṣa daivakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27690: akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ // BrP_224.15 //
GP11brahmppu:27691: avṛthāpakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27693: svargamārgam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ // BrP_224.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27695: vācā tu badhyate yena mucyate hy athavā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27696: tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate 'nagha // BrP_224.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27698: ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā adharmāśritam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27699: ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27700: vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27701: anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27704: paruṣaṃ ye na bhāṣante kaṭukaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27705: na paiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27707: parapīḍākaraṃ caiva te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27708: ye varjayanti paruṣaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27709: sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27711: saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.24 //
GP11brahmppu:27712: na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāriṇīm /
GP11brahmppu:27713: śāntiṃ vindanti ye kruddhās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27714: eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27715: śubhasatyaguṇair nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ // BrP_224.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27717: manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27718: tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk // BrP_224.27 //
GP11brahmppu:27721: svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu // BrP_224.28 //
GP11brahmppu:27723: naro badhyeta yeneha śṛṇu vā taṃ śubhānane // BrP_224.29 //
GP11brahmppu:27724: araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ dṛśyate yadā /
GP11brahmppu:27725: manasāpi na gṛhṇanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27727: manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27728: śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27729: bhajanti maitryaṃ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27731: svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.33 //
GP11brahmppu:27732: avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaratāḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27735: dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.35 //
GP11brahmppu:27737: nirākāṅkṣāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27739: samutthānam anuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // BrP_224.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27741: svargamārgaparā bhūyaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śrotum ihecchasi // BrP_224.38 //
GP11brahmppu:27743: mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaścin martyān prati maheśvara /
GP11brahmppu:27744: tasmāt tvaṃ nipuṇenādya mama vyākhyātum arhasi // BrP_224.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27745: kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho /
GP11brahmppu:27746: tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat // BrP_224.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27747: kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27748: vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita // BrP_224.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27749: apare ca mahābhāgyā mandabhāgyās tathā pare /
GP11brahmppu:27750: akulīnāḥ kulīnāś ca saṃbhavanti tathā pare // BrP_224.42 //
GP11brahmppu:27751: durdarśāḥ kecid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva /
GP11brahmppu:27752: priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ // BrP_224.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27753: duṣprajñāḥ kecid ābhānti kecid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27755: alpavācās tathā kecin mahāvācās tathā pare /
GP11brahmppu:27756: dṛśyante puruṣā deva tato vyākhyātum arhasi // BrP_224.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27759: martyaloke naraḥ sarvo yena svaṃ phalam aśnute // BrP_224.46 //
GP11brahmppu:27761: nityam udyataśastraś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ // BrP_224.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27766: nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27767: yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sakṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ // BrP_224.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27768: yaḥ kaścin nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhicit /
GP11brahmppu:27769: mānuṣyaṃ labhate vāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate // BrP_224.51 //
GP11brahmppu:27770: pāpena karmaṇā devi yukto hiṃsādibhir yataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27774: nikṣiptaśastro nirdaṇḍo na hiṃsati kadācana // BrP_224.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27775: na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate /
GP11brahmppu:27776: sarvabhūteṣu sasneho yathātmani tathā pare // BrP_224.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27777: īdṛśaḥ puruṣo nityaṃ devi devatvam aśnute /
GP11brahmppu:27778: upapannān sukhān bhogān sadāśnāti mudā yutaḥ // BrP_224.55 //
GP11brahmppu:27779: atha cen mānuṣe loke kadācid upapadyate /
GP11brahmppu:27783: kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ puruṣaḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27784: svargaṃ samabhipadyeta saṃpradānena kena vā // BrP_225.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27788: pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kuryāt prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27789: nityakādīni karmāṇi karoti prayataḥ śuciḥ // BrP_225.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27790: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ gṛhaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27791: sasyajātāni sarvāṇi sakṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ // BrP_225.4 //
GP11brahmppu:27794: tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān /
GP11brahmppu:27799: mahākāryo mahābhogo dhanī bhavati mānavaḥ // BrP_225.8 //
GP11brahmppu:27801: brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ sarvasya priyadarśanāḥ // BrP_225.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27803: ye 'nnāni na prayacchanti vidyamāne 'py abuddhayaḥ // BrP_225.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27806: na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam /
GP11brahmppu:27807: na gāś ca nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadācana // BrP_225.12 //
GP11brahmppu:27808: apralubdhāś ca ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27809: evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ // BrP_225.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27810: te vai manuṣyatāṃ yānti yadā kālasya paryayāt /
GP11brahmppu:27811: dhanarikte kule janma labhante svalpabuddhayaḥ // BrP_225.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27815: anena karmaṇā devi bhavanty adhanino narāḥ // BrP_225.16 //
GP11brahmppu:27816: apare dambhino nityaṃ māninaḥ parato ratāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27817: āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na yacchanty alpacetasaḥ // BrP_225.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27818: mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na prayacchanty abuddhayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27819: arghārhān na ca saṃskārair arcayanti yathāvidhi // BrP_225.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27821: śubhaṃ cābhimataṃ premṇā guruṃ nābhivadanti ye // BrP_225.19 //
GP11brahmppu:27823: saṃmānyāṃś cāvamanyante vṛddhān paribhavanti ca // BrP_225.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27825: te ced yadi narās tasmān nirayād uttaranti ca // BrP_225.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27826: varṣapūgais tato janma labhante kutsite kule /
GP11brahmppu:27829: na dambhī na ca mānī yo devatātithipūjakaḥ // BrP_225.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27835: mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ gurum abhyarcayan sadā // BrP_225.26 //
GP11brahmppu:27837: evaṃbhūto naro devi svargatiṃ pratipadyate // BrP_225.27 //
GP11brahmppu:27842: svakarmaphalam āpnoti svayam eva naraḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:27843: eṣa dharmo mayā prokto vidhātrā svayam īritaḥ // BrP_225.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27845: hastābhyāṃ yadi vā padbhyāṃ rajjvā daṇḍena vā punaḥ // BrP_225.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27846: loṣṭaiḥ stambhair upāyair vā jantūn bādheta śobhane /
GP11brahmppu:27847: hiṃsārthaṃ niṣkṛtiprajñaḥ prodvejayati caiva hi // BrP_225.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27850: sa cen manuṣyatāṃ gacched yadi kālasya paryayāt /
GP11brahmppu:27853: eṣa devi manuṣyeṣu boddhavyo jñātibandhuṣu // BrP_225.35 //
GP11brahmppu:27855: maitrī dṛṣṭiḥ pitṛsamo nirvairo niyatendriyaḥ // BrP_225.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27856: nodvejayati bhūtāni na ca hanti dayāparaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27857: hastapādaiś ca niyatair viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣu // BrP_225.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27858: na rajjvā na ca daṇḍena na loṣṭair nāyudhena ca /
GP11brahmppu:27861: tatrāsau bhavane divye mudā vasati devavat // BrP_225.39 //
GP11brahmppu:27863: alpāyāso nirātaṅkaḥ sa jātaḥ sukham edhate // BrP_225.40 //
GP11brahmppu:27865: eṣa devi satāṃ mārgo bādhā yatra na vidyate // BrP_225.41 //
GP11brahmppu:27870: kena karmavipākena prajñāvān puruṣo bhavet // BrP_225.43 //
GP11brahmppu:27872: evaṃ tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara // BrP_225.44 //
GP11brahmppu:27873: jātyandhāś cāpare deva rogārtāś cāpare tathā /
GP11brahmppu:27874: narāḥ klībāś ca dṛśyante kāraṇaṃ brūhi tatra vai // BrP_225.45 //
GP11brahmppu:27879: labhante svargatiṃ nityam iha loke yathāsukham // BrP_225.47 //
GP11brahmppu:27880: sa cen manuṣyatāṃ yāti medhāvī tatra jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:27881: śrutaṃ yajñānugaṃ yasya kalyāṇam upajāyate // BrP_225.48 //
GP11brahmppu:27882: paradāreṣu ye cāpi cakṣur duṣṭaṃ prayuñjate /
GP11brahmppu:27883: tena duṣṭasvabhāvena jātyandhās te bhavanti hi // BrP_225.49 //
GP11brahmppu:27884: manasāpi praduṣṭena nagnāṃ paśyanti ye striyam /
GP11brahmppu:27885: rogārtās te bhavantīha narā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ // BrP_225.50 //
GP11brahmppu:27886: ye tu mūḍhā durācārā viyonau maithune ratāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27887: puruṣeṣu suduṣprajñāḥ klībatvam upayānti te // BrP_225.51 //
GP11brahmppu:27888: paśūṃś ca ye vai badhnanti ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27889: prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca klībā jāyanti vai narāḥ // BrP_225.52 //
GP11brahmppu:27891: avadyaṃ kiṃ tu vai karma niravadyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:27892: śreyaḥ kurvann avāpnoti mānavo devasattama // BrP_225.53 //
GP11brahmppu:27894: śreyāṃsaṃ mārgam anvicchan sadā yaḥ pṛcchati dvijān /
GP11brahmppu:27895: dharmānveṣī guṇākāṅkṣī sa svargaṃ samupāśnute // BrP_225.54 //
GP11brahmppu:27897: medhāvī dhāraṇāyuktaḥ prājñas tatrāpi jāyate // BrP_225.55 //
GP11brahmppu:27898: eṣa devi satāṃ dharmo gantavyo bhūtikārakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27899: nṛṇāṃ hitārthāya sadā mayā caivam udāhṛtaḥ // BrP_225.56 //
GP11brahmppu:27905: yajvānaś ca tathaivānye nirmohāś ca tathā pare /
GP11brahmppu:27906: kena karmavipākena bhavantīha vadasva me // BrP_225.59 //
GP11brahmppu:27910: adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27911: avratā naṣṭamaryādās te narā brahmarākṣasāḥ // BrP_225.61 //
GP11brahmppu:27913: nirhomā nirvaṣaṭkārās te bhavanti narādhamāḥ // BrP_225.62 //
GP11brahmppu:27914: eṣa devi mayā sarva- saṃśayacchedanāya te /
GP11brahmppu:27917: śrutvaivaṃ sā jaganmātā bhartur vacanam āditaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27918: hṛṣṭā babhūva suprītā vismitā ca tadā dvijāḥ // BrP_226.1 //
GP11brahmppu:27920: tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena gatās tasmin girau dvijāḥ // BrP_226.2 //
GP11brahmppu:27921: te 'pi saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ praṇamya ca /
GP11brahmppu:27922: papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ caiva lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // BrP_226.3 //
GP11brahmppu:27925: pṛcchāmas tvāṃ jagannātha saṃśayaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam // BrP_226.4 //
GP11brahmppu:27927: bhramanti suciraṃ kālaṃ puruṣāś cālpamedhasaḥ // BrP_226.5 //
GP11brahmppu:27929: brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // BrP_226.6 //
GP11brahmppu:27932: nānyopāyaṃ prapaśyāmi vāsudevāt paraṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_226.7 //
GP11brahmppu:27934: vāṅmanaḥkarmabhiḥ samyak te yānti paramāṃ gatim // BrP_226.8 //
GP11brahmppu:27935: kiṃ teṣāṃ jīviteneha paśuvac ceṣṭitena ca /
GP11brahmppu:27936: yeṣāṃ na pravaṇaṃ cittaṃ vāsudeve jaganmaye // BrP_226.9 //
GP11brahmppu:27939: māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya śrotum icchāma śaṃkara // BrP_226.10 //
GP11brahmppu:27941: pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27942: kṛṣṇo jāmbūnadābhāso vyabhre sūrya ivoditaḥ // BrP_226.11 //
GP11brahmppu:27946: śiroruhebhyo jyotīṃṣi romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥ // BrP_226.13 //
GP11brahmppu:27947: ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27948: pitāmahagṛhaṃ sākṣāt sarvadevagṛhaṃ ca saḥ // BrP_226.14 //
GP11brahmppu:27950: saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca // BrP_226.15 //
GP11brahmppu:27951: sa hi devadevaḥ sākṣād devanāthaḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27953: na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:27954: sanātano mahābhāgo govinda iti viśrutaḥ // BrP_226.17 //
GP11brahmppu:27955: sa sarvān pārthivān saṃkhye ghātayiṣyati mānadaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27956: surakāryārtham utpanno mānuṣyaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ // BrP_226.18 //
GP11brahmppu:27960: etasya devanāthasya kāryasya ca parasya ca // BrP_226.20 //
GP11brahmppu:27962: brahmā vasati nābhisthaḥ śarīre 'haṃ ca saṃsthitaḥ // BrP_226.21 //
GP11brahmppu:27963: sarvāḥ sukhaṃ saṃsthitāś ca śarīre tasya devatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27964: sa devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ śrīsahoṣitaḥ // BrP_226.22 //
GP11brahmppu:27966: uttamena suśīlena śaucena ca damena ca // BrP_226.23 //
GP11brahmppu:27970: astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ // BrP_226.25 //
GP11brahmppu:27979: bhavārtham eva devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:27980: prājāpatye śubhe mārge mānave dharmasaṃskṛte // BrP_226.30 //
GP11brahmppu:27982: aṃśo nāma manoḥ putro hy antardhāmā tataḥ param // BrP_226.31 //
GP11brahmppu:27984: prācīnabarhir bhavitā havirdhāmnaḥ suto dvijāḥ // BrP_226.32 //
GP11brahmppu:27986: prācetasas tathā dakṣo bhaviteha prajāpatiḥ // BrP_226.33 //
GP11brahmppu:27988: manoś ca vaṃśaja ilā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati // BrP_226.34 //
GP11brahmppu:27989: budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:27990: nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ // BrP_226.35 //
GP11brahmppu:27991: yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:27992: kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyati // BrP_226.36 //
GP11brahmppu:27994: uṣaṅgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathā // BrP_226.37 //
GP11brahmppu:27995: tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:27998: sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ // BrP_226.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28000: vasudevam iti khyātaṃ putram ānakadundubhim // BrP_226.40 //
GP11brahmppu:28003: rājño baddhān sa sarvān vai mokṣayiṣyati yādavaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28004: jarāsaṃdhaṃ tu rājānaṃ nirjitya girigahvare // BrP_226.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28008: śūraḥ saṃhanano bhūto dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥ // BrP_226.44 //
GP11brahmppu:28010: taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya brāhmaṇair arhaṇair varaiḥ // BrP_226.45 //
GP11brahmppu:28012: yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ ca pitāmaham // BrP_226.46 //
GP11brahmppu:28014: dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā // BrP_226.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28016: sa yasya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prītiyukto bhaviṣyati // BrP_226.48 //
GP11brahmppu:28018: yas tu taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam // BrP_226.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28019: tasya kīrtir yaśaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:28020: dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣād bhaviṣyati sa dharmavān // BrP_226.50 //
GP11brahmppu:28022: dharma eva sadā hi syād asminn abhyarcite vibhau // BrP_226.51 //
GP11brahmppu:28024: dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja ca // BrP_226.52 //
GP11brahmppu:28025: tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vidhinā parvate gandhamādane /
GP11brahmppu:28027: tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28028: vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayīta ca // BrP_226.54 //
GP11brahmppu:28030: arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ // BrP_226.55 //
GP11brahmppu:28031: evaṃ tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28035: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa namasyo dvijaiḥ sadā /
GP11brahmppu:28037: eṣa vai vihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28038: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadeveśaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ surasattamāḥ // BrP_226.59 //
GP11brahmppu:28040: ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim // BrP_226.60 //
GP11brahmppu:28041: tatra ca tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28042: samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe // BrP_226.61 //
GP11brahmppu:28044: halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ // BrP_226.62 //
GP11brahmppu:28045: triśirās tasya devasya dṛṣṭo 'nanta iti prabhoḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28046: suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī // BrP_226.63 //
GP11brahmppu:28048: sa ca śeṣo vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ // BrP_226.64 //
GP11brahmppu:28050: ya eṣa viṣṇuḥ so 'nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ // BrP_226.65 //
GP11brahmppu:28052: tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyaparākramau // BrP_226.66 //
GP11brahmppu:28054: eṣa vo 'nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28055: tad bhavanto yaduśreṣṭhaṃ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ // BrP_226.67 //
GP11brahmppu:28057: aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ śrutam asmābhir adbhutam /
GP11brahmppu:28060: kāṃ gatiṃ yānti manujā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ // BrP_227.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28061: kiṃ prāpnuvanti te mokṣaṃ kiṃ vā svargaṃ mahāmune /
GP11brahmppu:28062: athavā kiṃ muniśreṣṭha prāpnuvanty ubhayaṃ phalam // BrP_227.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28063: chettum arhasi sarvajña saṃśayaṃ no hṛdi sthitam /
GP11brahmppu:28064: chettā nānyo 'sti loke 'smiṃs tvadṛte munisattama // BrP_227.4 //
GP11brahmppu:28066: sādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭhā bhavadbhir yad udāhṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28068: dīkṣāmātreṇa kṛṣṇasya narā mokṣaṃ vrajanti vai /
GP11brahmppu:28069: kiṃ punar ye sadā bhaktyā pūjayanty acyutaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_227.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28070: na teṣāṃ durlabhaḥ svargo mokṣaś ca munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28071: labhante vaiṣṇavāḥ kāmān yān yān vāñchanti durlabhān // BrP_227.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28073: svecchayā muniśārdūlās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān // BrP_227.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28075: gṛhṇāti puruṣo viprās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān // BrP_227.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28079: prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāmān surāṇām api durlabhān // BrP_227.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28081: na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcid vidyate bhuvanatraye // BrP_227.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28082: dhanyās te puruṣā loke ye 'rcayanti sadā harim /
GP11brahmppu:28085: saṃpūjya taṃ suravaraṃ prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim // BrP_227.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28086: tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ munayo yat pṛcchata mamānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28087: pravakṣyāmi samāsena gatiṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BrP_227.15 //
GP11brahmppu:28095: vrajanti lokapālānāṃ bhavanaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak // BrP_227.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28096: manvantarapramāṇaṃ tu bhuktvā kālaṃ pṛthak pṛthak /
GP11brahmppu:28097: bhuvanāni pṛthak teṣāṃ sarvabhogair alaṃkṛtāḥ // BrP_227.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28099: tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān daśamanvantaraṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_227.21 //
GP11brahmppu:28100: tasmād gandharvalokaṃ tu yānti vai vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28101: viṃśanmanvantaraṃ kālaṃ tatra bhuktvā manoramān // BrP_227.22 //
GP11brahmppu:28102: bhogān ādityalokaṃ tu tasmād yānti supūjitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28104: tasmād vrajanti te viprāś candralokaṃ sukhapradam /
GP11brahmppu:28105: manvantarāṇāṃ te tatra catvāriṃśad guṇānvitam // BrP_227.24 //
GP11brahmppu:28107: tasmān nakṣatralokaṃ tu vimānaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam // BrP_227.25 //
GP11brahmppu:28108: vrajanti te muniśreṣṭhā guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28109: manvantarāṇāṃ pañcāśad bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān // BrP_227.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28110: tasmād vrajanti te viprā devalokaṃ sudurlabham /
GP11brahmppu:28111: ṣaṣṭimanvantaraṃ yāvat tatra bhuktvā sudurlabhān // BrP_227.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28113: śakralokaṃ punas tasmād gacchanti surapūjitāḥ // BrP_227.28 //
GP11brahmppu:28114: manvantarāṇāṃ tatraiva bhuktvā kālaṃ ca saptatim /
GP11brahmppu:28115: bhogān uccāvacān divyān manasaḥ prītivardhanān // BrP_227.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28116: tasmād vrajanti te lokaṃ prājāpatyam anuttamam /
GP11brahmppu:28119: tasmāt paitāmahaṃ lokaṃ yānti te vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ // BrP_227.31 //
GP11brahmppu:28120: manvantarāṇāṃ navati krīḍitvā tatra vai sukham /
GP11brahmppu:28121: ihāgatya punas tasmād viprāṇāṃ pravare kule // BrP_227.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28123: evaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān // BrP_227.33 //
GP11brahmppu:28124: ihāgatya punar yānti upary upari ca kramāt /
GP11brahmppu:28125: saṃbhave saṃbhave te tu śatavarṣaṃ dvijottamāḥ // BrP_227.34 //
GP11brahmppu:28126: bhuktvā yathepsitān bhogān yānti lokāntaraṃ tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28127: daśajanma yadā teṣāṃ krameṇaivaṃ prapūryate // BrP_227.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28128: tadā lokaṃ harer divyaṃ brahmalokād vrajanti te /
GP11brahmppu:28129: gatvā tatrākṣayān bhogān bhuktvā sarvaguṇānvitān // BrP_227.36 //
GP11brahmppu:28131: gacchanti bhuvanaṃ paścād vārāhasya dvijottamāḥ // BrP_227.37 //
GP11brahmppu:28133: krīḍanti tatra viprendrāḥ kṛtvā rūpaṃ caturbhujam // BrP_227.38 //
GP11brahmppu:28135: tiṣṭhanti śāśvate bhāve sarvair devair namaskṛtāḥ // BrP_227.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28136: tato yānti tu te dhīrā narasiṃhagṛhaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28137: krīḍante tatra muditā varṣakoṭyayutāni ca // BrP_227.40 //
GP11brahmppu:28139: krīḍante tatra saukhyena varṣāṇām ayutāni ca // BrP_227.41 //
GP11brahmppu:28141: tatra sthitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ varṣakoṭiśatān bahūn // BrP_227.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28143: bhuktvā bhogāṃś ca vividhān varṣakoṭyarbudāni ca // BrP_227.43 //
GP11brahmppu:28149: tatra tiṣṭhanti te viprā lakṣakoṭiśatatrayam // BrP_227.46 //
GP11brahmppu:28151: gacchanti yoginaḥ paścād yatra saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // BrP_227.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28152: tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān sahasraśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28155: tatra gatvā vimuktās te bhaveyur nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_227.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28156: evaṃ krameṇa bhuktiṃ te prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28157: muktiṃ ca muniśārdūlā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ // BrP_227.50 //
GP11brahmppu:28160: snātvā samyag vidhānena dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ // BrP_228.1 //
GP11brahmppu:28162: puṣpair gandhais tathā dīpair dhūpair naivedyakais tathā // BrP_228.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28164: stotrair nānāvidhair divyair gītavādyair manoharaiḥ // BrP_228.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28166: evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad rātrau kṛtvā prajāgaram // BrP_228.4 //
GP11brahmppu:28167: kathāṃ vā gītikāṃ viṣṇor gāyan viṣṇuparāyaṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28168: yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_228.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28171: brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // BrP_228.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28174: gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor jāgare yad udāhṛtam // BrP_228.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28175: avantī nāma nagarī babhūva bhuvi viśrutā /
GP11brahmppu:28179: viṣṇubhaktaḥ sa cāṇḍālo māsi māsi dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28184: prabhāte ca praṇamyeśaṃ dvādaśyāṃ gṛham etya ca // BrP_228.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28186: tataḥ saparivāras tu paścād bhuṅkte dvijottamāḥ // BrP_228.13 //
GP11brahmppu:28188: gītikābhir vicitrābhir vayaḥ pratigataṃ bahu // BrP_228.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28193: dṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasenātha gṛhītaś cāpi bhakṣitum /
GP11brahmppu:28194: cāṇḍālas tam athovāca nādya bhakṣyas tvayā hy aham // BrP_228.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28195: prātar bhokṣyasi kalyāṇa satyam eṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28196: adya kāryaṃ mama mahat tasmān muñcasva rākṣasa // BrP_228.18 //
GP11brahmppu:28197: śvaḥ satyena sameṣyāmi tataḥ khādasi mām iti /
GP11brahmppu:28199: kāryaṃ na vratavighnaṃ me kartum arhasi rākṣasa // BrP_228.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28202: mamābhūd adya ca bhavān mayā labdho mataṅgaja // BrP_228.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28203: na mokṣye bhakṣayiṣyāmi kṣudhayā pīḍito bhṛśam /
GP11brahmppu:28204: niśācaravacaḥ śrutvā mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha /
GP11brahmppu:28205: sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā sa satyavacanair dṛḍhaiḥ // BrP_228.21 //
GP11brahmppu:28207: satyamūlaṃ jagat sarvaṃ brahmarākṣasa tac chṛṇu /
GP11brahmppu:28209: ādityaś candramā vahnir vāyur bhūr dyaur jalaṃ manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28210: ahorātraṃ yamaḥ saṃdhye dve vidur naraceṣṭitam // BrP_228.23 //
GP11brahmppu:28212: yac ca brahmahanaḥ pāpaṃ surāpe gurutalpage // BrP_228.24 //
GP11brahmppu:28213: vandhyāpateś ca yat pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ vṛṣalīpateḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28214: yac ca devalake pāpaṃ matsyamāṃsāśinaś ca yat // BrP_228.25 //
GP11brahmppu:28215: kroḍamāṃsāśino yac ca kūrmamāṃsāśinaś ca yat /
GP11brahmppu:28216: vṛthā māṃsāśino yac ca pṛṣṭhamāṃsāśinaś ca yat // BrP_228.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28218: sūtakasya ca yat pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ krūrakarmaṇaḥ // BrP_228.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28219: kṛpaṇasya ca yat pāpaṃ yac ca vandhyātither api /
GP11brahmppu:28221: tāsu yad gamanāt pāpaṃ yad vipro vrajati striyam /
GP11brahmppu:28222: rajasvalāṃ tathā paścāc chrāddhaṃ kṛtvā striyaṃ vrajet // BrP_228.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28224: mitrabhāryāṃ gacchatāṃ ca yat pāpaṃ piśunasya ca // BrP_228.30 //
GP11brahmppu:28226: brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya yat pāpaṃ tadayacchataḥ // BrP_228.31 //
GP11brahmppu:28227: yac ca kanyānṛte pāpaṃ yac ca gośvatarānṛte /
GP11brahmppu:28228: strībālahantur yat pāpaṃ yac ca mithyābhibhāṣiṇaḥ // BrP_228.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28230: yac ca nindayatāṃ pāpaṃ gurumithyāpacārataḥ // BrP_228.33 //
GP11brahmppu:28231: agnityāgiṣu yat pāpam agnidāyiṣu yad vane /
GP11brahmppu:28232: gṛheṣṭyā pātake yac ca yad goghne yad dvijādhame // BrP_228.34 //
GP11brahmppu:28233: yat pāpaṃ parivitte ca yat pāpaṃ parivedinaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28234: tayor dātṛgrahītroś ca yat pāpaṃ bhrūṇaghātinaḥ // BrP_228.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28235: kiṃ cātra bahubhiḥ proktaiḥ śapathais tava rākṣasa /
GP11brahmppu:28236: śrūyatāṃ śapathaṃ bhīmaṃ durvācyam api kathyate // BrP_228.36 //
GP11brahmppu:28238: ayājyayājake ṣaṇḍhe yat pāpaṃ śravaṇe 'dhame // BrP_228.37 //
GP11brahmppu:28240: etais tu pāpair lipye 'haṃ yadi naiṣyāmi te 'ntikam // BrP_228.38 //
GP11brahmppu:28243: prāha gacchasva satyena samayaṃ caiva pālaya // BrP_228.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28244: ity uktaḥ kuṇapāśena śvapākaḥ kusumāni tu /
GP11brahmppu:28245: samādāyāgamac caiva viṣṇoḥ sa nilayaṃ gataḥ // BrP_228.40 //
GP11brahmppu:28246: tāni prādād brāhmaṇāya so 'pi prakṣālya cāmbhasā /
GP11brahmppu:28247: viṣṇum abhyarcya nilayaṃ jagāma sa tapodhanāḥ // BrP_228.41 //
GP11brahmppu:28248: so 'pi mātaṅgadāyādaḥ sopavāsas tu tāṃ niśām /
GP11brahmppu:28249: gāyan hi bāhyabhūmiṣṭhaḥ prajāgaram upākarot // BrP_228.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28250: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ snātvā devaṃ namasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:28251: satyaṃ sa samayaṃ kartuṃ pratasthe yatra rākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.43 //
GP11brahmppu:28252: taṃ vrajantaṃ pathi naraḥ prāha bhadra kva gacchasi /
GP11brahmppu:28253: sa tathākathayat sarvaṃ so 'py enaṃ punar abravīt // BrP_228.44 //
GP11brahmppu:28255: mahatā tu prayatnena śarīraṃ pālayed budhaḥ // BrP_228.45 //
GP11brahmppu:28259: bhavati mṛtasya kā kathā loke BrP_228.46d
GP11brahmppu:28260: mātaṅgas tad vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvācātha hetumat //* BrP_228.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28262: bhadra satyaṃ puraskṛtya gacchāmi śapathāḥ kṛtāḥ //* BrP_228.48 //
GP11brahmppu:28264: taṃ bhūyaḥ pratyuvācātha kim evaṃ mūḍhadhīr bhavān /
GP11brahmppu:28265: kiṃ na śrutaṃ tvayā sādho manunā yad udīritam // BrP_228.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28270: dharmavākyaṃ na ca strīṣu na vivāhe tathā ripau /
GP11brahmppu:28272: evaṃ tad vākyam ākarṇya mātaṅgaḥ pratyuvāca ha // BrP_228.51 //
GP11brahmppu:28274: maivaṃ vadasva bhadraṃ te satyaṃ lokeṣu pūjyate /
GP11brahmppu:28275: satyenāvāpyate saukhyaṃ yat kiṃcij jagatīgatam // BrP_228.52 //
GP11brahmppu:28277: jvalaty agniś ca satyena vāti satyena mārutaḥ // BrP_228.53 //
GP11brahmppu:28279: satyena jāyate puṃsāṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet // BrP_228.54 //
GP11brahmppu:28280: satyaṃ brahma paraṃ loke satyaṃ yajñeṣu cottamam /
GP11brahmppu:28281: satyaṃ svargasamāyātaṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet // BrP_228.55 //
GP11brahmppu:28283: ity uktvā so 'tha mātaṅgas taṃ prakṣipya narottamam /
GP11brahmppu:28284: jagāma tatra yatrāste prāṇihā brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.56 //
GP11brahmppu:28289: na mātaṅgam ahaṃ manye bhavantaṃ satyalakṣaṇam // BrP_228.58 //
GP11brahmppu:28290: karmaṇānena manye tvāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śucim avyayam /
GP11brahmppu:28291: yat kiṃcit tvāṃ bhadramukhaṃ pravakṣye dharmasaṃśrayam /
GP11brahmppu:28292: kiṃ tatra bhavatā rātrau kṛtaṃ viṣṇugṛhe vada // BrP_228.59 //
GP11brahmppu:28294: tam abhyuvāca mātaṅgaḥ śṛṇu viṣṇugṛhe mayā /
GP11brahmppu:28295: yat kṛtaṃ rajanībhāge yathātathyaṃ vadāmi te // BrP_228.60 //
GP11brahmppu:28297: prajāgaraḥ kṛto rātrau gāyatā viṣṇugītikām // BrP_228.61 //
GP11brahmppu:28298: taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ prāha kiyantaṃ kālam ucyatām /
GP11brahmppu:28299: prajāgaro viṣṇugṛhe kṛtaṃ bhaktimatā vada // BrP_228.62 //
GP11brahmppu:28300: tam abhyuvāca prahasan viṃśaty abdāni rākṣasa /
GP11brahmppu:28301: ekādaśyāṃ māsi māsi kṛtas tatra prajāgaraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28304: yad adya tvāṃ pravakṣyāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati /
GP11brahmppu:28305: ekarātrikṛtaṃ sādho mama dehi prajāgaram // BrP_228.64 //
GP11brahmppu:28307: triḥ satyena mahābhāga ity uktvā virarāma ha // BrP_228.65 //
GP11brahmppu:28309: mātaṅgas tam uvācātha mayātmā te niśācara /
GP11brahmppu:28310: niveditaḥ kim uktena khādasva svecchayāpi mām // BrP_228.66 //
GP11brahmppu:28312: sagītaṃ me prayacchasva kṛpāṃ kartuṃ tvam arhasi // BrP_228.67 //
GP11brahmppu:28313: mātaṅgo rākṣasaṃ prāha kim asaṃbaddham ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:28314: khādasva svecchayā māṃ tvaṃ na pradāsye prajāgaram /
GP11brahmppu:28315: mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā prāha taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.68 //
GP11brahmppu:28317: ko hi duṣṭamatir mando bhavantaṃ draṣṭum utsahet /
GP11brahmppu:28320: narakārtasya mūḍhasya sādhavaḥ syur dayānvitāḥ // BrP_228.70 //
GP11brahmppu:28321: tan mama tvaṃ mahābhāga kṛpāṃ kṛtvā prajāgaram /
GP11brahmppu:28322: yāmasyaikasya me dehi gaccha vā nilayaṃ svakam // BrP_228.71 //
GP11brahmppu:28324: taṃ punaḥ prāha cāṇḍālo na yāsyāmi nijaṃ gṛham /
GP11brahmppu:28325: na cāpi tava dāsyāmi kathaṃcid yāmajāgaram /
GP11brahmppu:28326: taṃ prahasyātha cāṇḍālaṃ provāca brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.72 //
GP11brahmppu:28329: tasyāḥ phalaṃ prayacchasva trāhi pāpāt samuddhara // BrP_228.73 //
GP11brahmppu:28331: evam uccārite tena mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha //* BrP_228.74 //
GP11brahmppu:28333: kiṃ pūrvaṃ bhavatā karma vikṛtaṃ kṛtam añjasā /
GP11brahmppu:28334: yena tvaṃ doṣajātena saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ // BrP_228.75 //
GP11brahmppu:28336: tasya tad vākyam ākarṇya mātaṅgaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28337: provāca duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ saṃsmṛtya svakṛtaṃ kṛtam // BrP_228.76 //
GP11brahmppu:28339: śrūyatāṃ yo 'ham āsaṃ vai pūrvaṃ yac ca mayā kṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28340: yasmin kṛte pāpayoniṃ gatavān asmi rākṣasīm // BrP_228.77 //
GP11brahmppu:28341: somaśarma iti khyātaḥ pūrvam āsam ahaṃ dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28346: tasmin parisamāpte tu maurkhyād dambham anuṣṭhitaḥ // BrP_228.80 //
GP11brahmppu:28348: pravartamāne tasmiṃs tu kukṣiśūlo 'bhavan mama // BrP_228.81 //
GP11brahmppu:28349: saṃpūrṇe daśarātre tu na samāpte tathā kratau /
GP11brahmppu:28350: virūpākṣasya dīyantyām āhutyāṃ rākṣase kṣaṇe // BrP_228.82 //
GP11brahmppu:28353: ajānatā yajñavidyāṃ yad iṣṭaṃ yājitaṃ ca yat /
GP11brahmppu:28355: tan māṃ pāpamahāmbhodhau nimagnaṃ tvaṃ samuddhara /
GP11brahmppu:28356: prajāgare gītikaikāṃ paścimāṃ dātum arhasi // BrP_228.85 //
GP11brahmppu:28358: tam uvācātha cāṇḍālo yadi prāṇivadhād bhavān /
GP11brahmppu:28359: nivṛttiṃ kurute dadyāṃ tataḥ paścimagītikām // BrP_228.86 //
GP11brahmppu:28360: bāḍham ity avadat so 'pi mātaṅgo 'pi dadau tadā /
GP11brahmppu:28363: praṇamya prayayau hṛṣṭas tīrthavaryaṃ pṛthūdakam // BrP_228.88 //
GP11brahmppu:28368: tasyānte brāhmaṇo jāto babhūva smṛtimān vaśī /
GP11brahmppu:28369: tasyāhaṃ caritaṃ bhūyaḥ kathayiṣyāmi bho dvijāḥ // BrP_228.91 //
GP11brahmppu:28371: rākṣase tu gate dhīmān gṛham etya yatātmavān // BrP_228.92 //
GP11brahmppu:28372: tadvipracaritaṃ smṛtvā nirviṇṇaḥ śucir apy asau /
GP11brahmppu:28373: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya dadau bhūmyāḥ pradakṣiṇām // BrP_228.93 //
GP11brahmppu:28375: dṛṣṭvā skandaṃ yayau dhārā- cakre cāpi pradakṣiṇam // BrP_228.94 //
GP11brahmppu:28377: pāpapramocanaṃ tīrtham āsasāda sa tu dvijāḥ // BrP_228.95 //
GP11brahmppu:28378: snānaṃ pāpaharaṃ cakre sa tu cāṇḍālavaṃśajaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28383: bhikṣāvadhūtā rajasā muktā tenātha bhikṣuṇā // BrP_228.98 //
GP11brahmppu:28385: pāpapramocane snātaḥ sa mṛto narmadātaṭe // BrP_228.99 //
GP11brahmppu:28386: mūrkho 'bhūd brāhmaṇavaro vārāṇasyāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28387: tatrāsya vasato 'bdais tu triṃśadbhiḥ siddhapūruṣaḥ // BrP_228.100 //
GP11brahmppu:28389: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sopahāsārtham abhivādyābhyuvāca ha // BrP_228.101 //
GP11brahmppu:28390: kuśalaṃ siddhapuruṣaṃ kutas tv āgamyate tvayā //* BrP_228.102 //
GP11brahmppu:28392: evaṃ saṃbhāṣitas tena jñāto 'ham iti cintya tu /
GP11brahmppu:28393: pratyuvācātha vandyas taṃ svargalokād upāgataḥ // BrP_228.103 //
GP11brahmppu:28394: taṃ siddhaṃ prāha mūrkho 'sau kiṃ tvaṃ vetsi triviṣṭape /
GP11brahmppu:28396: siddhas tam āha tāṃ vedmi śakracāmaradhāriṇīm /
GP11brahmppu:28399: tan mitra matkṛte vārttām urvaśyā bhavatādarāt // BrP_228.106 //
GP11brahmppu:28400: kathanīyā yac ca sā te brūyād ākhyāsyate bhavān /
GP11brahmppu:28401: bāḍham ity abravīt siddhaḥ so 'pi vipro mudānvitaḥ // BrP_228.107 //
GP11brahmppu:28403: sametya corvaśīṃ prāha yad ukto 'sau dvijena tu // BrP_228.108 //
GP11brahmppu:28404: sā prāha taṃ siddhavaraṃ nāhaṃ kāśipatiṃ dvijam /
GP11brahmppu:28405: jānāmi satyam uktaṃ te na cetasi mama sthitam // BrP_228.109 //
GP11brahmppu:28406: ity uktaḥ prayayau so 'pi kālena bahunā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28407: vārāṇasīṃ yayau siddho dṛṣṭo mūrkheṇa vai punaḥ // BrP_228.110 //
GP11brahmppu:28408: dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kila bhūyaḥ kim āhorubhavā tava /
GP11brahmppu:28409: siddho 'bravīn na jānāmi mām uvācorvaśī svayam // BrP_228.111 //
GP11brahmppu:28411: punaḥ prāha kathaṃ vetsīty evaṃ vācyā tvayorvaśī // BrP_228.112 //
GP11brahmppu:28412: bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty uktvā siddho divaṃ gataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28414: provāca tāṃ siddhavaraḥ sā ca taṃ siddham abravīt /
GP11brahmppu:28415: niyamaṃ kaṃcid api hi karotu dvijasattamaḥ // BrP_228.114 //
GP11brahmppu:28416: yenāhaṃ karmaṇā siddha taṃ jānāmi na cānyathā /
GP11brahmppu:28417: tad urvaśīvaco 'bhyetya tasmai mūrkhadvijāya tu // BrP_228.115 //
GP11brahmppu:28418: kathayām āsa siddhas tu so 'pīmaṃ niyamaṃ jagau /
GP11brahmppu:28419: tavāgre siddhapuruṣa niyamo 'yaṃ kṛto mayā // BrP_228.116 //
GP11brahmppu:28420: na bhokṣye 'dyaprabhṛti vai śakaṭaṃ satyam īritam /
GP11brahmppu:28421: ity uktaḥ prayayau siddhaḥ svarge dṛṣṭvorvaśīm atha // BrP_228.117 //
GP11brahmppu:28423: taṃ siddham urvaśī prāha jñāto 'sau sāṃprataṃ mayā // BrP_228.118 //
GP11brahmppu:28425: ity uktvā prayayau śīghraṃ vāsaṃ nārāyaṇātmajā // BrP_228.119 //
GP11brahmppu:28427: urvaśy api varārohā gatvā vārāṇasīṃ purīm // BrP_228.120 //
GP11brahmppu:28429: athāsāv api mūrkhas tu nadīṃ matsyodarīṃ mune // BrP_228.121 //
GP11brahmppu:28431: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe 'thāsya manmathaḥ kṣobhakṛd dṛḍham // BrP_228.122 //
GP11brahmppu:28432: cakāra mūrkhaś ceṣṭāś ca taṃ vivedorvaśī svayam /
GP11brahmppu:28433: taṃ mūrkhaṃ siddhagaditaṃ jñātvā sasmitam āha tam // BrP_228.123 //
GP11brahmppu:28435: kim icchasi mahābhāga mattaḥ śīghram ihocyatām /
GP11brahmppu:28436: kariṣyāmi vacas tubhyaṃ tvaṃ viśrabdhaṃ kariṣyasi // BrP_228.124 //
GP11brahmppu:28438: ātmapradānena mama prāṇān rakṣa śucismite //* BrP_228.125 //
GP11brahmppu:28441: tvaṃ tiṣṭhasva kṣaṇam atha pratīkṣasvāgataṃ mama // BrP_228.126 //
GP11brahmppu:28442: sthito 'smīty abravīd vipraḥ sāpi svargaṃ jagāma ha /
GP11brahmppu:28443: māsamātreṇa sāyātā dadarśa taṃ kṛśaṃ dvijam // BrP_228.127 //
GP11brahmppu:28445: taṃ dṛṣṭvā niścayayutaṃ bhūtvā vṛddhavapus tataḥ // BrP_228.128 //
GP11brahmppu:28447: ghṛtena madhunā caiva nadīṃ matsyodarīṃ gatā // BrP_228.129 //
GP11brahmppu:28448: snātvātha bhūmau vasantī śakaṭaṃ ca yathārthataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28449: taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ samāhūya vākyam āha sulocanā // BrP_228.130 //
GP11brahmppu:28451: mayā tīvraṃ vrataṃ vipra cīrṇaṃ saubhāgyakāraṇāt /
GP11brahmppu:28452: vratānte niṣkṛtiṃ dadyāṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bho dvija // BrP_228.131 //
GP11brahmppu:28454: sa prāha kim idaṃ loke dīyate śarkarāvṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28455: kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhaḥ pṛcchāmi sādhu bhadre samīraya // BrP_228.132 //
GP11brahmppu:28457: imaṃ tvaṃ samupādāya prāṇaṃ tarpaya mā ciram // BrP_228.133 //
GP11brahmppu:28458: sa tac chrutvātha saṃsmṛtya kṣudhayā pīḍito 'pi san /
GP11brahmppu:28459: prāha bhadre na gṛhṇāmi niyamo hi kṛto mayā // BrP_228.134 //
GP11brahmppu:28460: purataḥ siddhavargasya na bhokṣye śakaṭaṃ tv iti /
GP11brahmppu:28462: sābravīn niyamo bhadra kṛtaḥ kāṣṭhamaye tvayā /
GP11brahmppu:28463: nāsau kāṣṭhamayo bhuṅkṣva kṣudhayā cātipīḍitaḥ // BrP_228.136 //
GP11brahmppu:28464: tāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuvāca na mayā tad viśeṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:28465: kṛtaṃ bhadre 'tha niyamaḥ sāmānyenaiva me kṛtaḥ // BrP_228.137 //
GP11brahmppu:28466: taṃ bhūyaḥ prāha sā tanvī na ced bhokṣyasi brāhmaṇa /
GP11brahmppu:28467: gṛhaṃ gṛhītvā gacchasva kuṭumbaṃ tava bhokṣyati // BrP_228.138 //
GP11brahmppu:28468: sa tām uvāca sudati na tāvad yāmi mandiram /
GP11brahmppu:28469: ihāyātā varārohā trailokye 'py adhikā guṇaiḥ // BrP_228.139 //
GP11brahmppu:28471: sthīyatāṃ kṣaṇam ity evaṃ sthāsyāmīti mayoditam // BrP_228.140 //
GP11brahmppu:28472: māsamātraṃ gatāyās tu tasyā bhadre sthitasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:28474: tasya sā vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛtvā svaṃ rūpam uttamam /
GP11brahmppu:28475: vihasya bhāvagambhīram urvaśī prāha taṃ dvijam // BrP_228.142 //
GP11brahmppu:28477: sādhu satyaṃ tvayā vipra vrataṃ niṣṭhitacetasā /
GP11brahmppu:28478: niṣpāditaṃ haṭhād eva mama darśanam icchatā // BrP_228.143 //
GP11brahmppu:28479: aham evorvaśī vipra tvāṃ jijñāsārtham āgatā /
GP11brahmppu:28480: parīkṣito niścitavān bhavān satyatapā ṛṣiḥ // BrP_228.144 //
GP11brahmppu:28482: siddhiṃ yāsyasi viprendra tatas tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi // BrP_228.145 //
GP11brahmppu:28484: ity uktvā divam utpatya sā jagāmorvaśī dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28485: sa ca satyatapā vipro rūpatīrthaṃ jagāma ha // BrP_228.146 //
GP11brahmppu:28487: dehotsarge jagāmāsau gāndharvaṃ lokam uttamam // BrP_228.147 //
GP11brahmppu:28491: putreṣu rājyaṃ nikṣipya yayau śaukaravaṃ punaḥ // BrP_228.149 //
GP11brahmppu:28493: tatra manvantaraśataṃ bhogān bhuktvā tataś cyutaḥ // BrP_228.150 //
GP11brahmppu:28495: babhūva tatra corvaśyāḥ saṃgamāya tapodhanāḥ // BrP_228.151 //
GP11brahmppu:28497: tīrthe prasiddhe sa hi rūpasaṃjñe BrP_228.152b
GP11brahmppu:28498: ārādhya janmany atha cārcya viṣṇum BrP_228.152c
GP11brahmppu:28499: avāpya bhogān atha muktim eti BrP_228.152d
GP11brahmppu:28502: kṛṣṇasya yena cāṇḍālo gato 'sau paramāṃ gatim // BrP_229.1 //
GP11brahmppu:28503: yathā viṣṇau bhaved bhaktis tan no brūhi mahāmate /
GP11brahmppu:28504: tapasā karmaṇā yena śrotum icchāma sāṃpratam // BrP_229.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28507: yathā kṛṣṇe bhaved bhaktiḥ puruṣasya mahāphalā // BrP_229.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28511: kathaṃcil labhate janma dehī mānuṣyakaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_229.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28513: vivekād dharmabuddhis tu buddhyā tu śreyasāṃ grahaḥ // BrP_229.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28514: yāvat pāpakṣayaṃ puṃsāṃ na bhavej janma saṃcitam /
GP11brahmppu:28515: tāvan na jāyate bhaktir vāsudeve jaganmaye // BrP_229.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28516: tasmād vakṣyāmi bho viprā bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe yathā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:28517: anyadeveṣu yā bhaktiḥ puruṣasyeha jāyate // BrP_229.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28519: tena tasya bhaved bhaktir yajane munisattamāḥ // BrP_229.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28520: sa karoti tato viprā bhaktiṃ cāgneḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28521: tuṣṭe hutāśane tasya bhaktir bhavati bhāskare // BrP_229.10 //
GP11brahmppu:28522: pūjāṃ karoti satatam ādityasya tato dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28523: prasanne bhāskare tasya bhaktir bhavati śaṃkare // BrP_229.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28524: pūjāṃ karoti vidhivat sa tu śaṃbhoḥ prayatnataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28525: tuṣṭe trilocane tasya bhaktir bhavati keśave // BrP_229.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28527: tato bhuktiṃ ca muktiṃ ca sa prāpnoti dvijottamāḥ // BrP_229.13 //
GP11brahmppu:28529: avaiṣṇavā narā ye tu dṛśyante ca mahāmune /
GP11brahmppu:28530: kiṃ te viṣṇuṃ nārcayanti brūhi tatkāraṇaṃ dvija // BrP_229.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28533: āsuraś ca tathā daivaḥ purā sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā // BrP_229.15 //
GP11brahmppu:28535: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā dūṣayanti narā harim // BrP_229.16 //
GP11brahmppu:28536: māyayā hatavijñānā viṣṇos te tu narādhamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28537: aprāpya taṃ hariṃ viprās tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim // BrP_229.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28538: tasya yā gahvarī māyā durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28541: icchāmas tāṃ mahāmāyāṃ jñātuṃ viṣṇoḥ sudustarām /
GP11brahmppu:28542: vaktum arhasi dharmajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // BrP_229.19 //
GP11brahmppu:28545: kaḥ śaknoti harer māyāṃ jñātuṃ tāṃ keśavād ṛte // BrP_229.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28546: yā vṛttā brāhmaṇasyāsīn māyārthe nāradasya ca /
GP11brahmppu:28547: viḍambanāṃ tu tāṃ viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama // BrP_229.21 //
GP11brahmppu:28548: prāg āsīn nṛpatiḥ śrīmān āgnīdhra iti viśrutaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28549: nagare kāmadamanas tasyātha tanayaḥ śuciḥ // BrP_229.22 //
GP11brahmppu:28552: pitāsya tv akarod yatnaṃ vivāhāya na caicchata /
GP11brahmppu:28553: taṃ pitā prāha kim iti necchase dārasaṃgraham // BrP_229.24 //
GP11brahmppu:28554: sarvam etat sukhārthaṃ hi vāñchanti manujāḥ kila /
GP11brahmppu:28555: sukhamūlā hi dārāś ca tasmāt taṃ tvaṃ samācara // BrP_229.25 //
GP11brahmppu:28556: sa pitur vacanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm āste ca gauravāt /
GP11brahmppu:28557: muhur muhus taṃ ca pitā codayām āsa bho dvijāḥ // BrP_229.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28559: mayā samāśritā vyaktā vaiṣṇavī paripālinī // BrP_229.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28560: taṃ pitā prāha saṃgamya naiṣa dharmo 'sti putraka /
GP11brahmppu:28561: na vidhārayitavyā syāt puruṣeṇa vipaścitā // BrP_229.28 //
GP11brahmppu:28562: kuru madvacanaṃ putra prabhur asmi pitā tava /
GP11brahmppu:28563: mā nimajja kulaṃ mahyaṃ narake saṃtatikṣayāt // BrP_229.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28564: sa hi taṃ pitur ādeśaṃ śrutvā prāha suto vaśī /
GP11brahmppu:28565: prītaḥ saṃsmṛtya paurāṇīṃ saṃsārasya vicitratām // BrP_229.30 //
GP11brahmppu:28567: śṛṇu tāta vaco mahyaṃ tattvavākyaṃ sahetukam /
GP11brahmppu:28568: nāmānurūpaṃ kartavyaṃ satyaṃ bhavati pārthiva // BrP_229.31 //
GP11brahmppu:28570: prāptāni dārasaṃyoga- viyogāni ca sarvaśaḥ // BrP_229.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28575: nadīśvarasahasraṃ ca prāptaṃ tāta punaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28576: sṛṣṭas tu bahuśaḥ sṛṣṭau saṃhāre cāpi saṃhṛtaḥ // BrP_229.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28578: itas tṛtīye yad vṛttaṃ mama janmani tac chṛṇu /
GP11brahmppu:28583: jāto hi vaṃśe sutapā maharṣiḥ BrP_229.37d
GP11brahmppu:28584: tato mahābhūd acalā hi bhaktir BrP_229.38a
GP11brahmppu:28591: varo hi yaṃ vāñchasi taṃ pradāsye BrP_229.39d
GP11brahmppu:28593: tuṣṭo 'si cet keśava tad vṛṇomi BrP_229.40b
GP11brahmppu:28594: yā sā tvadīyā paramā hi māyā BrP_229.40c
GP11brahmppu:28597: kiṃ te tayā brahman māyayā vai BrP_229.41b
GP11brahmppu:28600: tato murāriṃ punar uktavān ahaṃ BrP_229.42a
GP11brahmppu:28602: māyā tavemām iha vettum icche BrP_229.42c
GP11brahmppu:28605: śrīśaḥ prabhur viṣṇur idaṃ vaco me BrP_229.43b
GP11brahmppu:28607: māyāṃ madīyāṃ nahi vetti kaścin BrP_229.43c
GP11brahmppu:28608: na cāpi vā vetsyati kaścid eva BrP_229.43d
GP11brahmppu:28613: varaṃ ca dattaṃ gatavān ahaṃ ca BrP_229.45a
GP11brahmppu:28614: sa cāpi vavre varam etad eva BrP_229.45b
GP11brahmppu:28616: bhavān yathaivaṃ vṛtavān varaṃ ca BrP_229.45d
GP11brahmppu:28618: māyāṃ hi me vetsyasi saṃnimagnaḥ BrP_229.46b
GP11brahmppu:28637: bhartur bale tatra pitur bale ca BrP_229.51a
GP11brahmppu:28641: bhartāram eṣā pitaraṃ ca gṛhya BrP_229.52a
GP11brahmppu:28643: kṛtvā hutāśaṃ pradadau svayaṃ ca BrP_229.52c
GP11brahmppu:28646: dhā putra hā putra iti bruvāṇā BrP_229.53b
GP11brahmppu:28647: tadā punaḥ sā munir nārado 'bhūt BrP_229.53c
GP11brahmppu:28652: kas te tu putro vada me maharṣe BrP_229.55a
GP11brahmppu:28653: mṛtaṃ ca kaṃ śocasi naṣṭabuddhiḥ BrP_229.55b
GP11brahmppu:28655: tato 'ham enaṃ punar eva cāha BrP_229.55d
GP11brahmppu:28661: uvāca bhaktiṃ mama dehi viṣṇo BrP_229.57b
GP11brahmppu:28663: sadā ca saṃdarśanam īśa te 'stu BrP_229.57d
GP11brahmppu:28664: yatrāham ārtaś citim adya rūḍhas BrP_229.58a
GP11brahmppu:28669: tīrthaṃ sitode hi citis tavāstu BrP_229.59b
GP11brahmppu:28670: sthāsyāmy ahaṃ cātra sadaiva viṣṇur BrP_229.59c
GP11brahmppu:28679: khyātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca bhaviṣyate tat BrP_229.61d
GP11brahmppu:28682: na caiva tasmin dvija saṃpracakṣate BrP_229.62c
GP11brahmppu:28683: tat kṣetram ugraṃ tv atha brahmavadhyā BrP_229.62d
GP11brahmppu:28688: kṛtvā tu pāpāni naro mahānti BrP_229.64a
GP11brahmppu:28690: yadā tu māṃ cintayate sa śuddhaḥ BrP_229.64c
GP11brahmppu:28697: rudro hitaṃ tārakam asya kīrtayet BrP_229.66b
GP11brahmppu:28698: ity evam uktvā dvijavarya nāradaṃ BrP_229.66c
GP11brahmppu:28700: sa cāpi vipras tridivaṃ cacāra BrP_229.67a
GP11brahmppu:28703: māyā madīyā nahi śakyate sā BrP_229.67d
GP11brahmppu:28704: jñātuṃ bhavān icchati cet tato 'dya BrP_229.68a
GP11brahmppu:28705: evaṃ viśasvāpsu ca vetsi yena BrP_229.68b
GP11brahmppu:28708: kokāmukhe tāta tato hi kanyā BrP_229.69a
GP11brahmppu:28714: patir na tasyā hi mato babhūva BrP_229.70c
GP11brahmppu:28717: kanyā ca paścād badhirā tathānyā BrP_229.71b
GP11brahmppu:28718: patir daridras tv atha sāpi mugdhā BrP_229.71c
GP11brahmppu:28721: sāntar jalaṃ snātum atha praviṣṭā BrP_229.72b
GP11brahmppu:28722: yāvad dvijo 'sau punar eva tāvaj BrP_229.72c
GP11brahmppu:28726: dadarśa kumbhaṃ na ca tāṃ taṭasthāṃ BrP_229.73c
GP11brahmppu:28730: te vai rudantaṃ pitaraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā BrP_229.74c
GP11brahmppu:28733: dvijān bhavadbhir yadi yoṣid ekā BrP_229.75b
GP11brahmppu:28735: ākhyāta te procur imāṃ praviṣṭā BrP_229.75d
GP11brahmppu:28736: nadīṃ na bhūyas tu samuttatāra BrP_229.76a
GP11brahmppu:28740: taṃ vai rudantaṃ sasutaṃ sakanyaṃ BrP_229.77a
GP11brahmppu:28742: ārtiś ca me 'bhūd atha saṃsmṛtiś ca BrP_229.77c
GP11brahmppu:28745: kimartham ārtena hi rudyate tvayā BrP_229.78b
GP11brahmppu:28747: ākranditeneha vṛthā hi kiṃ te BrP_229.78d
GP11brahmppu:28752: ity evam uktvā sa sutaiś ca sārdhaṃ BrP_229.80a
GP11brahmppu:28753: phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya ca roditi sma BrP_229.80b
GP11brahmppu:28754: yathā yathā roditi sa śvapākas BrP_229.80c
GP11brahmppu:28755: tathā tathā me hy abhavat kṛtāpi BrP_229.80d
GP11brahmppu:28756: tato 'ham ārtaṃ tu nivārya taṃ vai BrP_229.81a
GP11brahmppu:28758: tataḥ sa duḥkhāt saha putrakaiḥ BrP_229.81c
GP11brahmppu:28764: tasmin praviṣṭe salile mṛte ca BrP_229.83a
GP11brahmppu:28767: jale praviṣṭas tridivaṃ gataś ca BrP_229.83d
GP11brahmppu:28774: tasmāc cyutas tvadbhavane ca jāto BrP_229.85c
GP11brahmppu:28778: ity evam uktvā pitaraṃ praṇamya BrP_229.86c
GP11brahmppu:28784: tyaktvā tanuṃ doṣamayīṃ tatas tu BrP_229.87c
GP11brahmppu:28789: yayā jagan moham upaiti viprāḥ BrP_229.88d
GP11brahmppu:28791: asmābhis tu śrutaṃ vyāsa yat tvayā samudāhṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:28792: prādurbhāvāśritaṃ puṇyaṃ māyā viṣṇoś ca durvidā // BrP_230.1 //
GP11brahmppu:28794: mahāpralayasaṃjñāṃ ca kalpānte ca mahāmune // BrP_230.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28797: kalpānte prākṛte caiva pralaye jāyate yathā // BrP_230.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28800: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti caturyugam /
GP11brahmppu:28801: daivair varṣasahasrais tu tad dvādaśābhir ucyate // BrP_230.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28803: ādyaṃ kṛtayugaṃ proktaṃ munayo 'ntyaṃ tathā kalim // BrP_230.6 //
GP11brahmppu:28804: ādye kṛtayuge sargo brahmaṇā kriyate yataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28805: kriyate copasaṃhāras tathānte 'pi kalau yuge // BrP_230.7 //
GP11brahmppu:28807: kaleḥ svarūpaṃ bhagavan vistarād vaktum arhasi /
GP11brahmppu:28808: dharmaś catuṣpād bhagavān yasmin vaikalyam ṛcchati // BrP_230.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28810: kalisvarūpaṃ bho viprā yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28811: nibodhadhvaṃ samāsena vartate yan mahattaram // BrP_230.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28814: vivāhā na kalau dharmā na śiṣyā gurusaṃsthitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28815: na putrā dhārmikāś caiva na ca vahnikriyākramaḥ // BrP_230.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28816: yatra tatra kule jāto balī sarveśvaraḥ kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28817: sarvebhya eva varṇebhyo naraḥ kanyopajīvanaḥ // BrP_230.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28818: yena tenaiva yogena dvijātir dīkṣitaḥ kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28819: yaiva saiva ca viprendrāḥ prāyaścittakriyā kalau // BrP_230.13 //
GP11brahmppu:28820: sarvam eva kalau śāstraṃ yasya yad vacanaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28821: devatāś ca kalau sarvāḥ sarvaḥ sarvasya cāśramaḥ // BrP_230.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28824: vittena bhavitā puṃsāṃ svalpenaiva madaḥ kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28825: strīṇāṃ rūpamadaś caiva keśair eva bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.16 //
GP11brahmppu:28827: kalau striyo bhaviṣyanti tadā keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ // BrP_230.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28829: bhartā bhaviṣyati kalau vittavān eva yoṣitām // BrP_230.18 //
GP11brahmppu:28830: yo yo dadāti bahulaṃ sa sa svāmī tadā nṛṇām /
GP11brahmppu:28832: gṛhāntā dravyasaṃghātā dravyāntā ca tathā matiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28833: arthāś cāthopabhogāntā bhaviṣyanti tadā kalau // BrP_230.20 //
GP11brahmppu:28838: sadā sapauruṣaṃ ceto bhāvi vipra tadā kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28839: kṣīrapradānasaṃbandhi bhāti goṣu ca gauravam // BrP_230.23 //
GP11brahmppu:28844: durbhikṣam eva satataṃ sadā kleśam anīśvarāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28845: prāpsyanti vyāhatasukhaṃ pramādān mānavāḥ kalau // BrP_230.26 //
GP11brahmppu:28847: kariṣyanti kalau prāpte na ca piṇḍodakakriyām // BrP_230.27 //
GP11brahmppu:28849: bahuprajālpabhāgyāś ca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ // BrP_230.28 //
GP11brahmppu:28851: kurvatyo gurubhartṝṇām ājñāṃ bhetsyanty anāvṛtāḥ // BrP_230.29 //
GP11brahmppu:28857: gṛhasthāś ca na hoṣyanti na dāsyanty ucitāny api // BrP_230.32 //
GP11brahmppu:28859: bhikṣavaś cāpi putrā hi snehasaṃbandhayantrakāḥ // BrP_230.33 //
GP11brahmppu:28861: hāriṇo janavittānāṃ saṃprāpte ca kalau yuge // BrP_230.34 //
GP11brahmppu:28862: yo yo 'śvarathanāgāḍhyaḥ sa sa rājā bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:28863: yaś ca yaś cābalaḥ sarvaḥ sa sa bhṛtyaḥ kalau yuge // BrP_230.35 //
GP11brahmppu:28870: vedamārge pralīne ca pākhaṇḍāḍhye tato jane /
GP11brahmppu:28871: adharmavṛddhyā lokānām alpam āyur bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.39 //
GP11brahmppu:28877: na jīviṣyati vai kaścit kalau varṣāṇi viṃśatim // BrP_230.42 //
GP11brahmppu:28879: yatas tato vinaśyanti kālenālpena mānavāḥ // BrP_230.43 //
GP11brahmppu:28880: yadā yadā hi pākhaṇḍa- vṛttir atropalakṣyate /
GP11brahmppu:28881: tadā tadā kaler vṛddhir anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BrP_230.44 //
GP11brahmppu:28883: tadā tadā kaler vṛddhir anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BrP_230.45 //
GP11brahmppu:28885: tadānumeyaṃ prādhānyaṃ kaler viprā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BrP_230.46 //
GP11brahmppu:28886: yadā yadā na yajñānām īśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28887: ijyate puruṣair yajñais tadā jñeyaṃ kaler balam // BrP_230.47 //
GP11brahmppu:28888: na prītir vedavādeṣu pākhaṇḍeṣu yadā ratiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28889: kaler vṛddhis tadā prājñair anumeyā dvijottamāḥ // BrP_230.48 //
GP11brahmppu:28891: nārcayiṣyanti bho viprāḥ pākhaṇḍopahatā narāḥ // BrP_230.49 //
GP11brahmppu:28892: kiṃ devaiḥ kiṃ dvijair vedaiḥ kiṃ śaucenāmbujalpanā /
GP11brahmppu:28893: ity evaṃ pralapiṣyanti pākhaṇḍopahatā narāḥ // BrP_230.50 //
GP11brahmppu:28894: alpavṛṣṭiś ca parjanyaḥ svalpaṃ sasyaphalaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:28895: phalaṃ tathālpasāraṃ ca viprāḥ prāpte kalau yuge // BrP_230.51 //
GP11brahmppu:28897: śūdraprāyās tathā varṇā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // BrP_230.52 //
GP11brahmppu:28899: bhaviṣyati kalau prāpta auśīraṃ cānulepanam // BrP_230.53 //
GP11brahmppu:28902: kasya mātā pitā kasya yadā karmātmakaḥ pumān /
GP11brahmppu:28905: narāḥ pāpāny anudinaṃ kariṣyanty alpamedhasaḥ // BrP_230.56 //
GP11brahmppu:28907: yad yad duḥkhāya tat sarvaṃ kalikāle bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.57 //
GP11brahmppu:28909: tadā praviralo vipraḥ kaścil loke bhaviṣyati // BrP_230.58 //
GP11brahmppu:28911: karoti yaḥ kṛtayuge kriyate tapasā hi yaḥ // BrP_230.59 //
GP11brahmppu:28914: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa śrotuṃ vāñchā pravartate // BrP_230.60 //
GP11brahmppu:28916: dhanye kalau bhaved viprās tv alpakleśair mahat phalam /
GP11brahmppu:28917: tathā bhavetāṃ strīśūdrau dhanyau cānyan nibodhata // BrP_230.61 //
GP11brahmppu:28918: yat kṛte daśabhir varṣais tretāyāṃ hāyanena tat /
GP11brahmppu:28919: dvāpare tac ca māsena ahorātreṇa tat kalau // BrP_230.62 //
GP11brahmppu:28920: tapaso brahmacaryasya japādeś ca phalaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28921: prāpnoti puruṣas tena kalau sādhv iti bhāṣitum // BrP_230.63 //
GP11brahmppu:28922: dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñais tretāyāṃ dvāpare 'rcayan /
GP11brahmppu:28923: yad āpnoti tad āpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // BrP_230.64 //
GP11brahmppu:28925: svalpāyāsena dharmajñās tena tuṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ kalau // BrP_230.65 //
GP11brahmppu:28927: tatas tu dharmasaṃprāptair yaṣṭavyaṃ vidhivad dhanaiḥ // BrP_230.66 //
GP11brahmppu:28928: vṛthā kathā vṛthā bhojyaṃ vṛthā svaṃ ca dvijanmanām /
GP11brahmppu:28929: patanāya tathā bhāvyaṃ tais tu saṃyatibhiḥ saha // BrP_230.67 //
GP11brahmppu:28932: pāratantryāt samasteṣu teṣāṃ kāryeṣu vai tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28933: lokān kleśena mahatā yajanti vinayānvitāḥ // BrP_230.69 //
GP11brahmppu:28935: nijaṃ jayati vai lokaṃ śūdro dhanyataras tataḥ // BrP_230.70 //
GP11brahmppu:28936: bhakṣyābhakṣyeṣu nāśāsti yeṣāṃ pāpeṣu vā yataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28937: niyamo muniśārdūlās tenāsau sādhv itīritam // BrP_230.71 //
GP11brahmppu:28939: pratipādanīyaṃ pātreṣu yaṣṭavyaṃ ca yathāvidhi // BrP_230.72 //
GP11brahmppu:28941: tathā sadviniyogāya vijñeyaṃ gahanaṃ nṛṇām // BrP_230.73 //
GP11brahmppu:28942: ebhir anyais tathā kleśaiḥ puruṣā dvijasattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28943: nijāñ jayanti vai lokān prājāpatyādikān kramāt // BrP_230.74 //
GP11brahmppu:28944: yoṣic chuśrūṣaṇād bhartuḥ karmaṇā manasā girā /
GP11brahmppu:28945: etad viṣayam āpnoti tatsālokyaṃ yato dvijāḥ // BrP_230.75 //
GP11brahmppu:28946: nātikleśena mahatā tān eva puruṣo yathā /
GP11brahmppu:28947: tṛtīyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ tena mayā sādhv iti yoṣitaḥ // BrP_230.76 //
GP11brahmppu:28948: etad vaḥ kathitaṃ viprā yannimittam ihāgatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28949: tat pṛcchadhvaṃ yathākāmam ahaṃ vakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam // BrP_230.77 //
GP11brahmppu:28950: alpenaiva prayatnena dharmaḥ sidhyati vai kalau /
GP11brahmppu:28953: tathā strībhir anāyāsāt patiśuśrūṣayaiva hi // BrP_230.79 //
GP11brahmppu:28954: tatas tritayam apy etan mama dhanyatamaṃ matam /
GP11brahmppu:28956: tathā svalpena tapasā siddhiṃ yāsyanti mānavāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:28957: dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti yugānte munisattamāḥ // BrP_230.81 //
GP11brahmppu:28958: bhavadbhir yad abhipretaṃ tad etat kathitaṃ mayā /
GP11brahmppu:28959: apṛṣṭenāpi dharmajñāḥ kim anyat kriyatāṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_230.82 //
GP11brahmppu:28961: āsannaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ vā yadi kālaṃ na vidmahe /
GP11brahmppu:28963: prāptā vayaṃ hi tat kālam anayā dharmatṛṣṇayā /
GP11brahmppu:28964: ādadyāma paraṃ dharmaṃ sukham alpena karmaṇā // BrP_231.2 //
GP11brahmppu:28966: pranaṣṭadharmaṃ dharmajña nimittair vaktum arhasi // BrP_231.3 //
GP11brahmppu:28971: śūdrāś ca brāhmaṇācārā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.5 //
GP11brahmppu:28972: śrotriyāḥ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhāś ca niṣkarmāṇi havīṃṣi ca /
GP11brahmppu:28977: bhṛtyā hy anirdiṣṭabhujo bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.8 //
GP11brahmppu:28979: akutsanā ca patite bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // BrP_231.9 //
GP11brahmppu:28981: ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣāś ca prasoṣyanti tathā striyaḥ // BrP_231.10 //
GP11brahmppu:28983: pramadāḥ keśaśūlāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.11 //
GP11brahmppu:28985: śūdrābhā vādinaś caiva brāhmaṇāś cāntyavāsinaḥ // BrP_231.12 //
GP11brahmppu:28989: sādhūnāṃ parivṛttiś ca vidyād antagate yuge // BrP_231.14 //
GP11brahmppu:28991: nirhrīkāś ca prajāḥ sarvā naṣṭās tatra yugakṣaye // BrP_231.15 //
GP11brahmppu:28993: ṛtavo viparītāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.16 //
GP11brahmppu:28995: citravarṣī ca parjanyo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.17 //
GP11brahmppu:28996: sarve śūrakule jātāḥ kṣamānāthā bhavanti hi /
GP11brahmppu:28997: yathā nimnāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.18 //
