GP11brahmppu:28999: na ca dharmaṃ cariṣyanti mānavā nirgate yuge // BrP_231.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29001: sarve ... vāṇikāś caiva bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29004: saukumārye tathā rūpe ratne copakṣayaṃ gate /
GP11brahmppu:29005: bhaviṣyanti yugasyānte nāryaḥ keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ // BrP_231.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29007: yugānte samanuprāpte nānyā bhāryāsamā ratiḥ // BrP_231.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29009: puruṣālpaṃ bahustrīkaṃ tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29013: aśīlāḥ sukhino loke bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29015: saṃdigdhaḥ paralokaś ca bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // BrP_231.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29017: yugāpakramaṇe pūrvaṃ bhaviṣyanti na bāndhavāḥ // BrP_231.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29019: ṛṇaṃ savinayabhraṃśaṃ yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29020: bhaviṣyaty aphalo harṣaḥ krodhaś ca saphalo nṛṇām /
GP11brahmppu:29021: ajāś cāpi nirotsyanti payaso 'rthe yugakṣaye // BrP_231.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29025: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ vijānāti vṛddhān anupasevya vai // BrP_231.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29026: na kaścid akavir nāma yugānte samupasthite /
GP11brahmppu:29027: nakṣatrāṇi viyogāni na karmasthā dvijātayaḥ // BrP_231.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29031: yājayiṣyanty ayājyāṃs tu tathābhakṣyasya bhakṣiṇaḥ // BrP_231.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29033: bhoḥśabdam abhidhāsyanti na ca kaścit paṭhiṣyati // BrP_231.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29035: nakṣatrāṇi vivarṇāni viparitā diśo daśa // BrP_231.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29037: preṣayanti pitṝn putrā vadhūḥ śvaśrūḥ svakarmasu // BrP_231.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29038: yugeṣv evaṃ nivatsyanti pramadāś ca narās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29040: bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca bhokṣyanti puruṣāḥ svayam /
GP11brahmppu:29041: vañcayitvā patīn suptān gamiṣyanti striyo 'nyataḥ // BrP_231.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29042: na vyādhitān nāpy arūpān nodyatān nāpy asūyakān /
GP11brahmppu:29043: kṛte na pratikartā ca yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29048: kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // BrP_231.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29050: ata ūrdhvaṃ cyute dharme guṇahīnāḥ prajās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29051: śīlavyasanam āsādya prāpsyanti hrāsam āyuṣaḥ // BrP_231.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29055: evaṃ gatvā parāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // BrP_231.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29057: kiṃdharmaśīlāḥ kecit tu kecid atra kutūhalāḥ // BrP_231.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29058: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca pramāṇam iti niścitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29059: apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti sarvam ity apare janāḥ // BrP_231.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29061: bhaviṣyanti narā mūḍhā dvijāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // BrP_231.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29063: dāmbhikās te bhaviṣyanti narā jñānavilopitāḥ // BrP_231.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29067: bhaviṣyanti tadā loke tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29069: siddhim alpena kālena prāpsyanti nirupaskṛtāḥ // BrP_231.53 //
GP11brahmppu:29070: viprāṇāṃ śāśvatīṃ vṛttiṃ yadā varṇāvare janāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29071: saṃśrayiṣyanti bho viprās tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.54 //
GP11brahmppu:29073: bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // BrP_231.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29079: vyavahāropavṛttāś ca cyutā dharmāś ca śāśvatāt // BrP_231.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29082: teṣu prabhavamāṇeṣu janeṣv api ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29084: kalau yuge samutpannāḥ pradhānapuruṣāś ca ye /
GP11brahmppu:29085: kathāyogena tān sarvān pūjayiṣyanti mānavāḥ // BrP_231.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29087: bhokṣyabhojyaharāś caiva karaṇḍānāṃ ca hāriṇaḥ // BrP_231.62 //
GP11brahmppu:29088: caurāś caurasya hartāro hantā hantur bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:29089: cauraiś caurakṣaye cāpi kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati // BrP_231.63 //
GP11brahmppu:29094: kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ sāmagryaṃ caiva bandhuṣu /
GP11brahmppu:29095: uddeśeṣu narāḥ śreṣṭhā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // BrP_231.66 //
GP11brahmppu:29097: maṇḍalaiḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti deśe deśe pṛthak pṛthak // BrP_231.67 //
GP11brahmppu:29099: narāḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti tadā kālaparikṣayāt // BrP_231.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29100: tataḥ sarve samādāya kumārān pradrutā bhayāt /
GP11brahmppu:29102: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kāśmīrān atha kośalān /
GP11brahmppu:29104: kṛtsnaṃ ca himavatpārśvaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāmbhasaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29105: vividhaṃ jīrṇapattraṃ ca valkalāny ajināni ca // BrP_231.71 //
GP11brahmppu:29106: svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti tasmin bhūte yugakṣaye /
GP11brahmppu:29107: araṇyeṣu ca vatsyanti narā mlecchagaṇaiḥ saha // BrP_231.72 //
GP11brahmppu:29109: agoptāraś ca goptāro bhaviṣyanti narādhipāḥ // BrP_231.73 //
GP11brahmppu:29110: mṛgair matsyair vihaṃgaiś ca śvāpadaiḥ sarpakīṭakaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29113: svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti yathā munijanas tathā // BrP_231.75 //
GP11brahmppu:29115: ajaiḍakaṃ kharoṣṭraṃ ca pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ // BrP_231.76 //
GP11brahmppu:29121: hīnā hīnaṃ tathā dharmaṃ prajā samanuvatsyati // BrP_231.79 //
GP11brahmppu:29122: āyus tatra ca martyānāṃ paraṃ triṃśad bhaviṣyati /
GP11brahmppu:29129: kariṣyanti ca saṃskāraṃ svayaṃ ca kṣayapīḍitāḥ // BrP_231.83 //
GP11brahmppu:29131: tataḥ pādapravṛtte tu dharme śreyo nipatsyate // BrP_231.84 //
GP11brahmppu:29133: svādu kiṃ tv iti vijñāya dharma eva ca dṛśyate // BrP_231.85 //
GP11brahmppu:29134: yathā hānikramaṃ prāptās tathā ṛddhikramaṃ gatāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29135: pragṛhīte tato dharme prapaśyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // BrP_231.86 //
GP11brahmppu:29137: eka eva tu kālo 'yaṃ hīnavarṇo yathā śaśī // BrP_231.87 //
GP11brahmppu:29138: channaś ca tamasā somo yathā kaliyugaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29139: muktaś ca tamasā soma evaṃ kṛtayugaṃ ca tat // BrP_231.88 //
GP11brahmppu:29140: arthavādaḥ paraṃ brahma vedārtha iti taṃ viduḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29141: aviviktam avijñātaṃ dāyādyam iha dhāryate // BrP_231.89 //
GP11brahmppu:29142: iṣṭavādas tapo nāma tapo hi sthavirīkṛtaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29143: guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir guṇāḥ śudhyanti karmaṇā // BrP_231.90 //
GP11brahmppu:29145: yuge yuge yathākālam ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā // BrP_231.91 //
GP11brahmppu:29147: āśiṣaś ca śivāḥ puṇyās tathaivāyur yuge yuge // BrP_231.92 //
GP11brahmppu:29156: ātyantiko vai mokṣaś ca prākṛto dviparārdhikaḥ // BrP_232.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29161: sthānāt sthānaṃ daśaguṇam ekaikaṃ gaṇyate dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29163: parārdhaṃ dviguṇaṃ yat tu prākṛtaḥ sa layo dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29164: tadāvyakte 'khilaṃ vyaktaṃ sahetau layam eti vai // BrP_232.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29166: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśat kāṣṭhās tathā kalā // BrP_232.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29167: nāḍikā tu pramāṇena kalā ca daśa pañca ca /
GP11brahmppu:29168: unmānenāmbhasaḥ sā tu palāny ardhatrayodaśa // BrP_232.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29170: māgadhena pramāṇena jalaprasthas tu sa smṛtaḥ // BrP_232.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29172: ahorātraṃ muhūrtās tu triṃśan māso dinais tathā // BrP_232.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29173: māsair dvādaśabhir varṣam ahorātraṃ tu tad divi /
GP11brahmppu:29174: tribhir varṣaśatair varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭyā caivāsuradviṣām // BrP_232.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29176: caturyugasahasraṃ tu kathyate brahmaṇo dinam // BrP_232.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29177: sa kalpas tatra manavaś caturdaśa dvijottamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29178: tadante caiva bho viprā brahmanaimittiko layaḥ // BrP_232.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29179: tasya svarūpam atyugraṃ dvijendrā gadato mama /
GP11brahmppu:29180: śṛṇudhvaṃ prākṛtaṃ bhūyas tato vakṣyāmy ahaṃ layam // BrP_232.13 //
GP11brahmppu:29183: tato yāny alpasārāṇi tāni sattvāny anekaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29184: kṣayaṃ yānti muniśreṣṭhāḥ pārthivāny atipīḍanāt // BrP_232.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29185: tataḥ sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo rudrarūpī tathāvyayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29186: kṣayāya yatate kartum ātmasthāḥ sakalāḥ prajāḥ // BrP_232.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29187: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu /
GP11brahmppu:29188: sthitaḥ pibaty aśeṣāṇi jalāni munisattamāḥ // BrP_232.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29190: śoṣaṃ nayati bho viprāḥ samastaṃ pṛthivītalam // BrP_232.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29192: pātāleṣu ca yat toyaṃ tat sarvaṃ nayati kṣayam // BrP_232.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29194: sahasraraśmayaḥ sapta jāyante tatra bhāskarāḥ // BrP_232.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29195: adhaś cordhvaṃ ca te dīptās tataḥ sapta divākarāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29196: dahanty aśeṣaṃ trailokyaṃ sapātālatalaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_232.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29197: dahyamānaṃ tu tair dīptais trailokyaṃ dīptabhāskaraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29200: bhavaty eṣā ca vasudhā kūrmapṛṣṭhopamākṛtiḥ // BrP_232.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29203: pātālāni samastāni sa dagdhvā jvalano mahān /
GP11brahmppu:29204: bhūmim abhyetya sakalaṃ dagdhvā tu vasudhātalam // BrP_232.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29205: bhuvo lokaṃ tataḥ sarvaṃ svargalokaṃ ca dāruṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29210: hṛtāvakāśā gacchanti maharlokaṃ dvijās tadā // BrP_232.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29211: tasmād api mahātāpa- taptā lokās tataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:29212: gacchanti janalokaṃ te daśāvṛtyā paraiṣiṇaḥ // BrP_232.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29213: tato dagdhvā jagat sarvaṃ rudrarūpī janārdanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29216: uttiṣṭhanti tadā vyomni ghorāḥ saṃvartakā ghanāḥ // BrP_232.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29218: dhūmavarṇā ghanāḥ kecit kecit pītāḥ payodharāḥ // BrP_232.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29227: varṣantas te mahāsārās tam agnim atibhairavam /
GP11brahmppu:29229: naṣṭe cāgnau śataṃ te 'pi varṣāṇām adhikaṃ ghanāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29230: plāvayanto jagat sarvaṃ varṣanti munisattamāḥ // BrP_232.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29232: bhuvo lokaṃ tathaivordhvaṃ plāvayanti divaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_232.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29234: varṣanti te mahāmeghā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam // BrP_232.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29237: ekārṇavaṃ bhavaty etat trailokyam akhilaṃ tataḥ // BrP_233.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29238: atha niḥśvāsajo viṣṇor vāyus tāñ jaladāṃs tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29239: nāśaṃ nayati bho viprā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam // BrP_233.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29241: anādir ādir viśvasya pītvā vāyum aśeṣataḥ // BrP_233.3 //
GP11brahmppu:29243: brahmarūpadharaḥ śete bhagavān ādikṛd dhariḥ // BrP_233.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29249: nimittaṃ tatra yac chete brahmarūpadharo hariḥ // BrP_233.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29250: yadā jāgarti sarvātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat /
GP11brahmppu:29253: ekārṇavakṛte loke tāvatī rātrir ucyate // BrP_233.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29254: tataḥ prabuddho rātryante punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ karoty ajaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29255: brahmasvarūpadhṛg viṣṇur yathā vaḥ kathitaṃ purā // BrP_233.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29257: naimittiko vaḥ kathitaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ prākṛtaṃ param // BrP_233.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29259: samasteṣv eva lokeṣu pātāleṣv akhileṣu ca // BrP_233.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29262: āpo grasanti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmer gandhādikaṃ guṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29263: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayāya prakalpate // BrP_233.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29265: āpas tadā pravṛttās tu vegavatyo mahāsvanāḥ // BrP_233.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29268: apām api guṇo yas tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29269: naśyanty āpaḥ sutaptāś ca rasatanmātrasaṃkṣayāt // BrP_233.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29271: agnyavasthe tu salile tejasā sarvato vṛte // BrP_233.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29272: sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya ādatte taj jalaṃ tadā /
GP11brahmppu:29273: sarvam āpūryato cābhis tadā jagad idaṃ śanaiḥ // BrP_233.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29274: arcibhiḥ saṃtate tasmiṃs tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29275: jyotiṣo 'pi paraṃ rūpaṃ vāyur atti prabhākaram // BrP_233.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29278: praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahān /
GP11brahmppu:29279: nirāloke tadā loke vāyusaṃsthe ca tejasi // BrP_233.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29281: ūrdhvaṃ ca vāyus tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśa // BrP_233.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29282: vāyos tv api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29283: praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhaty anāvṛtam // BrP_233.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29285: sarvam āpūrayac caiva sumahat tat prakāśate // BrP_233.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29287: śabdamātraṃ tathākāśaṃ sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // BrP_233.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29288: tataḥ śabdaguṇaṃ tasya bhūtādir grasate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29289: bhūtendriyeṣu yugapad bhūtādau saṃsthiteṣu vai // BrP_233.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29290: abhimānātmako hy eṣa bhūtādis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29291: bhūtādiṃ grasate cāpi mahābuddhir vicakṣaṇā // BrP_233.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29292: urvī mahāṃś ca jagataḥ prānte 'ntar bāhyatas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29293: evaṃ sapta mahābuddhiḥ kramāt prakṛtayas tathā // BrP_233.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29294: pratyāhārais tu tāḥ sarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam /
GP11brahmppu:29295: yenedam āvṛtaṃ sarvam aṇḍam apsu pralīyate // BrP_233.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29297: udakāvaraṇaṃ hy atra jyotiṣā pīyate tu tat // BrP_233.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29298: jyotir vāyau layaṃ yāti yāty ākāśe samīraṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29299: ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādir grasate taṃ tathā mahān // BrP_233.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29300: mahāntam ebhiḥ sahitaṃ prakṛtir grasate dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29301: guṇasāmyam anudriktam anyūnaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // BrP_233.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29302: procyate prakṛtir hetuḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ param /
GP11brahmppu:29303: ity eṣā prakṛtiḥ sarvā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī // BrP_233.34 //
GP11brahmppu:29305: ekaḥ śuddho 'kṣaro nityaḥ sarvavyāpī tathā punaḥ // BrP_233.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29309: sa brahma tat paraṃ dhāma paramātmā pareśvaraḥ // BrP_233.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29310: sa viṣṇuḥ sarvam evedaṃ yato nāvartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29312: puruṣaś cāpy ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29313: paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ // BrP_233.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29314: viṣṇunāmnā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate /
GP11brahmppu:29315: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // BrP_233.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29316: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ puruṣair yajñamūrtiḥ sa ijyate /
GP11brahmppu:29317: ṛgyajuḥsāmabhir mārgaiḥ pravṛttair ijyate hy asau // BrP_233.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29319: jñānātmā jñānayogena jñānamūrtiḥ sa ijyate // BrP_233.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29321: hrasvadīrghaplutair yat tu kiṃcid vastv abhidhīyate // BrP_233.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29322: yac ca vācām aviṣayas tat sarvaṃ viṣṇur avyayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29323: vyaktaḥ sa evam avyaktaḥ sa eva puruṣo 'vyayaḥ // BrP_233.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29325: vyaktāvyaktātmikā tasmin prakṛtiḥ sā vilīyate // BrP_233.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29326: puruṣaś cāpi bho viprā yas tad avyākṛtātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29327: dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā dvijāḥ // BrP_233.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29328: tad ahas tasya viprendrā viṣṇor īśasya kathyate /
GP11brahmppu:29329: vyakte tu prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā // BrP_233.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29331: naivāhas tasya ca niśā nityasya paramātmanaḥ // BrP_233.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29332: upacārāt tathāpy etat tasyeśasya tu kathyate /
GP11brahmppu:29333: ity eṣa muniśārdūlāḥ kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ // BrP_233.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29335: ādhyātmikādi bho viprā jñātvā tāpatrayaṃ budhaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29338: śārīro bahubhir bhedair bhidyate śrūyatāṃ ca saḥ // BrP_234.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29342: bhidyate dehajas tāpo mānasaṃ śrotum arhatha // BrP_234.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29346: ity evamādibhir bhedais tāpo hy ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_234.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29348: sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ janyate cādhibhautikaḥ // BrP_234.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29352: duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattamāḥ // BrP_234.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29364: kleśair niṣkrāntim āpnoti jaṭharān mātur āturaḥ // BrP_234.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29366: vijñānabhraṃśam āpnoti jātas tu munisattamāḥ // BrP_234.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29367: kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29368: pūtivraṇān nipatito dharaṇyāṃ krimiko yathā // BrP_234.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29376: na jānāti kutaḥ ko 'haṃ kutra gantā kimātmakaḥ // BrP_234.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29377: kena bandhena baddho 'haṃ kāraṇaṃ kim akāraṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29378: kiṃ kāryaṃ kim akāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ na cocyate // BrP_234.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29379: ko dharmaḥ kaś ca vādharmaḥ kasmin varteta vai katham /
GP11brahmppu:29380: kiṃ kartavyam akartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṃ guṇadoṣavat // BrP_234.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29384: ajñānināṃ pravartante karmalopas tato dvijāḥ // BrP_234.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29385: narakaṃ karmaṇāṃ lopāt phalam āhur maharṣayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29386: tasmād ajñānināṃ duḥkham iha cāmutra cottamam // BrP_234.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29404: saṃsmaran yauvane dīrghaṃ niśvasity atitāpitaḥ // BrP_234.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29406: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇu tāny api // BrP_234.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29408: muhur glāniparaś cāsau muhur jñānabalānvitaḥ // BrP_234.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29410: ete kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīty atīva mamatākulaḥ // BrP_234.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29416: tāpena mahatā vyāptas tṛṣā vyāptas tathā kṣudhā // BrP_234.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29418: tataś ca yātanādehaṃ kleśena pratipadyate // BrP_234.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29419: etāny anyāni cogrāṇi duḥkhāni maraṇe nṛṇām /
GP11brahmppu:29420: śṛṇudhvaṃ narake yāni prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ // BrP_234.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29424: pratyekaṃ yātanāyāś ca yātanādi dvijottamāḥ // BrP_234.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29426: kuṭhāraiḥ pāṭyamānānāṃ bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām // BrP_234.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29432: prāpyante nārakair viprās teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // BrP_234.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29434: svarge 'pi pātabhītasya kṣayiṣṇor nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // BrP_234.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29435: punaś ca garbho bhavati jāyate ca punar naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29436: garbhe vilīyate bhūyo jāyamāno 'stam eti ca // BrP_234.51 //
GP11brahmppu:29437: jātamātraś ca mriyate bālabhāve ca yauvane /
GP11brahmppu:29438: yad yat prītikaraṃ puṃsāṃ vastu viprāḥ prajāyate // BrP_234.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29441: kriyate na tathā bhūri sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathāsukham /
GP11brahmppu:29444: tad asya trividhasyāpi duḥkhajātasya paṇḍitaiḥ // BrP_234.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29448: tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitair naraiḥ // BrP_234.57 //
GP11brahmppu:29449: tatprāptihetur jñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29450: āgamotthaṃ vivekāc ca dvidhā jñānaṃ tathocyate // BrP_234.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29452: andhaṃ tama ivājñānaṃ dīpavac cendriyodbhavam // BrP_234.59 //
GP11brahmppu:29453: yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yad vai viprā vivekajam /
GP11brahmppu:29454: manur apy āha vedārthaṃ smṛtvā yan munisattamāḥ // BrP_234.60 //
GP11brahmppu:29455: tad etac chrūyatām atra saṃbandhe gadato mama /
GP11brahmppu:29456: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat // BrP_234.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29458: dve vidye vai veditavye iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ // BrP_234.62 //
GP11brahmppu:29460: yat tad avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam // BrP_234.63 //
GP11brahmppu:29462: vittaṃ sarvagataṃ nityaṃ bhūtayonim akāraṇam // BrP_234.64 //
GP11brahmppu:29463: vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29464: tad brahma paramaṃ dhāma tad dheyaṃ mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ // BrP_234.65 //
GP11brahmppu:29465: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GP11brahmppu:29466: utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim // BrP_234.66 //
GP11brahmppu:29467: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti /
GP11brahmppu:29470: sarvāṇi tatra bhūtāni nivasanti parātmani // BrP_234.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29471: bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā vāsudevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29472: uvācedaṃ maharṣibhyaḥ purā pṛṣṭaḥ prajāpatiḥ // BrP_234.69 //
GP11brahmppu:29474: bhūteṣu vasate yo 'ntar vasanty atra ca tāni yat /
GP11brahmppu:29475: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevas tataḥ prabhuḥ // BrP_234.70 //
GP11brahmppu:29477: doṣāṃś ca sarvān saguṇo hy atītaḥ BrP_234.71b
GP11brahmppu:29486: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra BrP_234.73c
GP11brahmppu:29494: saṃdṛśyate vāpy atha gamyate vā BrP_234.75c
GP11brahmppu:29495: taj jñānam ajñānam ato 'nyad uktam BrP_234.75d
GP11brahmppu:29498: yaṃ viditvāvyayaṃ tatra yuñjāmaḥ puruṣottamam // BrP_235.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29499: śrutvā sa vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā /
GP11brahmppu:29500: abravīt paramaprīto yogī yogavidāṃ varaḥ // BrP_235.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29502: yogaṃ vakṣyāmi bho viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavanāśanam /
GP11brahmppu:29503: yam abhyasyāpnuyād yogī mokṣaṃ paramadurlabham // BrP_235.3 //
GP11brahmppu:29505: itihāsaṃ purāṇaṃ ca vedāṃś caiva vicakṣaṇaḥ // BrP_235.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29506: āhāraṃ yogadoṣāṃś ca deśakālaṃ ca buddhimān /
GP11brahmppu:29507: jñātvā samabhyased yogaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ // BrP_235.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29508: bhuñjan saktuṃ yavāgūṃ ca takramūlaphalaṃ payaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29510: na manovikale dhmāte na śrānte kṣudhite tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29511: na dvaṃdve na ca śīte ca na coṣṇe nānilātmake // BrP_235.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29513: sarīsṛpe śmaśāne ca na nadyante 'gnisaṃnidhau // BrP_235.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29514: na caitye na ca valmīke sabhaye kūpasaṃnidhau /
GP11brahmppu:29515: na śuṣkaparṇanicaye yogaṃ yuñjīta karhicit // BrP_235.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29516: deśān etān anādṛtya mūḍhatvād yo yunakti vai /
GP11brahmppu:29517: pravakṣye tasya ye doṣā jāyante vighnakārakāḥ // BrP_235.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29518: bādhiryaṃ jaḍatā lopaḥ smṛter mūkatvam andhatā /
GP11brahmppu:29519: jvaraś ca jāyate sadyas tadvad ajñānasaṃbhavaḥ // BrP_235.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29520: tasmāt sarvātmanā kāryā rakṣā yogavidā sadā /
GP11brahmppu:29522: āśrame vijane guhye niḥśabde nirbhaye nage /
GP11brahmppu:29523: śūnyāgāre śucau ramye caikānte devatālaye // BrP_235.13 //
GP11brahmppu:29524: rajanyāḥ paścime yāme pūrve ca susamāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29525: pūrvāhṇe madhyame cāhni yuktāhāro jitendriyaḥ // BrP_235.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29527: nātinīce na cocchrite niḥspṛhaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ // BrP_235.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29530: nābhau nidhāya hastau dvau śāntaḥ padmāsane sthitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29531: saṃsthāpya dṛṣṭiṃ nāsāgre prāṇān āyamya vāgyataḥ // BrP_235.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29533: praṇavaṃ dīrgham udyamya saṃvṛtāsyaḥ suniścalaḥ // BrP_235.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29534: rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ sattvena rajasas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29535: saṃchādya nirmale śānte sthitaḥ saṃvṛtalocanaḥ // BrP_235.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29537: yuñjīta satataṃ yogī muktidaṃ puruṣottamam // BrP_235.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29539: kṣetrajñaś ca pare yojyas tato yuñjati yogavit // BrP_235.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29541: saṃtyajya viṣayāṃs tasya yogasiddhiḥ prakāśitā // BrP_235.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29542: yadā nirviṣayaṃ cittaṃ pare brahmaṇi līyate /
GP11brahmppu:29543: samādhau yogayuktasya tadābhyeti paraṃ padam // BrP_235.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29545: bhavaty ānandam āsādya tadā nirvāṇam ṛcchati // BrP_235.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29547: prāpya yogabalād yogī mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_235.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29549: sarvatrānityabuddhis tu yogī mucyeta nānyathā // BrP_235.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29550: indriyāṇi na seveta vairāgyeṇa ca yogavit /
GP11brahmppu:29551: sadā cābhyāsayogena mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_235.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29552: na ca padmāsanād yogo na nāsāgranirīkṣaṇāt /
GP11brahmppu:29553: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogo yoga ucyate // BrP_235.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29554: evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhā yogaḥ prokto vimuktidaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29555: saṃsāramokṣahetuś ca kim anyac chrotum icchatha // BrP_235.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29557: śrutvā te vacanaṃ tasya sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan /
GP11brahmppu:29558: vyāsaṃ praśasya saṃpūjya punaḥ praṣṭuṃ samudyatāḥ // BrP_235.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29561: pibatāṃ no dvijaśreṣṭha na tṛptir iha dṛśyate // BrP_236.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29562: tasmād yogaṃ mune brūhi vistareṇa vimuktidam /
GP11brahmppu:29563: sāṃkhyaṃ ca dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha śrotum icchāmahe vayam // BrP_236.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29567: sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoga etat pṛṣṭo vadasva naḥ // BrP_236.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29569: yenopāyena puruṣas tat tvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // BrP_236.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29572: nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgāt siddhiṃ vindati kaścana // BrP_236.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29575: bhūmer deho jalāt sneho jyotiṣaś cakṣuṣī smṛte /
GP11brahmppu:29577: krāntau viṣṇur bale śakraḥ koṣṭhe 'gnir bhoktum icchati /
GP11brahmppu:29578: karṇayoḥ pradiśaḥ śrotre jihvāyāṃ vāk sarasvatī // BrP_236.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29579: karṇau tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī /
GP11brahmppu:29581: śabdasparśau tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamam /
GP11brahmppu:29582: indriyārthān pṛthag vidyād indriyebhyas tu nityadā // BrP_236.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29583: indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte avaśyān iva rājinaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29584: manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥ // BrP_236.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29586: niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā manasas tathā // BrP_236.13 //
GP11brahmppu:29588: prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca nityaṃ deheṣu dehinām // BrP_236.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29589: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya guṇaśabdo na cetanāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29590: sattvaṃ hi tejaḥ sṛjati na guṇān vai kathaṃcana // BrP_236.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29591: evaṃ saptadaśaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29592: manīṣī manasā viprāḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_236.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29593: na hy ayaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛśyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29594: manasā tu pradīptena mahān ātmā prakāśate // BrP_236.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29596: aśarīraṃ śarīre sve nirīkṣeta nirindriyam // BrP_236.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29598: yo 'nupaśyati sa pretya kalpate brahmabhūyataḥ // BrP_236.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29600: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ // BrP_236.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29601: sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu jaṅgameṣu dhruveṣu ca /
GP11brahmppu:29602: vasaty eko mahān ātmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam // BrP_236.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29604: yadā paśyati bhūtātmā brahma saṃpadyate tadā // BrP_236.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29605: yāvān ātmani vedātmā tāvān ātmā parātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29606: ya evaṃ satataṃ veda so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // BrP_236.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29608: devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ // BrP_236.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29610: yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathā jñānavidāṃ gatiḥ // BrP_236.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29612: yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas tan na vedeha kaścana // BrP_236.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29613: na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādho na ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29614: na madhye pratigṛhṇīte naiva kiṃcin na kaścana // BrP_236.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29615: sarve tatsthā ime lokā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:29616: yady apy agre samāgacched yathā bāṇo guṇacyutaḥ // BrP_236.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29617: naivāntaṃ kāraṇasyeyād yady api syān manojavaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29618: tasmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti nāsti sthūlataraṃ tathā // BrP_236.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29620: sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // BrP_236.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29621: tad evāṇor aṇutaraṃ tan mahadbhyo mahattaram /
GP11brahmppu:29622: tad antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate // BrP_236.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29623: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvedhā bhāvo 'yam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29624: kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu divyaṃ tv amṛtam akṣaram // BrP_236.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29625: navadvāraṃ puraṃ kṛtvā haṃso hi niyato vaśī /
GP11brahmppu:29626: īdṛśaḥ sarvabhūtasya sthāvarasya carasya ca // BrP_236.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29629: haṃsoktaṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva kūṭasthaṃ yat tad akṣaram /
GP11brahmppu:29630: tad vidvān akṣaraṃ prāpya jahāti prāṇajanmanī // BrP_236.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29632: bhavatāṃ pṛcchatāṃ viprā yathāvad iha tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29633: sāṃkhyaṃ jñānena saṃyuktaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā // BrP_236.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29634: yogakṛtyaṃ tu bho viprāḥ kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param /
GP11brahmppu:29635: ekatvaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // BrP_236.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29636: ātmano vyāpino jñānaṃ jñānam etad anuttamam /
GP11brahmppu:29639: yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ // BrP_236.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29640: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam /
GP11brahmppu:29641: krodhaṃ śamena jayati kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt // BrP_236.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29643: dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā // BrP_236.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29644: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:29645: apramādād bhayaṃ jahyād dambhaṃ prājñopasevanāt // BrP_236.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29646: evam etān yogadoṣāñ jayen nityam atandritaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29647: agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cātha devatāḥ praṇamet sadā // BrP_236.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29649: brahmatejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat // BrP_236.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29651: dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā // BrP_236.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29652: śaucaṃ caivātmanaḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29653: etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣati // BrP_236.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29655: dhūtapāpmā tu tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ // BrP_236.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29656: kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā niṣeved brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP11brahmppu:29657: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca kṛtvaikāgryaṃ samāhitaḥ // BrP_236.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29658: pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayen mana ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29659: jantoḥ pañcendriyasyāsya yady ekaṃ klinnam indriyam // BrP_236.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29660: tato 'sya sravati prajñā gireḥ pādād ivodakam /
GP11brahmppu:29661: manasaḥ pūrvam ādadyāt kūrmāṇām iva matsyahā // BrP_236.50 //
GP11brahmppu:29662: tataḥ śrotraṃ tataś cakṣur jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca yogavit /
GP11brahmppu:29663: tata etāni saṃyamya manasi sthāpayed yadi // BrP_236.51 //
GP11brahmppu:29664: tathaivāpohya saṃkalpān mano hy ātmani dhārayet /
GP11brahmppu:29665: pañcendriyāṇi manasi hṛdi saṃsthāpayed yadi // BrP_236.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29667: prasīdanti ca saṃsthāyāṃ tadā brahma prakāśate // BrP_236.53 //
GP11brahmppu:29668: vidhūma iva dīptārcir āditya iva dīptimān /
GP11brahmppu:29669: vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe paśyanty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_236.54 //
GP11brahmppu:29670: sarvaṃ tatra tu sarvatra vyāpakatvāc ca dṛśyate /
GP11brahmppu:29671: taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_236.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29673: evaṃ parimitaṃ kālam ācaran saṃśitavrataḥ // BrP_236.56 //
GP11brahmppu:29674: āsīno hi rahasy eko gacched akṣarasāmyatām /
GP11brahmppu:29675: pramoho bhrama āvarto ghrāṇaṃ śravaṇadarśane // BrP_236.57 //
GP11brahmppu:29677: pratibhān upasargāś ca pratisaṃgṛhya yogataḥ // BrP_236.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29679: kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge trailokye niyato muniḥ // BrP_236.59 //
GP11brahmppu:29682: ekāgraṃ cintayen nityaṃ yogān nodvijate manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29683: yenopāyena śakyeta niyantuṃ cañcalaṃ manaḥ // BrP_236.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29684: tatra yukto niṣeveta na caiva vicalet tataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29686: nātivrajet paraṃ vācā karmaṇā manasāpi vā /
GP11brahmppu:29688: yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam abhivādayet /
GP11brahmppu:29689: samas tayoś cāpy ubhayor nābhidhyāyec chubhāśubham // BrP_236.64 //
GP11brahmppu:29690: na prahṛṣyeta lābheṣu nālābheṣu ca cintayet /
GP11brahmppu:29691: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ // BrP_236.65 //
GP11brahmppu:29695: evaṃ tu nirato mārgaṃ viramen na vimohitaḥ // BrP_236.67 //
GP11brahmppu:29696: api varṇāvakṛṣṭas tu nārī vā dharmakāṅkṣiṇī /
GP11brahmppu:29697: tāv apy etena mārgeṇa gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatim // BrP_236.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29703: yady evaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca /
GP11brahmppu:29704: kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā // BrP_237.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29705: etad vai śrotum icchāmas tad bhavān prabravītu naḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29710: yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ gacchanti ca karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:29711: śṛṇudhvaṃ sāṃprataṃ viprā gahanaṃ hy etad uttaram // BrP_237.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29712: asti dharma iti yuktaṃ nāsti tatraiva yo vadet /
GP11brahmppu:29713: yakṣasya sādṛśyam idaṃ yakṣasyedaṃ bhaved atha // BrP_237.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29714: dvāv imāv atha panthānau yatra vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29715: pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛtto vā vibhāṣitaḥ // BrP_237.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29716: karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā ca vimucyate /
GP11brahmppu:29717: tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ // BrP_237.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29719: vidyayā jāyate nityam avyaktaṃ hy akṣarātmakam // BrP_237.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29720: karma tv eke praśaṃsanti svalpabuddhiratā narāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29721: tena te dehajālena ramayanta upāsate // BrP_237.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29722: ye tu buddhiṃ parāṃ prāptā dharmanaipuṇyadarśinaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29723: na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann iva // BrP_237.10 //
GP11brahmppu:29725: vidyayā tad avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati // BrP_237.11 //
GP11brahmppu:29726: na mriyate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:29727: na jīryate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na vardhate // BrP_237.12 //
GP11brahmppu:29728: yatra tad brahma paramam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam /
GP11brahmppu:29730: dvaṃdvair na yatra bādhyante mānasena ca karmaṇā /
GP11brahmppu:29731: samāḥ sarvatra maitrāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // BrP_237.14 //
GP11brahmppu:29733: viprāś candrasamasparśaḥ sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitaḥ // BrP_237.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29735: na vaktuṃ śakyate draṣṭuṃ cakratantum ivāmbare // BrP_237.16 //
GP11brahmppu:29737: mūrtimān iti taṃ vidyād viprāḥ karmaguṇātmakam // BrP_237.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29738: devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasmin buddhīndur iva puṣkare /
GP11brahmppu:29739: kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīyān nityaṃ yogajitātmakam // BrP_237.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29740: tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca jñeyaṃ jīvaguṇātmakam /
GP11brahmppu:29741: jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ vidyād ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥ // BrP_237.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29743: sa ceṣṭate jīvaguṇaṃ ca sarvam BrP_237.20b
GP11brahmppu:29747: prakṛtyās tu vikārā ye kṣetrajñās te pariśrutāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29748: te cainaṃ na prajānanti na jānāti sa tān api // BrP_237.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29749: taiś caiva kurute kāryaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29750: sudāntair iva saṃyantā dṛḍhaḥ paramavājibhiḥ // BrP_237.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29751: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29752: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ // BrP_237.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29754: amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ // BrP_237.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29755: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate /
GP11brahmppu:29756: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ // BrP_237.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29758: indriyair indriyārthāṃś ca bahucittam acintayan // BrP_237.26 //
GP11brahmppu:29760: anīśvaraḥ praśāntātmā tato gacchet paraṃ padam // BrP_237.27 //
GP11brahmppu:29762: ātmanaḥ saṃpradānena martyo mṛtyum upāśnute // BrP_237.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29764: sattve cittaṃ samāveśya tataḥ kālañjaro bhavet // BrP_237.29 //
GP11brahmppu:29766: prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham atyantam aśnute // BrP_237.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29767: lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā svapne sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29768: nirvāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyamāno na kampate // BrP_237.31 //
GP11brahmppu:29769: evaṃ pūrvāpare rātre yuñjann ātmānam ātmanā /
GP11brahmppu:29770: laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyaty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_237.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29775: navanītaṃ yathā dadhnaḥ kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:29776: tathaiva viduṣāṃ jñānaṃ muktihetoḥ samuddhṛtam // BrP_237.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29778: tad idaṃ nāpraśāntāya nādāntāya tapasvine // BrP_237.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29784: rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyasmai tu kathaṃcana // BrP_237.39 //
GP11brahmppu:29785: yad apy asya mahīṃ dadyād ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29786: idam eva tataḥ śreya iti manyeta tattvavit // BrP_237.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29788: yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu ca gīyate // BrP_237.41 //
GP11brahmppu:29789: tad yuṣmabhyaṃ prayacchāmi yan māṃ pṛcchata sattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29790: yan me manasi varteta yas tu vo hṛdi saṃśayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29791: śrutaṃ bhavadbhis tat sarvaṃ kim anyat kathayāmi vaḥ // BrP_237.42 //
GP11brahmppu:29793: adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha punar eva vadasva naḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29794: yad adhyātmaṃ yathā vidmo bhagavann ṛṣisattama // BrP_237.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29796: adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ viprāḥ puruṣasyeha paṭhyate /
GP11brahmppu:29798: bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:29799: mahābhūtāni yaś caiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛt // BrP_237.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29801: ākāraṃ tu bhaved yasya yasmin dehaṃ na paśyati /
GP11brahmppu:29803: indriyāṇāṃ guṇāḥ kecit kathaṃ tān upalakṣayet // BrP_237.46 //
GP11brahmppu:29806: śṛṇudhvaṃ tad ihaikāgryā yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tat // BrP_237.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29807: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśalakṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29808: prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa ete vāyuguṇās trayaḥ // BrP_237.48 //
GP11brahmppu:29809: rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca tridhā jyotir vidhīyate /
GP11brahmppu:29810: raso 'tha rasanaṃ svedo guṇās tv ete trayo 'mbhasām // BrP_237.49 //
GP11brahmppu:29811: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29813: vāyoḥ sparśo raso 'dbhyaś ca jyotiṣo rūpam ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:29814: ākāśaprabhavaḥ śabdo gandho bhūmiguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_237.51 //
GP11brahmppu:29815: mano buddhiḥ svabhāvaś ca guṇā ete svayonijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29816: te guṇān ativartante guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥ // BrP_237.52 //
GP11brahmppu:29819: yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor avārkordhvaṃ ca paśyati /
GP11brahmppu:29820: etasminn eva kṛtye sā vartate buddhir uttamā // BrP_237.54 //
GP11brahmppu:29821: guṇais tu nīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api /
GP11brahmppu:29822: manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyā bhāvāt kuto guṇāḥ // BrP_237.55 //
GP11brahmppu:29823: indriyāṇi naraiḥ pañca ṣaṣṭhaṃ tan mana ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:29824: saptamīṃ buddhim evāhuḥ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi cāṣṭamam // BrP_237.56 //
GP11brahmppu:29826: buddhir adhyavasānāya sākṣī kṣetrajña ucyate // BrP_237.57 //
GP11brahmppu:29827: rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca traya ete svayonijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29828: samāḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tān guṇān upalakṣayet // BrP_237.58 //
GP11brahmppu:29829: tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃcid ātmani lakṣayet /
GP11brahmppu:29830: praśāntam iva saṃyuktaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayet // BrP_237.59 //
GP11brahmppu:29831: yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29832: pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ tatra cāpy upalakṣayet // BrP_237.60 //
GP11brahmppu:29833: yat tu saṃmohasaṃyuktam avyaktaṃ viṣamaṃ bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29834: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet // BrP_237.61 //
GP11brahmppu:29836: akasmād yadi vā kasmād vadanti sāttvikān guṇān // BrP_237.62 //
GP11brahmppu:29838: liṅgāni rajasas tāni vartante hetutattvataḥ // BrP_237.63 //
GP11brahmppu:29839: tathā mohaḥ pramādaś ca tandrī nidrāprabodhitā /
GP11brahmppu:29840: kathaṃcid abhivartante vijñeyās tāmasā guṇāḥ // BrP_237.64 //
GP11brahmppu:29842: hṛdayaṃ priyam eveha trividhā karmacodanā // BrP_237.65 //
GP11brahmppu:29843: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29844: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā paraḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_237.66 //
GP11brahmppu:29846: yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ tadā bhavati sā manaḥ // BrP_237.67 //
GP11brahmppu:29847: indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāvād buddhir vikurute hy anu /
GP11brahmppu:29848: śṛṇvatī bhavati śrotraṃ spṛśatī sparśa ucyate // BrP_237.68 //
GP11brahmppu:29849: paśyantī ca bhaved dṛṣṭī rasantī rasanā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:29850: jighrantī bhavati ghrāṇaṃ buddhir vikurute pṛthak // BrP_237.69 //
GP11brahmppu:29851: indriyāṇi tu tāny āhus teṣāṃ vṛttyā vitiṣṭhati /
GP11brahmppu:29853: kadācil labhate prītiṃ kadācid api śocati /
GP11brahmppu:29854: na sukhena ca duḥkhena kadācid iha muhyate // BrP_237.71 //
GP11brahmppu:29855: svayaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān ativartate /
GP11brahmppu:29856: saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimān // BrP_237.72 //
GP11brahmppu:29857: yadā prārthayate kiṃcit tadā bhavati sā manaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29858: adhiṣṭhāne ca vai buddhyā pṛthag etāni saṃsmaret // BrP_237.73 //
GP11brahmppu:29860: sarvāṇy evānupūrveṇa yad yadā ca vidhīyate // BrP_237.74 //
GP11brahmppu:29862: pravartamānas tu rajaḥ sattvam apy ativartate // BrP_237.75 //
GP11brahmppu:29863: ye vai bhāvena vartante sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu /
GP11brahmppu:29864: anv arthān saṃpravartante rathanemim arā iva // BrP_237.76 //
GP11brahmppu:29867: evaṃsvabhāvam evedam iti buddhvā na muhyati /
GP11brahmppu:29868: aśocan saṃprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ // BrP_237.78 //
GP11brahmppu:29869: na hy ātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyaiḥ kāmagocaraiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29871: teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn yadā samyaṅ niyacchati /
GP11brahmppu:29872: tadā prakāśate śyātmā dīpadīptā yathākṛtiḥ // BrP_237.80 //
GP11brahmppu:29873: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tamasy upagate yathā /
GP11brahmppu:29874: prakāśaṃ bhavate sarvaṃ tathaivam upadhāryatām // BrP_237.81 //
GP11brahmppu:29875: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī na lipyati jale caran /
GP11brahmppu:29876: vimuktātmā tathā yogī guṇadoṣair na lipyate // BrP_237.82 //
GP11brahmppu:29877: evam eva kṛtaprajño na doṣair viṣayāṃś caran /
GP11brahmppu:29878: asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu na kathaṃcit pralipyate // BrP_237.83 //
GP11brahmppu:29879: tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma ratir yasya sadātmani /
GP11brahmppu:29881: svayam ātmā prasavati guṇeṣv api kadācana /
GP11brahmppu:29882: na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ guṇān veda sa sarvadā // BrP_237.85 //
GP11brahmppu:29883: paridadhyād guṇānāṃ sa draṣṭā caiva yathātatham /
GP11brahmppu:29884: sattvakṣetrajñayor evam antaraṃ lakṣayen naraḥ // BrP_237.86 //
GP11brahmppu:29885: sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān /
GP11brahmppu:29886: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyaitau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā // BrP_237.87 //
GP11brahmppu:29888: maśakodumbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā saha // BrP_237.88 //
GP11brahmppu:29889: iṣikā vā yathā muñje pṛthak ca saha caiva ha /
GP11brahmppu:29890: tathaiva sahitāv etau anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau // BrP_237.89 //
GP11brahmppu:29892: sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñas tv adhitiṣṭhati /
GP11brahmppu:29893: guṇān vikriyataḥ sarvān udāsīnavad īśvaraḥ // BrP_238.1 //
GP11brahmppu:29894: svabhāvayuktaṃ tat sarvaṃ yad imān sṛjate guṇān /
GP11brahmppu:29895: ūrṇanābhir yathā sūtraṃ sṛjate tad guṇāṃs tathā // BrP_238.2 //
GP11brahmppu:29897: evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttim iti cāpare // BrP_238.3 //
GP11brahmppu:29899: anenaiva vidhānena bhaved vai saṃśayo mahān // BrP_238.4 //
GP11brahmppu:29900: anādinidhano hy ātmā taṃ buddhvā viharen naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29901: akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ // BrP_238.5 //
GP11brahmppu:29902: ity evaṃ hṛdaye sarvo buddhicintāmayaṃ dṛḍham /
GP11brahmppu:29903: anityaṃ sukham āsīnam aśocyaṃ chinnasaṃśayaḥ // BrP_238.6 //
GP11brahmppu:29904: tarayet pracyutāṃ pṛthvīṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29905: avagāhya ca vidvāṃso viprā lolam imaṃ tathā // BrP_238.7 //
GP11brahmppu:29906: na tu tapyati vai vidvān sthale carati tattvavit /
GP11brahmppu:29907: evaṃ vicintya cātmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñānam ātmanaḥ // BrP_238.8 //
GP11brahmppu:29908: tāṃ tu buddhvā naraḥ sargaṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:29909: samaceṣṭaś ca vai samyag labhate śamam uttamam // BrP_238.9 //
GP11brahmppu:29912: tattvaṃ buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:29914: na bhavati viduṣāṃ mahad bhayaṃ BrP_238.12a
GP11brahmppu:29915: yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ paratra BrP_238.12b
GP11brahmppu:29917: bhavati hi yā viduṣaḥ sanātanī BrP_238.12d
GP11brahmppu:29920: tatra cet kuśalo na śocate BrP_238.13c
GP11brahmppu:29921: ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtam BrP_238.13d
GP11brahmppu:29923: tac ca nindayati yat purā kṛtam BrP_238.14b
GP11brahmppu:29924: yat priyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ na vāpriyaṃ BrP_238.14c
GP11brahmppu:29927: yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo vidyate neha kaścana /
GP11brahmppu:29928: yo viśiṣṭaś ca bhūtebhyas tad bhavān prabravītu naḥ // BrP_238.15 //
GP11brahmppu:29930: dharmaṃ ca saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇam ṛṣibhiḥ stutam /
GP11brahmppu:29933: sarvataḥ prasṛtānīha pitā bālān ivātmajān // BrP_238.17 //
GP11brahmppu:29934: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ cāpy aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:29935: vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyate // BrP_238.18 //
GP11brahmppu:29937: ātmatṛptaḥ sa evāsīd bahucintyam acintayan // BrP_238.19 //
GP11brahmppu:29939: tadā caivātmanātmānaṃ paraṃ drakṣyatha śāśvatam // BrP_238.20 //
GP11brahmppu:29941: prapaśyanti mahātmānaṃ brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_238.21 //
GP11brahmppu:29943: ātmano nābhijānīte kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalam // BrP_238.22 //
GP11brahmppu:29944: evam ātmā na jānīte kva gamiṣye kuto 'nv aham /
GP11brahmppu:29945: anyo hy asyāntarātmāsti yaḥ sarvam anupaśyati // BrP_238.23 //
GP11brahmppu:29947: dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā yūyaṃ virāgā bhavata dvijāḥ // BrP_238.24 //
GP11brahmppu:29949: parāṃ buddhim avāpyehāpy acintā vigatajvarāḥ // BrP_238.25 //
GP11brahmppu:29955: prataradhvaṃ nadīṃ buddhyā dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ // BrP_238.28 //
GP11brahmppu:29959: tāṃ tīrṇaḥ sarvato mukto vidhūtātmātmavāñ śuciḥ // BrP_238.30 //
GP11brahmppu:29963: akrudhyann aprasīdaṃś ca nanṛśaṃsamatis tathā // BrP_238.32 //
GP11brahmppu:29965: etad dhi sarvadharmebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ menire budhāḥ // BrP_238.33 //
GP11brahmppu:29967: ātmāno vyāpino viprā iti putrānuśāsanam // BrP_238.34 //
GP11brahmppu:29969: ātmajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ sarvaguhyatamaṃ mahat // BrP_238.35 //
GP11brahmppu:29970: abravaṃ yad ahaṃ viprā ātmasākṣikam añjasā /
GP11brahmppu:29971: naiva strī na pumān evaṃ na caivedaṃ napuṃsakam // BrP_238.36 //
GP11brahmppu:29973: naitaj jñātvā pumān strī vā punarbhavam avāpnuyāt // BrP_238.37 //
GP11brahmppu:29974: yathā matāni sarvāṇi tathaitāni yathā tathā /
GP11brahmppu:29975: kathitāni mayā viprā bhavanti na bhavanti ca // BrP_238.38 //
GP11brahmppu:29979: brūyāt sutasyeha yad uktam etat BrP_238.39d
GP11brahmppu:29982: tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmahe mune // BrP_238.40 //
GP11brahmppu:29986: ghaṭopakaraṇe buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sā matā /
GP11brahmppu:29988: pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimam /
GP11brahmppu:29989: ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tac chṛṇudhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ // BrP_238.43 //
GP11brahmppu:29991: sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchettum arhati // BrP_238.44 //
GP11brahmppu:29992: apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣed rakṣet kṣetraṃ ca saṃvidam /
GP11brahmppu:29993: icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayet // BrP_238.45 //
GP11brahmppu:29994: nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavit /
GP11brahmppu:29996: lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāt /
GP11brahmppu:29997: anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayā // BrP_238.47 //
GP11brahmppu:29998: āyatyā ca jayed āśāṃ sāmarthyaṃ saṅgavarjanāt /
GP11brahmppu:29999: anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhāṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ // BrP_238.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30001: utthānena jayet tandrāṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayet // BrP_238.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30002: maunena bahubhāṣāṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayet /
GP11brahmppu:30003: yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā // BrP_238.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30004: jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30005: tad etad upaśāntena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā // BrP_238.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30006: yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30007: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam // BrP_238.52 //
GP11brahmppu:30009: dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā // BrP_238.53 //
GP11brahmppu:30010: śaucam ācārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30011: etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam upahanti ca // BrP_238.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30012: sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate /
GP11brahmppu:30013: dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ // BrP_238.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30014: kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā nirviśed brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP11brahmppu:30017: eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30020: sāṃkhyaṃ yogasya no vipra viśeṣaṃ vaktum arhasi /
GP11brahmppu:30021: tava dharmajña sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ munisattama // BrP_239.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30024: vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ svapakṣodbhavanāya vai // BrP_239.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30025: anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed ity evaṃ munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30026: vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yogaṃ samyaṅ manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_239.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30027: vadanti kāraṇaṃ vedaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ samyag dvijātayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30028: vijñāyeha gatīḥ sarvā virakto viṣayeṣu yaḥ // BrP_239.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30029: ūrdhvaṃ sa dehāt suvyaktaṃ vimucyed iti nānyathā /
GP11brahmppu:30030: etad āhur mahāprājñāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanam // BrP_239.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30031: svapakṣe kāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ samarthaṃ vacanaṃ hitam /
GP11brahmppu:30032: śiṣṭānāṃ hi mataṃ grāhyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataiḥ // BrP_239.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30034: ubhe caite mate tattve samavete dvijottamāḥ // BrP_239.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30035: ubhe caite mate jñāte munīndrāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmate /
GP11brahmppu:30036: anuṣṭhite yathāśāstraṃ nayetāṃ paramāṃ gatim // BrP_239.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30037: tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ dayā bhūteṣu cānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30038: vratānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ tulyaṃ darśanaṃ tv asamaṃ tayoḥ // BrP_239.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30040: yadi tulyaṃ vrataṃ śaucaṃ dayā cātra mahāmune /
GP11brahmppu:30041: tulyaṃ taddarśanaṃ kasmāt tan no brūhi dvijottama // BrP_239.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30043: rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalam /
GP11brahmppu:30044: yogāsthiroditān doṣān pañcaitān prāpnuvanti tān // BrP_239.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30045: yathā vānimiṣāḥ sthūlaṃ jālaṃ chittvā punar jalam /
GP11brahmppu:30046: prāpnuvanti tathā yogāt tat padaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥ // BrP_239.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30047: tathaiva vāgurāṃ chittvā balavanto yathā mṛgāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30048: prāpnuyur vimalaṃ mārgaṃ vimuktāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // BrP_239.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30050: chittvā yogāt paraṃ mārgaṃ gacchanti vimalaṃ śubham // BrP_239.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30051: acalās tv āvilā viprā vāgurāsu tathāpare /
GP11brahmppu:30052: vinaśyanti na saṃdehas tadvad yogabalād ṛte // BrP_239.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30053: balahīnāś ca viprendrā yathā jālaṃ gatā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30054: bandhaṃ na gacchanty anaghā yogās te tu sudurlabhāḥ // BrP_239.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30055: yathā ca śakunāḥ sūkṣmaṃ prāpya jālam ariṃdamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30056: tatrāśaktā vipadyante mucyante tu balānvitāḥ // BrP_239.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30057: karmajair bandhanair baddhās tadvad yogaparā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30058: abalā na vimucyante mucyante ca balānvitāḥ // BrP_239.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30059: alpakaś ca yathā viprā vahniḥ śāmyati durbalaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30060: ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais tadvad yogabalaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_239.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30061: sa eva ca tadā viprā vahnir jātabalaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30062: samīraṇagataḥ kṛtsnāṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm imām // BrP_239.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30064: antakāla ivādityaḥ kṛtsnaṃ saṃśoṣayej jagat // BrP_239.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30065: durbalaś ca yathā viprāḥ srotasā hriyate naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30066: balahīnas tathā yogī viṣayair hriyate ca saḥ // BrP_239.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30067: tad eva tu yathā sroto viṣkambhayati vāraṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30068: tadvad yogabalaṃ labdhvā na bhaved viṣayair hṛtaḥ // BrP_239.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30069: viśanti vā vaśād vātha yogād yogabalānvitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30070: prajāpatīn manūn sarvān mahābhūtāni ceśvarāḥ // BrP_239.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30071: na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavikramaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30072: viśante tad dvijāḥ sarve yogasyāmitatejasaḥ // BrP_239.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30074: yogaṃ kuryād balaṃ prāpya taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ caret // BrP_239.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30075: prāpnuyād viṣayān kaścit punaś cograṃ tapaś caret /
GP11brahmppu:30076: saṃkṣipyec ca punar viprāḥ sūryas tejoguṇān iva // BrP_239.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30080: nidarśanārthaṃ sūkṣmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca punar dvijāḥ // BrP_239.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30081: ātmanaś ca samādhāne dhāraṇāṃ prati vā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30083: apramatto yathā dhanvī lakṣyaṃ hanti samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30084: yuktaḥ samyak tathā yogī mokṣaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // BrP_239.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30085: snehapātre yathā pūrṇe mana ādhāya niścalam /
GP11brahmppu:30086: puruṣo yukta ārohet sopānaṃ yuktamānasaḥ // BrP_239.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30087: muktas tathāyam ātmānaṃ yogaṃ tadvat suniścalam /
GP11brahmppu:30089: yathā ca nāvaṃ viprendrāḥ karṇadhāraḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30090: mahārṇavagatāṃ śīghraṃ nayed viprāṃs tu pattanam // BrP_239.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30092: durgamaṃ sthānam āpnoti hitvā deham imaṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_239.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30093: sārathiś ca yathā yuktaḥ sadaśvān susamāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30094: deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabham // BrP_239.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30095: tathaiva ca dvijā yogī dhāraṇāsu samāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30096: prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ lakṣyamukta ivāśugaḥ // BrP_239.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30098: pāśaṃ hatveva mīnānāṃ padam āpnoti so 'jaram // BrP_239.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30099: nābhyāṃ śīrṣe ca kukṣau ca hṛdi vakṣasi pārśvayoḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30100: darśane śravaṇe vāpi ghrāṇe cāmitavikramaḥ // BrP_239.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30102: ātmanā sūkṣmam ātmānaṃ yuṅkte samyag dvijottamāḥ // BrP_239.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30104: uttamaṃ yogam āsthāya yadīcchati vimucyate // BrP_239.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30106: āhārān kīdṛśān kṛtvā kāni jitvā ca sattama /
GP11brahmppu:30107: yogī balam avāpnoti tad bhavān vaktum arhati // BrP_239.42 //
GP11brahmppu:30109: kaṇānāṃ bhakṣaṇe yuktaḥ piṇyākasya ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30110: snehānāṃ varjane yukto yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30112: ekāhārī viśuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30113: pakṣān māsān ṛtūṃś citrān saṃcaraṃś ca guhās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30114: apaḥ pītvā payomiśrā yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30115: akhaṇḍam api vā māsaṃ satataṃ munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30116: upoṣya samyak śuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt // BrP_239.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30117: kāmaṃ jitvā tathā krodhaṃ śītoṣṇaṃ varṣam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30118: bhayaṃ śokaṃ tathā svāpaṃ pauruṣān viṣayāṃs tathā // BrP_239.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30119: aratiṃ durjayāṃ caiva ghorāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30120: sparśaṃ nidrāṃ tathā tandrāṃ durjayāṃ munisattamāḥ // BrP_239.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30123: durgas tv eṣa mataḥ panthā brāhmaṇānāṃ vipaścitām /
GP11brahmppu:30124: yaḥ kaścid vrajati kṣipraṃ kṣemeṇa munipuṃgavāḥ // BrP_239.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30126: śvabhravat toyahīnaṃ ca durgamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // BrP_239.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30129: yogamārgaṃ samāsādya yaḥ kaścid vrajate dvijaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30132: dhāraṇā sā tu yogasya durgeyam akṛtātmabhiḥ // BrP_239.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30133: viṣamā dhāraṇā viprā yānti vai na śubhāṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:30134: netṛhīnā yathā nāvaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ tu vai dvijāḥ // BrP_239.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30135: yas tu tiṣṭhati yogādhau dhāraṇāsu yathāvidhi /
GP11brahmppu:30136: maraṇaṃ janmaduḥkhitvaṃ sukhitvaṃ sa viśiṣyate // BrP_239.56 //
GP11brahmppu:30138: paraṃ yogasya panthānaṃ niścitaṃ taṃ dvijātiṣu // BrP_239.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30139: paraṃ hi tad brahmamayaṃ munīndrā BrP_239.58a
GP11brahmppu:30140: brahmāṇam īśaṃ varadaṃ ca viṣṇum BrP_239.58b
GP11brahmppu:30141: bhavaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca mahānubhāvaṃ BrP_239.58c
GP11brahmppu:30143: tamaś ca kaṣṭaṃ sumahad rajaś ca BrP_239.59a
GP11brahmppu:30144: sattvaṃ ca śuddhaṃ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ ca BrP_239.59b
GP11brahmppu:30145: siddhiṃ ca devīṃ varuṇasya patnīṃ BrP_239.59c
GP11brahmppu:30146: tejaś ca kṛtsnaṃ sumahac ca dhairyam BrP_239.59d
GP11brahmppu:30148: viśvāṃś ca devān uragān pitṝṃś ca BrP_239.60b
GP11brahmppu:30149: śailāṃś ca kṛtsnān udadhīṃś ca vācalān BrP_239.60c
GP11brahmppu:30150: nadīś ca sarvāḥ sanagāṃś ca nāgān BrP_239.60d
GP11brahmppu:30151: sādhyāṃs tathā yakṣagaṇān diśaś ca BrP_239.61a
GP11brahmppu:30155: kathā ca yā vipravarāḥ prasaktā BrP_239.62a
GP11brahmppu:30157: yogān sa sarvān anubhūya martyā BrP_239.62c
GP11brahmppu:30162: sāṃkhye tv idānīṃ dharmasya vidhiṃ prabrūhi tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30163: triṣu lokeṣu yaj jñānaṃ sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ hi te // BrP_240.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30166: vihitaṃ yatibhir vṛddhaiḥ kapilādibhir īśvaraiḥ // BrP_240.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30168: guṇāś ca yasmin bahavo doṣahāniś ca kevalā // BrP_240.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30170: mānuṣān durjayān kṛtsnān paiśācān viṣayāṃs tathā // BrP_240.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30172: pitṝṇāṃ viṣayāñ jñātvā tiryaktvaṃ caratāṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_240.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30175: āsurān viṣayāñ jñātvā vaiśvadevāṃs tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30176: devarṣiviṣayāñ jñātvā yogānām api vai parān // BrP_240.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30177: viṣayāṃś ca pramāṇasya brahmaṇo viṣayāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30178: āyuṣaś ca paraṃ kālaṃ lokair vijñāya tattvataḥ // BrP_240.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30179: sukhasya ca paraṃ kālaṃ vijñāya munisattamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30180: prāptakāle ca yad duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ viṣayaiṣiṇām // BrP_240.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30181: tiryaktve patatāṃ viprās tathaiva narakeṣu yat /
GP11brahmppu:30182: svargasya ca guṇāñ jñātvā doṣān sarvāṃś ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_240.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30183: vedavāde ca ye doṣā guṇā ye cāpi vaidikāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30184: jñānayoge ca ye doṣā jñānayoge ca ye guṇāḥ // BrP_240.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30185: sāṃkhyajñāne ca ye doṣāṃs tathaiva ca guṇā dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30186: sattvaṃ daśaguṇaṃ jñātvā rajo navaguṇaṃ tathā // BrP_240.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30187: tamaś cāṣṭaguṇaṃ jñātvā buddhiṃ saptaguṇāṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30188: ṣaḍguṇaṃ ca nabho jñātvā tamaś ca triguṇaṃ mahat // BrP_240.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30189: dviguṇaṃ ca rajo jñātvā sattvaṃ caikaguṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30190: mārgaṃ vijñāya tattvena pralayaprekṣaṇena tu // BrP_240.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30192: prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ sūkṣmā iva nabhaḥ param // BrP_240.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30193: rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhaguṇena ca /
GP11brahmppu:30194: śabdagrāhyaṃ tathā śrotraṃ jihvāṃ rasaguṇena ca // BrP_240.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30195: tvacaṃ sparśaṃ tathā śakyaṃ vāyuṃ caiva tadāśritam /
GP11brahmppu:30196: mohaṃ tamasi saṃyuktaṃ lobhaṃ moheṣu saṃśritam // BrP_240.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30197: viṣṇuṃ krānte bale śakraṃ koṣṭhe saktaṃ tathānalam /
GP11brahmppu:30198: apsu devīṃ samāyuktām āpas tejasi saṃśritāḥ // BrP_240.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30199: tejo vāyau tu saṃyuktaṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam /
GP11brahmppu:30200: nabho mahati saṃyuktaṃ tamo mahasi saṃsthitam // BrP_240.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30201: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tathā saktaṃ sattvaṃ saktaṃ tathātmani /
GP11brahmppu:30202: saktam ātmānam īśe ca deve nārāyaṇe tathā // BrP_240.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30203: devaṃ mokṣe ca saṃyuktaṃ tato mokṣaṃ ca na kvacit /
GP11brahmppu:30204: jñātvā sattvaguṇaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ // BrP_240.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30206: madhyastham iva cātmānaṃ pāpaṃ yasmin na vidyate // BrP_240.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30207: dvitīyaṃ karma vai jñātvā viprendrā viṣayaiṣiṇām /
GP11brahmppu:30208: indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca sarvān ātmani saṃśritān // BrP_240.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30210: prāṇāpānau samānaṃ ca vyānodānau ca tattvataḥ // BrP_240.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30211: ādyaṃ caivānilaṃ jñātvā prabhavaṃ cānilaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30212: saptadhā tāṃs tathā śeṣān saptadhā vidhivat punaḥ // BrP_240.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30213: prajāpatīn ṛṣīṃś caiva sargāṃś ca subahūn varān /
GP11brahmppu:30214: saptarṣīṃś ca bahūñ jñātvā rājarṣīṃś ca paraṃtapān // BrP_240.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30216: aiśvaryāc cyāvitān dṛṣṭvā kālena mahatā dvijāḥ // BrP_240.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30217: mahatāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ śrutvā nāśaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30218: gatiṃ vācāṃ śubhāṃ jñātvā arcārhāḥ pāpakarmaṇām // BrP_240.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30219: vaitaraṇyāṃ ca yad duḥkhaṃ patitānāṃ yamakṣaye /
GP11brahmppu:30220: yoniṣu ca vicitrāsu saṃcārān aśubhāṃs tathā // BrP_240.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30225: vijñāya hitam ātmānaṃ yogāṃś ca vividhān dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30228: garhitaṃ mahatām arthe sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām // BrP_240.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30229: upaplavāṃs tathā ghorāñ śaśinas tejasas tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30230: tārāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca paryayam // BrP_240.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30231: dvaṃdvānāṃ viprayogaṃ ca vijñāya kṛpaṇaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30232: anyonyabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūtānām api cāśubham // BrP_240.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30233: bālye mohaṃ ca vijñāya pakṣadehasya cāśubham /
GP11brahmppu:30234: rāgaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ kvacit sattvaṃ samāśritam // BrP_240.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30236: durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vijñānaṃ śrutipūrvakam // BrP_240.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30238: viṣayāṇāṃ ca daurātmyaṃ vijñāya ca punar dvijāḥ // BrP_240.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30239: gatāsūnāṃ ca sattvānāṃ dehān bhittvā tathā śubhān /
GP11brahmppu:30240: vāsaṃ kuleṣu jantūnāṃ maraṇāya dhṛtātmanām // BrP_240.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30241: sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ duḥkhaṃ vijñāya bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30242: brahmaghnānāṃ gatiṃ jñātvā patitānāṃ sudāruṇām // BrP_240.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30245: jananīṣu ca vartante yena samyag dvijottamāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30246: sadevakeṣu lokeṣu yena vartanti mānavāḥ // BrP_240.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30248: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca vijñāya ca gatīḥ pṛthak // BrP_240.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30249: vedavādāṃs tathā citrān ṛtūnāṃ paryayāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30250: kṣayaṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ ca māsānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ tathā // BrP_240.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30251: pakṣakṣayaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā divasānāṃ ca saṃkṣayam /
GP11brahmppu:30252: kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca candrasya dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣatas tathā // BrP_240.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30253: vṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā samudrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ tathā punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30254: kṣayaṃ dhanānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar vṛddhiṃ tathaiva ca // BrP_240.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30255: saṃyogānāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā yugānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30256: dehavaiklavyatāṃ caiva samyag vijñāya tattvataḥ // BrP_240.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30257: ātmadoṣāṃś ca vijñāya sarvān ātmani saṃsthitān /
GP11brahmppu:30258: svadehād utthitān gandhāṃs tathā vijñāya cāśubhān // BrP_240.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30261: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ // BrP_240.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30263: pañca doṣān dvijā dehe pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30264: mārgajñāḥ kāpilāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ // BrP_240.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30265: kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ nidrā pañcamaḥ śvāsa ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:30266: ete doṣāḥ śarīreṣu dṛśyante sarvadehinām // BrP_240.52 //
GP11brahmppu:30268: sattvasaṃsevanān nidrām apramādād bhayaṃ tathā // BrP_240.53 //
GP11brahmppu:30270: guṇān guṇaśatair jñātvā doṣān doṣaśatair api // BrP_240.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30271: hetūn hetuśataiś citraiś citrān vijñāya tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30272: apāṃ phenopamaṃ lokaṃ viṣṇor māyāśataiḥ kṛtam // BrP_240.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30276: rajas tamasi saṃmagnaṃ paṅke dvipam ivāvaśam // BrP_240.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30277: sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñās tyaktvā snehaṃ prajākṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:30278: jñānajñeyena sāṃkhyena vyāpinā mahatā dvijāḥ // BrP_240.58 //
GP11brahmppu:30279: rājasān aśubhān gandhāṃs tāmasāṃś ca tathāvidhān /
GP11brahmppu:30280: puṇyāṃś ca sāttvikān gandhān sparśajān dehasaṃśritān // BrP_240.59 //
GP11brahmppu:30284: tamaḥkūrmaṃ rajomīnaṃ prajñayā saṃtaranty uta // BrP_240.61 //
GP11brahmppu:30298: taranti yatayaḥ siddhā jñānayogena cānaghāḥ // BrP_240.68 //
GP11brahmppu:30299: tīrtvā ca dustaraṃ janma viśanti vimalaṃ nabhaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30300: tatas tān sukṛtīñ jñātvā sūryo vahati raśmibhiḥ // BrP_240.69 //
GP11brahmppu:30302: tatra tān pravaho vāyuḥ pratigṛhṇāti cānaghāḥ // BrP_240.70 //
GP11brahmppu:30304: sūkṣmaḥ śītaḥ sugandhaś ca sukhasparśaś ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_240.71 //
GP11brahmppu:30305: saptānāṃ marutāṃ śreṣṭho lokān gacchati yaḥ śubhān /
GP11brahmppu:30306: sa tān vahati viprendrā nabhasaḥ paramāṃ gatim // BrP_240.72 //
GP11brahmppu:30307: nabho vahati lokeśān rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:30308: rajo vahati viprendrāḥ sattvasya paramāṃ gatim // BrP_240.73 //
GP11brahmppu:30309: sattvaṃ vahati śuddhātmā paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GP11brahmppu:30310: prabhur vahati śuddhātmā paramātmānam ātmanā // BrP_240.74 //
GP11brahmppu:30312: amṛtatvāya kalpante na nivartanti ca dvijāḥ // BrP_240.75 //
GP11brahmppu:30313: paramā sā gatir viprā nirdvaṃdvānāṃ mahātmanām /
GP11brahmppu:30317: ājanmamaraṇaṃ vā te ramante tatra vā na vā // BrP_240.77 //
GP11brahmppu:30318: yad atra tathyaṃ tattvaṃ no yathāvad vaktum arhasi /
GP11brahmppu:30319: tvadṛte mānavaṃ nānyaṃ praṣṭum arhāma sattama // BrP_240.78 //
GP11brahmppu:30320: mokṣadoṣo mahān eṣa prāpya siddhiṃ gatān ṛṣīn /
GP11brahmppu:30321: yadi tatraiva vijñāne vartante yatayaḥ pare // BrP_240.79 //
GP11brahmppu:30323: magnasya hi pare jñāne kiṃtu duḥkhāntaraṃ bhavet // BrP_240.80 //
GP11brahmppu:30325: yathānyāyaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca saṃkaṭaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30326: budhānām api saṃmohaḥ praśne 'smin munisattamāḥ // BrP_240.81 //
GP11brahmppu:30327: atrāpi tattvaṃ paramaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ vacanaṃ mama /
GP11brahmppu:30328: buddhiś ca paramā yatra kapilānāṃ mahātmanām // BrP_240.82 //
GP11brahmppu:30329: indriyāṇy api budhyante svadehaṃ dehināṃ dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30330: karaṇāny ātmanas tāni sūkṣmaṃ paśyanti tais tu saḥ // BrP_240.83 //
GP11brahmppu:30332: vinaśyanti na saṃdeho velā iva mahārṇave // BrP_240.84 //
GP11brahmppu:30334: sūkṣmaś carati sarvatra nabhasīva samīraṇaḥ // BrP_240.85 //
GP11brahmppu:30335: sa paśyati yathānyāyaṃ smṛtvā spṛśati cānaghāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30336: budhyamāno yathāpūrvam akhileneha bho dvijāḥ // BrP_240.86 //
GP11brahmppu:30337: indriyāṇi ha sarvāṇi sve sve sthāne yathāvidhi /
GP11brahmppu:30338: anīśatvāt pralīyante sarpā viṣahatā iva // BrP_240.87 //
GP11brahmppu:30339: indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ svasthāneṣv eva sarvaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30340: ākramya gatayaḥ sūkṣmā varaty ātmā na saṃśayaḥ // BrP_240.88 //
GP11brahmppu:30341: sattvasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān rajasaś ca guṇān punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30342: guṇāṃś ca tamasaḥ sarvān guṇān buddheś ca sattamāḥ // BrP_240.89 //
GP11brahmppu:30343: guṇāṃś ca manasaś cāpi nabhasaś ca guṇāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30344: guṇān vāyoś ca sarvajñāḥ snehajāṃś ca guṇān punaḥ // BrP_240.90 //
GP11brahmppu:30345: apāṃ guṇās tathā viprāḥ pārthivāṃś ca guṇān api /
GP11brahmppu:30346: sarvān eva guṇair vyāpya kṣetrajñeṣu dvijottamāḥ // BrP_240.91 //
GP11brahmppu:30347: ātmā carati kṣetrajñaḥ karmaṇā ca śubhāśubhe /
GP11brahmppu:30348: śiṣyā iva mahātmānam indriyāṇi ca taṃ dvijāḥ // BrP_240.92 //
GP11brahmppu:30349: prakṛtiṃ cāpy atikramya śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ parāt param /
GP11brahmppu:30350: nārāyaṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ nirvikāraṃ parāt param // BrP_240.93 //
GP11brahmppu:30351: vimuktaṃ sarvapāpebhyaḥ praviṣṭaṃ ca hy anāmayam /
GP11brahmppu:30352: paramātmānam aguṇaṃ nirvṛtaṃ taṃ ca sattamāḥ // BrP_240.94 //
GP11brahmppu:30353: śreṣṭhaṃ tatra mano viprā indriyāṇi ca bho dvijāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30355: śakyaṃ vālpena kālena śāntiṃ prāptuṃ guṇāṃs tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30356: evam uktena viprendrāḥ sāṃkhyayogena mokṣiṇīm // BrP_240.96 //
GP11brahmppu:30357: sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim /
GP11brahmppu:30358: jñānenānena viprendrās tulyaṃ jñānaṃ na vidyate // BrP_240.97 //
GP11brahmppu:30359: atra vaḥ saṃśayo mā bhūj jñānaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ paraṃ matam /
GP11brahmppu:30360: akṣaraṃ dhruvam evoktaṃ pūrvaṃ brahma sanātanam // BrP_240.98 //
GP11brahmppu:30362: kūṭasthaṃ caiva nityaṃ ca yad vadanti śamātmakāḥ // BrP_240.99 //
GP11brahmppu:30364: evaṃ śaṃsanti śāstreṣu pravaktāro maharṣayaḥ // BrP_240.100 //
GP11brahmppu:30365: sarve viprāś ca vedāś ca tathā sāmavido janāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30366: brahmaṇyaṃ paramaṃ devam anantaṃ paramācyutam // BrP_240.101 //
GP11brahmppu:30367: prārthayantaś ca taṃ viprā vadanti guṇabuddhayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30368: samyag uktās tathā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś cāmitadarśanāḥ // BrP_240.102 //
GP11brahmppu:30369: amūrtis tasya viprendrāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ mūrtir iti śrutiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30373: jñānaṃ mahad vai mahataś ca viprā BrP_240.105a
GP11brahmppu:30375: yac cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ vidhivat purāṇe BrP_240.105c
GP11brahmppu:30379: jñānaṃ ca loke yad ihāsti kiṃcit BrP_240.106c
GP11brahmppu:30382: jñānaṃ ca mokṣaś ca yathāvad uktam BrP_240.107b
GP11brahmppu:30383: tapāṃsi sūkṣmāṇi ca yāni caiva BrP_240.107c
GP11brahmppu:30387: tāṃś cāpi saṃdhārya tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ BrP_240.108c
GP11brahmppu:30389: hitvā ca dehaṃ praviśanti mokṣaṃ BrP_240.109a
GP11brahmppu:30392: sāṃkhye dvijā bho iha śiṣṭajuṣṭe BrP_240.109d
GP11brahmppu:30393: teṣāṃ tu tiryaggamanaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ BrP_240.110a
GP11brahmppu:30395: na vā pradhānā api te dvijātayo BrP_240.110c
GP11brahmppu:30396: ye jñānam etan munayo na saktāḥ BrP_240.110d
GP11brahmppu:30399: kṛtsnaṃ hi sāṃkhyā munayo mahātma BrP_240.111c
GP11brahmppu:30401: etan mayoktaṃ paramaṃ hi tattvaṃ BrP_240.112a
GP11brahmppu:30403: sa sargakāle ca karoti sargaṃ BrP_240.112c
GP11brahmppu:30406: kiṃ tad akṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30407: kiṃsvit tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmād āvartate punaḥ // BrP_241.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30410: tvaṃ hi jñānavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ procyase vedapāragaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30411: ṛṣibhiś ca mahābhāgair yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ // BrP_241.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30412: tad etac chrotum icchāmas tvattaḥ sarvaṃ mahāmate /
GP11brahmppu:30413: na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvanto 'mṛtam uttamam // BrP_241.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30416: vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ karālajanakasya ca // BrP_241.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30418: papraccha janako rājā jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param // BrP_241.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30421: svacchandaṃ sukṛtaṃ caiva madhuraṃ cāpy anulbaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:30424: bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi paraṃ brahma sanātanam /
GP11brahmppu:30425: yasmin na punarāvṛttiṃ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_241.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30426: yac ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yatredaṃ kṣarate jagat /
GP11brahmppu:30427: yac cākṣaram iti proktaṃ śivaṃ kṣemam anāmayam // BrP_241.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30430: yatra kṣarati pūrveṇa yāvatkālena cāpy atha // BrP_241.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30432: daśakalpaśatāvartam ahas tad brāhmam ucyate // BrP_241.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30434: sṛjaty anantakarmāṇi mahāntaṃ bhūtam agrajam // BrP_241.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30437: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśānaṃ jyotir avyayam /
GP11brahmppu:30440: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān eṣa buddhir iti smṛtiḥ // BrP_241.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30441: mahān iti ca yogeṣu viriñcir iti cāpy atha /
GP11brahmppu:30442: sāṃkhye ca paṭhyate śāstre nāmabhir bahudhātmakaḥ // BrP_241.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30444: dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ yena kṛtsnaṃ trailokyam ātmanā // BrP_241.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30446: eṣa vai vikriyāpannaḥ sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā // BrP_241.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30447: pradhānaṃ tasya saṃyogād utpannaṃ sumahat puram /
GP11brahmppu:30449: avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ vidyāsargaṃ vadanti tam /
GP11brahmppu:30450: mahāntaṃ cāpy ahaṃkāram avidyāsarga eva ca // BrP_241.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30451: acaraś ca caraś caiva samutpannau tathaikataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30454: ahaṃkāreṣu nṛpate caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtam // BrP_241.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30455: vāyur jyotir athākāśam āpo 'tha pṛthivī tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30456: śabdasparśau ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca // BrP_241.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30458: pañcamaṃ viddhi rājendra bhautikaṃ sargam arthakṛt // BrP_241.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30459: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇam eva ca pañcamam /
GP11brahmppu:30460: vāg hastau caiva pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva ca // BrP_241.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30462: saṃbhūtānīha yugapan manasā saha pārthiva // BrP_241.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30464: yāṃ jñātvā nābhiśocanti brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ // BrP_241.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30465: evam etat samutpannaṃ trailokyam idam uttamam /
GP11brahmppu:30470: śuni śvapāke caiṇeye sacāṇḍāle sapulkase // BrP_241.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30472: yā ca mūrtiś ca yat kiṃcit sarvatraitan nidarśanam // BrP_241.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30474: sthānaṃ dehavatām āsīd ity evam anuśuśruma // BrP_241.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30476: ahany ahani bhūtātmā yac cākṣara iti smṛtam // BrP_241.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30477: tatas tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat /
GP11brahmppu:30478: jagan mohātmakaṃ cāhur avyaktād vyaktasaṃjñakam // BrP_241.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30480: kathitaṃ te mahārāja yasmān nāvartate punaḥ // BrP_241.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30482: sattvasaṃśrayaṇāt tattvaṃ sattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_241.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30483: yad amūrtiḥ sṛjad vyaktaṃ tan mūrtim adhitiṣṭhati /
GP11brahmppu:30484: caturviṃśatimo vyakto hy amūrtiḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_241.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30485: sa eva hṛdi sarvāsu mūrtiṣv ātiṣṭhatātmavān /
GP11brahmppu:30486: cetayaṃś cetano nityaṃ sarvamūrtir amūrtimān // BrP_241.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30488: gocare vartate nityaṃ nirguṇo guṇasaṃjñitaḥ // BrP_241.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30494: yo 'haṃ na so 'ham ity ukto guṇān evānuvartate // BrP_241.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30496: rajasā rājasāṃś caiva sāttvikān sattvasaṃśrayāt // BrP_241.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30498: sarvāṇy etāni rūpāṇi jānīhi prākṛtāni tu // BrP_241.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30499: tāmasā nirayaṃ yānti rājasā mānuṣān atha /
GP11brahmppu:30504: pañcaviṃśatimo yo 'yaṃ jñānād eva pravartate // BrP_241.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30507: dehād dehasahasrāṇi tathā ca na sa bhidyate // BrP_242.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30509: utpadyati tapoyogād guṇaiḥ saha guṇakṣayāt // BrP_242.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30510: manuṣyatvād divaṃ yāti devo mānuṣyam eti ca /
GP11brahmppu:30513: sūtratantuguṇair nityaṃ tathāyam aguṇo guṇaiḥ // BrP_242.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30514: dvaṃdvam eti ca nirdvaṃdvas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu /
GP11brahmppu:30521: ekavāsāś caturvāsāḥ śāyī nityam adhas tathā // BrP_242.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30523: vīram āsanam ākāśe tathā śayanam eva ca // BrP_242.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30527: vividhāsu ca śayyāsu phalagṛhyānvitāsu ca // BrP_242.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30531: phalakaṃ paridhānaś ca tathā kaṭakavastradhṛk // BrP_242.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30533: vastrāṇi cānyāni bahūny abhimatya ca buddhimān // BrP_242.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30541: śaivālabhojanaś caiva tathā cānyena vartayan // BrP_242.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30543: vividhāni ca kṛcchrāṇi sevate siddhikāṅkṣayā // BrP_242.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30546: upāśrayān apy aparān pākhaṇḍān vividhān api /
GP11brahmppu:30547: viviktāś ca śilāchāyās tathā prasravaṇāni ca // BrP_242.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30549: kānaneṣu viviktāś ca śailānāṃ mahatīr guhāḥ // BrP_242.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30550: niyamān vividhāṃś cāpi vividhāni tapāṃsi ca /
GP11brahmppu:30551: yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān vidyāś ca vividhās tathā // BrP_242.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30555: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva dharmārthau kāma eva ca // BrP_242.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30559: yājanādhyāpane caiva tathānyad api kiṃcana // BrP_242.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30561: śubhāśubhabhayaṃ sarvam etad āhuḥ sanātanam // BrP_242.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30562: prakṛtiḥ kurute devī bhayaṃ pralayam eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30565: evam evaiṣa tat sarvaṃ krīḍārtham abhimanyate // BrP_242.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30569: kriyākriyāpathopetas tathā tad iti manyate // BrP_242.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30570: prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ jagad andhīkṛtaṃ vibho /
GP11brahmppu:30571: rajasā tamasā caiva vyāptaṃ sarvam anekadhā // BrP_242.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30572: evaṃ dvaṃdvāny atītāni mama vartanti nityaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30573: matta etāni jāyante pralaye yānti mām api // BrP_242.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30575: manyate pakṣabuddhitvāt tathaiva sukṛtāny api // BrP_242.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30578: sukham evaṃ tu kartavyaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā sukhaṃ mama /
GP11brahmppu:30579: yāvad eva tu me saukhyaṃ jātyāṃ jātyāṃ bhaviṣyati // BrP_242.37 //
GP11brahmppu:30580: bhaviṣyati na me duḥkhaṃ kṛtenehāpy anantakam /
GP11brahmppu:30581: sukhaduḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ niraye cāpi majjanam // BrP_242.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30582: nirayāc cāpi mānuṣyaṃ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30583: manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāt pauruṣaṃ punaḥ // BrP_242.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30585: eṣa evaṃ dvijātīnām ātmā vai sa guṇair vṛtaḥ // BrP_242.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30589: ya evaṃ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam // BrP_242.42 //
GP11brahmppu:30590: sa evaṃ phalam āpnoti triṣu lokeṣu mūrtimān /
GP11brahmppu:30592: prakṛtiś ca tathāpnoti triṣu lokeṣu kāmagā /
GP11brahmppu:30594: trīṇi sthānāni caitāni jānīyāt prākṛtāni ha /
GP11brahmppu:30595: aliṅgaprakṛtitvāc ca liṅgair apy anumīyate // BrP_242.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30596: tathaiva pauruṣaṃ liṅgam anumānād dhi manyate /
GP11brahmppu:30597: sa liṅgāntaram āsādya prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇam // BrP_242.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30599: śrotrādīni tu sarvāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇy atha // BrP_242.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30600: rāgādīni pravartante guṇeṣv iha guṇaiḥ saha /
GP11brahmppu:30601: aham etāni vai kurvan mamaitānīndriyāṇi ha // BrP_242.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30602: nirindriyo hi manyeta vraṇavān asmi nirvraṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30603: aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam akālaṃ kālam ātmanaḥ // BrP_242.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30604: asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam amṛtaṃ mṛtam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30605: amṛtyuṃ mṛtyum ātmānam acaraṃ caram ātmanaḥ // BrP_242.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30606: akṣetraṃ kṣetram ātmānam asaṅgaṃ saṅgam ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30607: atattvaṃ tattvam ātmānam abhavaṃ bhavam ātmanaḥ // BrP_242.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30608: akṣaraṃ kṣaram ātmānam abuddhatvād dhi manyate /
GP11brahmppu:30613: candramā iva kośānāṃ punas tatra sahasraśaḥ // BrP_242.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30615: kalā pañcadaśī yonis tad dhāma iti paṭhyate // BrP_242.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30616: nityam eva vijānīhi somaṃ vai ṣoḍaśāṃśakaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30617: kalayā jāyate 'jasraṃ punaḥ punar abuddhimān // BrP_242.56 //
GP11brahmppu:30618: dhīmāṃś cāyaṃ na bhavati nṛpa evaṃ hi jāyate /
GP11brahmppu:30619: ṣoḍaśī tu kalā sūkṣmā sa soma upadhāryatām // BrP_242.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30620: na tūpayujyate devair devān api yunakti saḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30622: prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu sa eva triguṇo bhavet // BrP_242.58 //
GP11brahmppu:30625: strīpuṃsayor vā saṃbandhaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate // BrP_243.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30626: ṛte tu puruṣaṃ neha strī garbhān dhārayaty uta /
GP11brahmppu:30627: ṛte striyaṃ na puruṣo rūpaṃ nirvartate tathā // BrP_243.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30629: rūpaṃ nirvartayed etad evaṃ sarvāsu yoniṣu // BrP_243.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30631: ṛtau nirvartate rūpaṃ tad vakṣyāmi nidarśanam // BrP_243.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30632: ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ca mātur guṇās tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30633: asthi snāyu ca majjā ca jānīmaḥ pitṛto dvija // BrP_243.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30635: evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vedaśāstreṣu paṭhyate // BrP_243.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30636: pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ śāstroktaṃ yac ca paṭhyate /
GP11brahmppu:30637: vedaśāstrapramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanam // BrP_243.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30639: yac cāpi bhagavaṃs tasmān mokṣadharmo na vidyate // BrP_243.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30641: tan mamācakṣva tattvena pratyakṣo hy asi sarvadā // BrP_243.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30642: mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayam /
GP11brahmppu:30643: ajeyam ajaraṃ nityam atīndriyam anīśvaram // BrP_243.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30646: evam etad yathā vakṣye tattvagrāhī yathā bhavān // BrP_243.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30647: dhāryate hi tvayā grantha ubhayor vedaśāstrayoḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30648: na ca granthasya tattvajño yathātattvaṃ nareśvara // BrP_243.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30649: yo hi vede ca śāstre ca granthadhāraṇatatparaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30650: na ca granthārthatattvajñas tasya taddhāraṇaṃ vṛthā // BrP_243.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30651: bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30652: yas tu granthārthatattvajño nāsya granthāgamo vṛthā // BrP_243.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30653: granthasyārthaṃ sa pṛṣṭas tu mādṛśo vaktum arhati /
GP11brahmppu:30654: yathātattvābhigamanād arthaṃ tasya sa vindati // BrP_243.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30655: na yaḥ samutsukaḥ kaścid granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimān /
GP11brahmppu:30656: sa kathaṃ mandavijñāno granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāt // BrP_243.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30657: ajñātvā granthatattvāni vādaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30658: lobhād vāpy athavā dambhāt sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet // BrP_243.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30659: nirṇayaṃ cāpi cchidrātmā na tad vakṣyati tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30661: tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra yathaitad anudṛśyate /
GP11brahmppu:30662: yathā tattvena sāṃkhyeṣu yogeṣu ca mahātmasu // BrP_243.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30663: yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti sāṃkhyaṃ tad anugamyate /
GP11brahmppu:30664: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimān // BrP_243.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30665: tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca /
GP11brahmppu:30666: etad aindriyakaṃ tāta yad bhavān ittham āttha mām // BrP_243.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30667: dravyād dravyasya nirvṛttir indriyād indriyaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30668: dehād deham avāpnoti bījād bījaṃ tathaiva ca // BrP_243.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30670: kathaṃ guṇā bhaviṣyanti nirguṇatvān mahātmanaḥ // BrP_243.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30671: guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante tatraiva viramanti ca /
GP11brahmppu:30672: evaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtijā jāyante na ca yānti ca // BrP_243.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30673: tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca /
GP11brahmppu:30674: aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa jānīhi prākṛtena vai // BrP_243.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30675: pumāṃś caivāpumāṃś caiva strīliṅgaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtam /
GP11brahmppu:30676: vāyur eṣa pumāṃś caiva rasa ity abhidhīyate // BrP_243.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30678: yathā puṣpaphalair nityaṃ mūrtaṃ cāmūrtayas tathā // BrP_243.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30679: evam apy anumānena sa liṅgam upalabhyate /
GP11brahmppu:30682: kevalaṃ tv abhimānitvād guṇeṣu guṇa ucyate // BrP_243.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30683: guṇā guṇavataḥ santi nirguṇasya kuto guṇāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30684: tasmād evaṃ vijānanti ye janā guṇadarśinaḥ // BrP_243.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30685: yadā tv eṣa guṇān etān prākṛtān abhimanyate /
GP11brahmppu:30686: tadā sa guṇavān eva guṇabhedān prapaśyati // BrP_243.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30687: yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30689: aprabuddhaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ svaguṇaiḥ prāhur īśvaram /
GP11brahmppu:30690: nirguṇaṃ ceśvaraṃ nityam adhiṣṭhātāram eva ca // BrP_243.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30691: prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca pañcaviṃśatikaṃ budhāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30692: sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥ // BrP_243.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30694: budhyamānaṃ na budhyante 'vagacchanti samaṃ tadā // BrP_243.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30695: etan nidarśanaṃ samyaṅ na samyag anudarśanam /
GP11brahmppu:30696: budhyamānaṃ prabudhyante dvābhyāṃ pṛthag ariṃdama // BrP_243.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30698: ekatvam akṣaraṃ prāhur nānātvaṃ kṣaram ucyate // BrP_243.37 //
