GP11brahmppu:30700: ekatvadarśanaṃ cāsya nānātvaṃ cāsya darśanam // BrP_243.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30701: tattvavit tattvayor eva pṛthag etan nidarśanam /
GP11brahmppu:30702: pañcaviṃśatibhis tattvaṃ tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_243.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30704: varjyasya varjyam ācāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvāt sanātanam // BrP_243.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30707: paśyatas tad dhi saṃdigdham etayor vai nidarśanam // BrP_243.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30709: sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi tattvam etan na saṃśayaḥ // BrP_243.42 //
GP11brahmppu:30710: akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ tvayā yad api kāraṇam /
GP11brahmppu:30711: tad apy asthirabuddhitvāt pranaṣṭam iva me 'nagha // BrP_243.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30713: dvaṃdvaṃ caivāniruddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ // BrP_243.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30714: vidyāvidye ca bhagavann akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30715: sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca kṛtsnena buddhābuddhiṃ pṛthak pṛthak // BrP_243.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30717: hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi yad etad anupṛcchasi /
GP11brahmppu:30718: yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva me // BrP_243.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30719: yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ dhyānam eva paraṃ balam /
GP11brahmppu:30720: tac cāpi dvividhaṃ dhyānam āhur vidyāvido janāḥ // BrP_243.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30721: ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca /
GP11brahmppu:30722: prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo nirguṇo mānasas tathā // BrP_243.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30723: mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca bhojane ca narādhipa /
GP11brahmppu:30724: dvikālaṃ nopabhuñjīta śeṣaṃ bhuñjīta tatparaḥ // BrP_243.49 //
GP11brahmppu:30726: daśadvādaśabhir vāpi caturviṃśāt paraṃ yataḥ // BrP_243.50 //
GP11brahmppu:30727: sa codanābhir matimān nātmānaṃ codayed atha /
GP11brahmppu:30728: tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // BrP_243.51 //
GP11brahmppu:30729: viśvātmā satataṃ jñeya ity evam anuśuśruma /
GP11brahmppu:30730: dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥ // BrP_243.52 //
GP11brahmppu:30732: pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayīta mano hṛdi // BrP_243.53 //
GP11brahmppu:30734: mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ // BrP_243.54 //
GP11brahmppu:30735: sthāṇuvac cāpy akampyaḥ syād dāruvac cāpi niścalaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30736: buddhyā vidhividhānajñas tato yuktaṃ pracakṣate // BrP_243.55 //
GP11brahmppu:30737: na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na ca paśyati kiṃcana /
GP11brahmppu:30738: na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na ca saṃkalpate manaḥ // BrP_243.56 //
GP11brahmppu:30739: na cāpi manyate kiṃcin na ca budhyeta kāṣṭhavat /
GP11brahmppu:30740: tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // BrP_243.57 //
GP11brahmppu:30741: na bhāti hi yathā dīpo dīptis tadvac ca dṛśyate /
GP11brahmppu:30742: niliṅgaś cādhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryaggatim avāpnuyāt // BrP_243.58 //
GP11brahmppu:30743: tadā tadupapannaś ca yasmin dṛṣṭe ca kathyate /
GP11brahmppu:30744: hṛdayastho 'ntarātmeti jñeyo jñas tāta madvidhaiḥ // BrP_243.59 //
GP11brahmppu:30745: nirdhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmivān /
GP11brahmppu:30746: vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe paśyaty ātmānam ātmani // BrP_243.60 //
GP11brahmppu:30748: brāhmaṇā brahmayonisthā hy ayonim amṛtātmakam // BrP_243.61 //
GP11brahmppu:30749: tad evāhur aṇubhyo 'ṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaram /
GP11brahmppu:30750: sarvatra sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate // BrP_243.62 //
GP11brahmppu:30752: mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhan na tāmasaḥ // BrP_243.63 //
GP11brahmppu:30753: tamaso dūra ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30755: yoga eṣa hi lokānāṃ kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam /
GP11brahmppu:30756: evaṃ paśyan prapaśyeta ātmānam ajaraṃ param // BrP_243.65 //
GP11brahmppu:30757: yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayā /
GP11brahmppu:30759: avyaktam āhuḥ prakhyānaṃ parāṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30760: tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattama // BrP_243.67 //
GP11brahmppu:30761: ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīya iti naḥ śrutam /
GP11brahmppu:30763: etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa /
GP11brahmppu:30764: pañca caiva viśeṣāś ca tathā pañcendriyāṇi ca // BrP_243.69 //
GP11brahmppu:30765: etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30766: sāṃkhye sāṃkhyavidhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe sthitāḥ // BrP_243.70 //
GP11brahmppu:30767: yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyate /
GP11brahmppu:30770: guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā // BrP_243.72 //
GP11brahmppu:30772: ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca tathā sṛji // BrP_243.73 //
GP11brahmppu:30773: evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñānakovidaiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30774: adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanam // BrP_243.74 //
GP11brahmppu:30775: ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavān /
GP11brahmppu:30776: ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt // BrP_243.75 //
GP11brahmppu:30778: tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo 'dhitiṣṭhati // BrP_243.76 //
GP11brahmppu:30780: adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutam // BrP_243.77 //
GP11brahmppu:30781: kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyate /
GP11brahmppu:30782: avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyate // BrP_243.78 //
GP11brahmppu:30783: anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:30784: kṣetram avyakta ity uktaṃ jñātāraṃ pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_243.79 //
GP11brahmppu:30785: anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate /
GP11brahmppu:30786: jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_243.80 //
GP11brahmppu:30787: avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaram /
GP11brahmppu:30788: anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_243.81 //
GP11brahmppu:30790: saṃkhyā prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pravakṣyate // BrP_243.82 //
GP11brahmppu:30792: saṃkhyā sahasrakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_243.83 //
GP11brahmppu:30794: yadā budhyati ātmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ // BrP_243.84 //
GP11brahmppu:30796: evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta // BrP_243.85 //
GP11brahmppu:30798: guṇavattvād yathaitāni nirguṇebhyas tathā bhavet // BrP_243.86 //
GP11brahmppu:30799: na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30800: vidyate kṣarabhāvaś ca na parasparam avyayam // BrP_243.87 //
GP11brahmppu:30801: paśyanty amatayo ye na samyak teṣu ca darśanam /
GP11brahmppu:30802: te vyaktiṃ pratipadyante punaḥ punar ariṃdama // BrP_243.88 //
GP11brahmppu:30803: sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanāt /
GP11brahmppu:30805: sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30806: ya evam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate // BrP_243.90 //
GP11brahmppu:30809: vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ // BrP_244.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30811: sargapralaya ity uktaṃ vidyāvidye ca viṃśakaḥ // BrP_244.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30815: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutam // BrP_244.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30816: viṣayāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30817: manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣate // BrP_244.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30818: ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30819: ahaṃkāras tathā vidyā buddhir vidyā nareśvara // BrP_244.6 //
GP11brahmppu:30821: vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ // BrP_244.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30822: avyaktam aparaṃ prāhur vidyā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30823: sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyajñānasya pāragaḥ // BrP_244.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30824: jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam /
GP11brahmppu:30825: tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥ // BrP_244.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30826: vidyāvidye tu tattvena mayokte vai viśeṣataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30827: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me // BrP_244.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30828: ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktau ubhāv etāv anakṣarau /
GP11brahmppu:30829: kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathājñānaṃ tu jñānataḥ // BrP_244.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30831: tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv eva procyete jñānacintakaiḥ // BrP_244.12 //
GP11brahmppu:30833: tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // BrP_244.13 //
GP11brahmppu:30835: adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṣetram āhur etad vai pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_244.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30836: yad antarguṇajālaṃ tu tad vyaktātmani saṃkṣipet /
GP11brahmppu:30837: tad ahaṃ tad guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśe vilīyate // BrP_244.15 //
GP11brahmppu:30838: guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tad ekā prakṛtir bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:30839: kṣetrajño 'pi tadā tāvat kṣetrajñaḥ saṃpraṇīyate // BrP_244.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30841: nirguṇatvaṃ ca vai dehe guṇeṣu parivartanāt // BrP_244.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30843: prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma // BrP_244.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30844: kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā guṇavatī guṇeṣv atha /
GP11brahmppu:30845: prakṛtiṃ tv atha jānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥ // BrP_244.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30847: anyo 'ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān // BrP_244.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30848: tadaiṣo 'vyathatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet /
GP11brahmppu:30849: prakṛtyā caiṣa rājendra miśro 'nyo 'nyasya dṛśyate // BrP_244.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30850: yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate /
GP11brahmppu:30851: paśyate ca paraṃ paśyaṃs tadā paśyan nu saṃsṛjet // BrP_244.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30852: kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo 'haṃ kālanimajjanaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30853: yathā matsyo hy abhijñānād anuvartitavāñ jalam // BrP_244.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30854: aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam /
GP11brahmppu:30857: ātmānaṃ tad avajñānād anyaṃ caiva na vedmy aham // BrP_244.25 //
GP11brahmppu:30858: mamāstu dhik kubuddhasya yo 'haṃ magna imaṃ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30859: anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam // BrP_244.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30860: ayam anubhaved bandhur anena saha me kṣayam /
GP11brahmppu:30861: sāmyam ekatvatāṃ yāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham // BrP_244.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30862: tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo 'ham anena vai /
GP11brahmppu:30863: ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tadā // BrP_244.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30865: saṃsargād atisaṃsargāt sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham // BrP_244.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30866: so 'ham evaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān /
GP11brahmppu:30867: uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvase // BrP_244.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30869: gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād ihedānīṃ sthiro bhava // BrP_244.31 //
GP11brahmppu:30870: sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etaṃ vivañcanāt /
GP11brahmppu:30871: vañcito hy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā // BrP_244.32 //
GP11brahmppu:30872: na tat tadaparāddhaṃ syād aparādho hy ayaṃ mama /
GP11brahmppu:30873: yo 'ham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ parāṅmukham upasthitaḥ // BrP_244.33 //
GP11brahmppu:30875: amūrtiś cāpy amūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ // BrP_244.34 //
GP11brahmppu:30876: prakṛtyā ca tayā tena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu /
GP11brahmppu:30877: nirmamasya mamatvena vikṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca // BrP_244.35 //
GP11brahmppu:30879: samatā na mayā kācid ahaṃkāre kṛtā mayā // BrP_244.36 //
GP11brahmppu:30880: ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā so 'yaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām /
GP11brahmppu:30883: apalagnām imāṃ hitvā saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayam // BrP_244.38 //
GP11brahmppu:30885: kṣemaṃ mama sahānena naivaikam anayā saha // BrP_244.39 //
GP11brahmppu:30887: akṣaratvaṃ nigacchati tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayam // BrP_244.40 //
GP11brahmppu:30889: nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithila // BrP_244.41 //
GP11brahmppu:30892: niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca viśuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathā /
GP11brahmppu:30893: pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutam // BrP_244.43 //
GP11brahmppu:30895: yad eva sāṃkhyaśāstroktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tat // BrP_244.44 //
GP11brahmppu:30897: vispaṣṭaṃ procyate tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // BrP_244.45 //
GP11brahmppu:30898: bṛhac caivam idaṃ śāstram ity āhur viduṣo janāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30899: asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punarbhavapuraḥsaram // BrP_244.46 //
GP11brahmppu:30900: pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ paṭhyate ca narādhipa /
GP11brahmppu:30901: sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tattvaṃ yathāvad anuvarṇitam // BrP_244.47 //
GP11brahmppu:30902: buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30903: budhyamānaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ prāhur yoganidarśanam // BrP_244.48 //
GP11brahmppu:30906: guṇānāṃ dhāryatāṃ tattvaṃ sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā // BrP_245.1 //
GP11brahmppu:30907: ajo hi krīḍayā bhūpa vikriyāṃ prāpta ity uta /
GP11brahmppu:30908: ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā nāneva praticakṣate // BrP_245.2 //
GP11brahmppu:30909: etad evaṃ vikurvāṇo budhyamāno na budhyate /
GP11brahmppu:30910: guṇān ācarate hy eṣa sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā // BrP_245.3 //
GP11brahmppu:30912: na tv evaṃ budhyate 'vyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ tāta nirguṇam // BrP_245.4 //
GP11brahmppu:30913: kadācit tv eva khalv etat tad āhuḥ pratibuddhakam /
GP11brahmppu:30914: budhyate yadi cāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam // BrP_245.5 //
GP11brahmppu:30915: budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa mamātmaka iti śrutaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:30918: pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyate // BrP_245.7 //
GP11brahmppu:30920: satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ tu caturviṃśaṃ vibudhyate // BrP_245.8 //
GP11brahmppu:30922: avyaktaṃ caiva tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalam // BrP_245.9 //
GP11brahmppu:30924: budhyamāno yadātmānam anyo 'ham iti manyate // BrP_245.10 //
GP11brahmppu:30926: budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yathā // BrP_245.11 //
GP11brahmppu:30927: ṣaḍviṃśaṃ rājaśārdūla tadā buddhaḥ kṛto vrajet /
GP11brahmppu:30932: etat tu tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaram // BrP_245.14 //
GP11brahmppu:30935: na caiva tattvavāṃs tāta saṃsāreṣu nimajjati /
GP11brahmppu:30936: eṣām upaiti tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ budhyasva lakṣaṇam // BrP_245.16 //
GP11brahmppu:30938: kevalena balenaiva samatāṃ yāty asaṃśayam // BrP_245.17 //
GP11brahmppu:30940: etan nānātvam ity uktaṃ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāt // BrP_245.18 //
GP11brahmppu:30942: ekatvaṃ vai bhavet tasya yadā buddhyānubudhyate // BrP_245.19 //
GP11brahmppu:30944: saṅgadharmā bhavaty eṣa niḥsaṅgātmā narādhipa // BrP_245.20 //
GP11brahmppu:30946: vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyate // BrP_245.21 //
GP11brahmppu:30948: eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānas tu te 'nagha // BrP_245.22 //
GP11brahmppu:30950: maśakodumbare yadvad anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥ // BrP_245.23 //
GP11brahmppu:30952: evam eva ca gantavyaṃ nānātvaikatvam etayoḥ // BrP_245.24 //
GP11brahmppu:30956: so 'yam evaṃ vimucyeta nānyatheti viniścayaḥ // BrP_245.26 //
GP11brahmppu:30957: paraś ca paradharmā ca bhavaty eva sametya vai /
GP11brahmppu:30958: viśuddhadharmā śuddhena nāśuddhena ca buddhimān // BrP_245.27 //
GP11brahmppu:30960: viyogadharmiṇā caiva vimuktātmā bhavaty atha // BrP_245.28 //
GP11brahmppu:30961: vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhavet /
GP11brahmppu:30962: śucikarmā śuciś caiva bhavaty amitabuddhimān // BrP_245.29 //
GP11brahmppu:30964: kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vai /
GP11brahmppu:30965: svatantraś ca svatantreṇa svatantratvam avāpyate // BrP_245.30 //
GP11brahmppu:30966: etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā te BrP_245.31a
GP11brahmppu:30971: pradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavet BrP_245.32b
GP11brahmppu:30974: na deyam etac ca yathānṛtātmane BrP_245.33a
GP11brahmppu:30985: sadaiva guhyaṃ tv idam eva deyam BrP_245.35d
GP11brahmppu:30986: etair guṇair hīnatame na deyam BrP_245.36a
GP11brahmppu:30987: etat paraṃ brahma viśuddham āhuḥ BrP_245.36b
GP11brahmppu:30988: na śreyase yokṣyati tādṛśe kṛtaṃ BrP_245.36c
GP11brahmppu:30990: pṛthvīm imāṃ vā yadi ratnapūrṇāṃ BrP_245.37a
GP11brahmppu:30991: dadyād adeyaṃ tv idam avratāya BrP_245.37b
GP11brahmppu:30994: karāla mā te bhayam asti kiṃcid BrP_245.38a
GP11brahmppu:30995: etac chrutaṃ brahma paraṃ tvayādya BrP_245.38b
GP11brahmppu:31002: avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanād BrP_245.40a
GP11brahmppu:31006: pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendra BrP_245.41a
GP11brahmppu:31007: tathā mayedaṃ tvayi noktam anyat BrP_245.41b
GP11brahmppu:31011: etad uktaṃ paraṃ brahma yasmān nāvartate punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31012: pañcaviṃśaṃ muniśreṣṭhā vasiṣṭhena yathā purā // BrP_245.42 //
GP11brahmppu:31015: etan niḥśreyasakaraṃ jñānaṃ bhoḥ paramaṃ mayā /
GP11brahmppu:31016: kathitaṃ tattvato viprāḥ śrutvā devarṣito dvijāḥ // BrP_245.44 //
GP11brahmppu:31019: nāradād viditaṃ mahyam etad uktaṃ sanātanam /
GP11brahmppu:31020: mā śucadhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ śrutvaitat paramaṃ padam // BrP_245.46 //
GP11brahmppu:31021: yena kṣarākṣare bhinne na bhayaṃ tasya vidyate /
GP11brahmppu:31022: vidyate tu bhayaṃ yasya yo nainaṃ vetti tattvataḥ // BrP_245.47 //
GP11brahmppu:31023: avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā punaḥ punar upadravān /
GP11brahmppu:31025: devalokaṃ tathā tiryaṅ mānuṣyam api cāśnute /
GP11brahmppu:31026: yadi vā mucyate vāpi tasmād ajñānasāgarāt // BrP_245.49 //
GP11brahmppu:31028: ahany ahani majjanti yatra bhūtāni bho dvijāḥ // BrP_245.50 //
GP11brahmppu:31030: tasmād yūyaṃ virajaskā vitamaskāś ca bho dvijāḥ // BrP_245.51 //
GP11brahmppu:31031: evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ sārāt sārataraṃ param /
GP11brahmppu:31032: kathitaṃ paramaṃ mokṣaṃ yaṃ jñātvā na nivartate // BrP_245.52 //
GP11brahmppu:31034: na duṣṭamataye viprā na śraddhāvimukhāya ca // BrP_245.53 //
GP11brahmppu:31036: evaṃ purā munīn vyāsaḥ purāṇaṃ ślakṣṇayā girā /
GP11brahmppu:31044: hṛṣṭā babhūvuḥ suprītā vismitāś ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31045: praśaśaṃsus tadā vyāsaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ munim // BrP_246.5 //
GP11brahmppu:31050: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃcit triṣu lokeṣu vai prabho // BrP_246.7 //
GP11brahmppu:31051: sarvajñas tvaṃ mahābhāga deveṣv iva bṛhaspatiḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31052: namasyāmo mahāprājñaṃ brahmiṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ mahāmunim // BrP_246.8 //
GP11brahmppu:31053: yena tvayā tu vedārthā bhārate prakaṭīkṛtāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31054: kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ tava sarvān mahāmune // BrP_246.9 //
GP11brahmppu:31055: adhītya caturo vedān sāṅgān vyākaraṇāni ca /
GP11brahmppu:31056: kṛtavān bhārataṃ śāstraṃ tasmai jñānātmane namaḥ // BrP_246.10 //
GP11brahmppu:31063: evam uktvā samabhyarcya vyāsaṃ te caiva pūjitāḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31064: jagmur yathāgataṃ sarve kṛtakṛtyāḥ svam āśramam // BrP_246.13 //
GP11brahmppu:31065: tathā mayā muniśreṣṭhā kathitaṃ hi sanātanam /
GP11brahmppu:31068: vyāsaprasādāt tat sarvaṃ mayā saṃparikīrtitam // BrP_246.15 //
GP11brahmppu:31073: prāpnoti brāhmaṇo vidyāṃ kṣatriyo vijayaṃ raṇe /
GP11brahmppu:31074: vaiśyas tu dhanam akṣayyaṃ śūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt // BrP_246.18 //
GP11brahmppu:31075: yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyañ śṛṇoti puruṣaḥ śuciḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31076: taṃ taṃ kāmam avāpnoti naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_246.19 //
GP11brahmppu:31079: etad vo yan mayākhyātaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /
GP11brahmppu:31082: upoṣya yad avāpnoti tad asya śravaṇān naraḥ // BrP_246.22 //
GP11brahmppu:31083: yad agnihotre suhute varṣe nāpnoti vai phalam /
GP11brahmppu:31084: mahāpuṇyamayaṃ viprās tad asya śravaṇāt sakṛt // BrP_246.23 //
GP11brahmppu:31086: mathurāyāṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam // BrP_246.24 //
GP11brahmppu:31087: tad āpnoti phalaṃ samyak samādhānena kīrtanāt /
GP11brahmppu:31089: yat phalaṃ kriyam ālokya puruṣo 'tha labhen naraḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31090: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād api // BrP_246.26 //
GP11brahmppu:31091: idaṃ yaḥ śraddhayā nityaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /
GP11brahmppu:31092: yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyān martyaḥ sa yāti bhuvanaṃ hareḥ // BrP_246.27 //
GP11brahmppu:31093: śrāvayed brāhmaṇo yas tu sadā parvasu saṃyataḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31094: ekādaśyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BrP_246.28 //
GP11brahmppu:31097: trisaṃdhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhed vidvāñ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31098: idaṃ variṣṭham ākhyānaṃ sa sarvam īpsitaṃ labhet // BrP_246.30 //
GP11brahmppu:31099: rogārto mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt /
GP11brahmppu:31100: bhayād vimucyate bhīta āpadāpanna āpadaḥ // BrP_246.31 //
GP11brahmppu:31101: jātismaratvaṃ vidyāṃ ca putrān medhāṃ paśūn dhṛtim /
GP11brahmppu:31102: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ tu labhate naraḥ // BrP_246.32 //
GP11brahmppu:31103: yān yān kāmān abhipretya paṭhet prayatamānasaḥ /
GP11brahmppu:31104: tāṃs tān sarvān avāpnoti puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ // BrP_246.33 //
GP11brahmppu:31105: yaś cedaṃ satataṃ śṛṇoti manujaḥ svargāpavargapradaṃ BrP_246.34a
GP11brahmppu:31106: viṣṇuṃ lokaguruṃ praṇamya varadaṃ bhaktyekacittaḥ śuciḥ BrP_246.34b
GP11brahmppu:31107: bhuktvā cātra sukhaṃ vimuktakaluṣaḥ svarge ca divyaṃ sukhaṃ BrP_246.34c
GP11brahmppu:31108: paścād yāti hareḥ padaṃ suvimalaṃ mukto guṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ BrP_246.34d
GP11brahmppu:31110: tadvat kṣatriyapuṃgavais tu niyataiḥ śreyorthibhiḥ sarvadā BrP_246.35b
GP11brahmppu:31111: vaiśyaiś cānudinaṃ viśuddhakulajaiḥ śūdrais tathā dhārmikaiḥ BrP_246.35c
GP11brahmppu:31112: śrotavyaṃ tv idam uttamaṃ bahuphalaṃ dharmārthamokṣapradam BrP_246.35d
GP11brahmppu:31113: dharme matir bhavatu vaḥ puruṣottamānāṃ BrP_246.36a
GP11brahmppu:31114: sa hy eka eva paralokagatasya bandhuḥ BrP_246.36b
GP11brahmppu:31115: arthāḥ striyaś ca nipuṇair api sevyamānā BrP_246.36c
GP11brahmppu:31116: naiva prabhāvam upayānti na ca sthiratvam BrP_246.36d
GP11brahmppu:31118: svargaṃ ca dharmeṇa naraḥ prayāti BrP_246.37b
GP11brahmppu:31119: āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca tapaś ca dharmaṃ BrP_246.37c
GP11brahmppu:31122: dharmaḥ sakhā cātra pare ca loke BrP_246.38b
GP11brahmppu:31123: trātā ca dharmas tv iha mokṣadaś ca BrP_246.38c
GP11brahmppu:31124: dharmād ṛte nāsti tu kiṃcid eva BrP_246.38d
GP11brahmppu:31125: idaṃ rahasyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /
GP11brahmppu:31126: na deyaṃ duṣṭamataye nāstikāya viśeṣataḥ // BrP_246.39 //
